src: "Ulusal Hazine filmini izlediyseniz, Bağımsızlık Bildirgesi'nin arkasına bir hazine haritası çizilmiş olduğunu düşünebilirsiniz. Fakat bu doğru değil. Belgenin arka yüzünde yazılı bir şey bulunmasına rağmen bu bir hazine haritası değildir. Bağımsızlık Bildirgesi'nin arka yüzünde ""4 Temmuz 1776 Tarihli Orijinal Bağımsızlık Bildirgesi"" yazılıydı. Metin, belgenin alt kısmında baş aşağı görünür. Bunu yazanın kim olduğunu hiçkimsenin tam olarak bilmemesine karşın, yaşamının başlangıcında, büyük parşömen dökümanın (29¾ inçe 24½ inç ölçülerinde) saklanmak amacıyla sarıldığı biliniyor. Dolayısıyla, bilgilendirmenin basit bir şekilde, bir etiket olarak eklenmesi muhtemeldir."
mt: "If you've seen the movie National Treasure, you may think that the back of the Declaration of Independence was a treasure map. But that's not true. The back of the Declaration of Independence was not a treasure map. The back of the Declaration of Independence was written, "Original Declaration of Independence, July 4, 1776." The text appears upside down at the bottom of the document. No one knows who wrote it, but it is known that the large parchment document (29¾ by 24½ inches) was wrapped for storage at the beginning of its life. So it is likely that the information was simply added as a label."
ref: "If you have watched the movie National Treasure, you may think a treasure map was written on the back of the Declaration of Independence. However, that is not true. Although there is something written on the back of the document, it is not a treasure map. Written on the back of the Declaration of Independence were the words ""Original Declaration of Independence dated 4th July 1776"". The text appears on the bottom of the document, upside down. While no one knows for certain who wrote it, it is known that early in its life, the large parchment document (it measures 29¾ inches by 24½ inches) was rolled up for storage. So, it is likely that the notation was added simply as a label."

src: Ulusun bağımsızlığının başlarında, Singapur Botanik Bahçeler uzmanlığı adanın tropik bir Bahçe Şehrine dönüşmesine yardımcı oldu. 1981'de bir orkide melezi olan Vanda Miss Joaquim ülkenin ulusal çiçeği olarak seçildi.
mt: In the early days of the nation, Singapore Botanic Gardens expertise helped transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, a hybrid orchid called Vanda Miss Joaquim was chosen as the country's national flower.
ref: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.

src: Ulusun bağımsızlığının başlarında, Singapur Botanik Bahçeler uzmanlığı adanın tropik bir Bahçe Şehrine dönüşmesine yardımcı oldu. 1981'de bir orkide melezi olan Vanda Miss Joaquim ülkenin ulusal çiçeği olarak seçildi.
mt: In the early days of the nation, Singapore Botanic Gardens expertise helped transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, a hybrid orchid called Vanda Miss Joaquim was chosen as the country's national flower.
ref: Early in the nation's independence, Singapore Botanic Gardens' expertise helped to transform the island into a tropical Garden City. In 1981, Vanda Miss Joaquim, an orchid hybrid, was chosen as the nation's national flower.

src: Taş piramidin inşaatı Eski Krallık'ın sonuna kadar sürmüş olsa da Giza piramitleri, boyutları ve yapılarının teknik mükemmelliği açısından asla geçilemedi. Yeni Krallıktaki antik Mısırlılar seleflerinin bıraktıkları anıtlara hayret içerisinde bakarlardı ve bu anıtlar o zamanlar bin yıldan daha eskiydi.
mt: The construction of the stone pyramid continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, but the Giza pyramids were never surpassed in size and technical perfection. The ancient Egyptians of the New Kingdom were amazed at the monuments left by their predecessors, which were then over a thousand years old.
ref: Although pyramid-building in stone continued until the end of the Old Kingdom, the pyramids of Giza were never surpassed in their size and the technical excellence of their construction. New Kingdom ancient Egyptians marvelled at their predecessors monuments, which were then well over a thousand year old.

src: Her yıl ekim dolaylarında yaklaşık 1,5 milyon otobur, kuzey tepelerinden gelip Mara Nehrini geçerek yağmurlara ulaşmak için güney düzlüklerine doğru yolculuk eder. Sonrasında Nisan ayı civarındaki yağmurların ardından, batı üzerinden kuzeye geri dönmek için, tekrar Mara nehrini geçerler. Serengeti bölgesi, Tanzanya'daki Serengeti Ulusal Parkı, Ngorongoro Koruma Alanı ve Maswa Av Hayvanları Koruma Alanı ile Kenya'daki Masai Mara Ulusal Koruma Alanı'nı içerir.
mt: 1.5 million wildebeest migrate from the northern hills to the southern plains of the Serengeti every October and November, and then the reverse, to the north between April and June. The Serengeti region includes the Serengeti National Park in Tanzania, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area, the Maswa Game Reserve, the Masai Mara National Reserve in Kenya, and the Maasai Mara Game Reserve in Kenya.
ref: Every year around October nearly 1.5 million herbivores travel towards the southern plains, crossing the Mara River, from the northern hills for the rains. And then back to the north through the west, once again crossing the Mara river, after the rains in around April. The Serengeti region contains the Serengeti National Park, the Ngorongoro Conservation Area and Maswa Game Reserve in Tanzania and the Maasai Mara National Reserve in Kenya.

src: "Fransa açısından savaşın sona ermesiyle Almanya, Britanya adasını istila etmek üzere hazırlanmaya başladı. Almanya, saldırıya ""Deniz Aslanı Operasyonu"" kod adını verdi. Britanya Ordusu'nun ağır silah ve mühimmatlarının çoğu Dunkirk'ü boşalttıklarında kaybolmuştu. Dolayısıyla ordu oldukça zayıftı. Ancak Kraliyet Donanması hala Alman Donanmasından (""Kriegsmarine"") çok daha güçlüydü ve Manş Denizi'ne gönderilen herhangi bir işgal filosunu yok edebilirdi. Ancak, amiraller Alman hava saldırısı ile batırılacaklarından korktukları için çok az sayıda Kraliyet Donanması gemisi, muhtemel işgal rotalarının yakınında konumlanmıştı."
mt: "France's surrender in the war saw Germany preparing to invade the British Isles. Germany named the operation "Sea Lion". The British Army had lost most of its heavy weapons and ammunition when they evacuated Dunkirk. As a result, the army was quite weak. However, the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy ("Kriegsmarine") and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent to the English Channel. However, the admirals were afraid that they would be sunk by German air attacks and so very few Royal Navy ships were positioned near the likely invasion routes."
ref: With the battle for France over, Germany began to get ready to invade the island of Britain. Germany code-named the attack “Operation Sealion”. Most of the British Army's heavy weapons and supplies had been lost when it evacuated from Dunkirk, so the army was fairly weak. But the Royal Navy was still much stronger than the German Navy (“Kriegsmarine”) and could have destroyed any invasion fleet sent across the English Channel. However, very few Royal Navy ships were based near the likely invasion routes as the admirals were afraid they would be sunk by German air attack.

src: "İtalya'nın planları ile ilgili bir açıklamayla başlayalım. İtalya esasen Almanya ve Japonya'nın ""küçük kardeşi"" idi. Savaşın başlamasından hemen önce dört yeni gemi inşa etmelerine rağmen daha zayıf bir ordusu ve daha zayıf bir donanması vardı. İtalya'nın ana hedefleri Afrika ülkeleriydi. Bu ülkeleri ele geçirmek için birlik indirme pistine ihtiyaçları vardı, böylelikle birlikler Akdeniz'i geçip Afrika'yı işgal edebilecekti. Bunun için Mısır'daki İngiliz üslerinden ve gemilerinden kurtulmaları gerekiyordu. Bu eylemlerin yanı sıra, İtalya'nın savaş gemilerinin başka bir şey yapmaması gerekiyordu. Şimdi Japonya'ya gelelim. Japonya, tıpkı İngiltere gibi bir ada ülkesiydi."
mt: "Let's start with a statement about Italy's plans. Italy was essentially Germany and Japan's "little brother." Despite building four new ships just before the war began, it had a weaker army and navy. Italy's main targets were the African countries. They needed to land troops on a landing strip so that they could invade Africa by crossing the Mediterranean. They needed to get rid of the British bases and ships in Egypt. In addition to these actions, Italy's warships had to do nothing else. Now let's go to Japan. Japan, like England, was an island country."
ref: "Let's start with an explanation about Italy's plans. Italy was mainly the ""little brother"" of Germany and Japan. It had a weaker army and a weaker navy, although they had just built four new ships right before the beginning of the war. Italy's main goals were African countries. To capture those countries, they would need to have a troop launching pad, so as troops could sail across the Mediterranean Sea and invade Africa. For that, they had to get rid of British bases and ships in Egypt. Besides those actions, Italy's battleships were not supposed to do anything else. Now for Japan. Japan was an island country, just like Britain."

src: "Normandiya Çıkarması ve sonraki savaşlar Fransa'nın kuzeyini özgürleştirdi ancak güney hala işgal altındaydı. Vichy Fransızları tarafından yönetiliyordu. Bunlar, 1940'ta Almanlarla barışan ve onlarla savaşmak yerine işgalcilerle çalışan Fransızlardı. 15 Ağustos 1940 tarihinde Müttefikler güney Fransa'yı işgal etti, işgal için ""Dragoon Operasyonu"" ismi kullanıldı. Sadece iki hafta içinde Amerikalılar ve Özgür Fransız kuvvetleri güney Fransa'yı kurtarıp Almanya'ya yöneldiler."
mt: 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the operation was called "Dragoon Operation". In just two weeks, American and Free French forces liberated southern France and moved towards Germany.
ref: "The D-Day landings and the following battles had freed the north of France, but the south still wasn't free. It was ruled by the ""Vichy"" French. These were French people who had made peace with the Germans in 1940 and worked with the invaders instead of fighting them. On 15 August 1940, the Allies invaded southern France, the invasion was called ""Operation Dragoon"". In just two weeks the Americans and Free French forces had liberated southern France and were turning towards Germany."

src: "Normandiya Çıkarması ve sonraki savaşlar Fransa'nın kuzeyini özgürleştirdi ancak güney hala işgal altındaydı. Vichy Fransızları tarafından yönetiliyordu. src: Denizaltılar su altında seyahat etmek ve orada uzun süre kalmak için tasarlanmış gemilerdir. Denizaltılar I. Dünya Savaşı ve II. Dünya Savaşı'nda kullanılmıştır. O zamanlar çok yavaşlardı ve sınırlı bir atış menzilleri vardı. Savaşın başlangıcında çoğunlukla denizin yüzeyinde seyahat ettiler ancak radar gelişmeye ve daha yanlışsız hale gelmeye başladıkça denizaltılar görülmemek ama suyun altına inmek zorunda kaldılar. Alman denizaltılarına U-Boat denirdi. Almanlar denizaltılarını kullanma ve işletme konusunda çok iyiydiler. Denizaltılarla olan başarılarından ötürü, savaştan sonra Almanların çok sayıda denizaltıya sahip olmasına izin verilmedi.
mt: Submarines are ships designed to travel and stay underwater. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. At that time they were very slow and had limited firing ranges. At the beginning of the war they mostly traveled on the surface of the water but as radar developed and became more accurate submarines had to stay underwater. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at using and operating submarines. Their success with submarines was such that after the war the Germans were allowed to have a large number of submarines.
ref: Submarines are ships designed to travel underwater, and remain there for an extended amount of time. Submarines were used in World War I and World War II. Back then they were very slow and had a very limited shooting range. In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. German submarines were called U-Boats. The Germans were very good at navigating and operating their submarines. Because of their success with submarines, after the war Germans aren't trusted to have many of them.

src: Denizaltılar su altında seyahat etmek ve orada uzun süre kalmak için tasarlanmış gemilerdir. Denizaltılar I. Dünya Savaşı ve II. Dünya Savaşı'nda kullanılmıştır. O zamanlar çok yavaşlardı ve sınırlı bir atış menzilleri vardı. Savaşın başlangıcında çoğunlukla denizin yüzeyinde seyahat ettiler ancak radar gelişmeye ve daha yanlışsız hale gelmeye başladıkça denizaltılar görülmemek ama suyun altına inmek zorunda kaldılar. Alman denizaltılarına U-Boat denirdi. Almanlar denizaltılarını kullanma ve işletme konusunda çok iyiydiler. Denizaltılarla olan başarılarından ötürü, savaştan sonra Almanların çok sayıda denizaltıya sahip olmasına izin verilmedi.

The Germans were very good at using and operating submarines. Their success with submarines was such that after the war the Germans were allowed to have a large number of submarines.

In the beginning of the war they mostly travelled on top of the sea, but as radar began developing and becoming more accurate the submarines were forced to go under water to avoid being seen. src: 17 Eylül 1939'da Polonya savunması çoktan dağılmıştı ve tek ümit Romanya köprübaşı boyunca geri çekilip yeniden örgütlenmekti. Ancak Sovyetler Birliği Kızıl Ordusu'ndan 800.000'den fazla askerin Riga Barış Antlaşması, Sovyet-Polonya Saldırmazlık Paktı ve hem ikili hem de çok taraflı diğer uluslararası anlaşmaları ihlal ederek Polonya'nın doğu bölgelerini işgal ettikten sonra Beyaz Rusya ve Ukrayna cephelerine girmesi ve bu cepheleri açmasıyla bu planlar neredeyse bir gecede geçerliliğini yitirmiş hale geldi.
mt: 17 September 1939, the Polish defense was already in disarray and the only hope was to retreat and reorganize along the Romanian bridgehead. However, the Soviet Red Army of over 800,000 troops from the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact and other international agreements, both bilateral and multilateral, violated by the occupation of the eastern regions of Poland and the opening of the fronts in Belarus and Ukraine, made this plan almost obsolete in one night.
ref: By September 17, 1939, the Polish defense was already broken, and the only hope was to retreat and reorganise along the Romanian bridgehead. However, these plans were rendered obsolete nearly overnight, when over 800,000 soldiers from the Soviet's Union Red Army entered and created the Belarussian and Ukrainian fronts after invading the eastern regions of Poland in violation of the Riga Peace Treaty, the Soviet-Polish Non-Aggression Pact, and other international treaties, both bilateral and multilateral.

src: Kuzey Afrika'daki İtalyanlar için işler başından beri iyi gitmedi. 10 Haziran 1940'ta İtalya'nın savaş ilanından bir hafta sonra İngiliz 11. Süvari Birliği, Libya'daki Capuzzo Kalesi'ni ele geçirdi. Bardia'nın doğusunda kurdukları bir pusuda İngilizler, Onuncu İtalyan Ordusunun Baş Mühendisi olan General Lastucci'yi yakaladılar. 28 Haziran'da, Libya Genel Valisi ve Mussolini'nin meşru varisi olan Mareşal Italo Balbo, Tobruk'a inerken açılan dost ateşi ile öldürüldü.
mt: 10 June 1940, a week after Italy's declaration of war, the British 11th Armoured Division captured Capuzzo Fort in Libya. In a trap they laid east of Bardia, the British captured General Lastucci, Chief Engineer of the Tenth Italian Army. On 28 June, General Italo Balbo, Libya's Governor-General and Mussolini's legitimate heir, was killed by friendly fire as he landed at Tobruk.
ref: Things did not go well for the Italians in North Africa almost from the start. Within a week of Italy's declaration of war on June 10, 1940, the British 11th Hussars had seized Fort Capuzzo in Libya. In an ambush east of Bardia, the British captured the Italian Tenth Army's Engineer-in-Chief, General Lastucci. On June 28, Marshal Italo Balbo, the Governor-General of Libya and apparent heir to Mussolini, was killed by friendly fire while landing in Tobruk.

src: Tibet Budizmi, Buda'nın öğretilerine dayanan, ancak mahayana sevgi yolu ile ve Hint Yogasından alınan birçok teknikle genişletilen bir öğretidir. Prensip anlamında Tibet Budizmi çok basittir. Kundalini Yoga, meditasyon ve her şeyi kucaklayan bir sevgi patikasından oluşur. Kundalini Yoga, Yoga pozları, nefes egzersizleri, mantralar ve görselleştirmelerle Kundalini enerjisini (aydınlanma enerjisi) uyandırır. Tibet meditasyonunun merkezi Tanrı Yogası'dır. Çeşitli tanrıların görselleştirilmesiyle enerji kanalları temizlenir, çakralar aktif hale getirilir ve aydınlanma bilinci oluşturulur.
mt: Tibetan Buddhism is a teaching based on the doctrines of the Buddha, but expanded with many techniques taken from the Mahayana path of love and from Hindu Yoga. In principle, Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the all-encompassing path of love are its principles. Kundalini Yoga awakens the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) with yoga poses, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The central meditation of Tibet is God Yoga. Energy channels are cleansed by visualizing various gods, chakras are activated and the enlightened consciousness is created.
ref: The Tibetan Buddhism is based on the teachings of Buddha, but were extended by the mahayana path of love and by a lot of techniques from Indian Yoga. In principle the Tibetan Buddhism is very simple. It consists of Kundalini Yoga, meditation and the path of all-embracing love. With Kundalini Yoga the Kundalini energy (enlightenment energy) is awakened through yoga postures, breathing exercises, mantras and visualizations. The center of Tibetan meditation is the Deity Yoga. Through the visualization of various deities the energy channels are cleaned, the chakras are activated and the enlightenment consciousness is created.

src: Program saat 20:30'da başladı. yerel saat (15.00 UTC). Ülkenin dört bir yanından gelen ünlü şarkıcılar, bhajan veya ilahileri Shri Shyam'a sundu. Gece şarkıcı Sanju Sharma ile başladı ve Jai Shankar Choudhary ile devam etti. Lakkha Singh chappan bhog bhajan'ı da sunarken şarkıcı, Raju Khandelwal da ona eşlik ediyordu. Sonra, Lakkha Singh bhajans'ın söylenmesinde liderliği ele aldı. Baba Shyam'a 108 tabak Chhappan Bhog (Hinduizm inancında tanrıya ikram edilen tatlı, meyve, kuruyemiş, yemek vb. oluşan 56 farklı yiyecek) sunuldu. Lakkha Singh, şarkıcı Raju Khandelwal’ın eşliğinde chhappan bhog bhajan'ı söyledi.
mt: 20:30 local time (15:00 UTC) the program started. Famous singers from all over the country, bhajan or ilahies to Shri Shyam. The night began with the singer Sanju Sharma and continued with Jai Shankar Choudhary. Lakkha Singh chappan bhog bhajan also sung while the singer, Raju Khandelwal accompanied him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the leadership of bhajans. 108 tabak Chhappan Bhog (Hinduizm inancında tanrıya ikram edilen tatlı, meyve, kuruyemiş, yemek vb. oluşan 56 farklı yiyecek) was offered to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh, the singer Raju Khandelwal’s bhajan chhappan bhog was sung.
ref: The program started at 8:30 p.m. local time (15.00 UTC). Famous singers across the country presented bhajans, or devotional songs, to Shri Shyam's feet. Singer Sanju Sharma started the evening, followed by Jai Shankar Choudhary. esented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him. Then, Lakkha Singh took the lead in singing the bhajans. 108 plates of Chhappan Bhog (in Hinduism, 56 different edible items, like, sweets, fruits, nuts, dishes etc. which are offered to deity) were served to Baba Shyam. Lakkha Singh presented the chhappan bhog bhajan as well. Singer, Raju Khandelwal was accompanying him.

src: "Şenlikler dünyaca ünlü Cirque du Soleil grubunun özel gösterisiyle başladı. Onu yeniçeri grubu İstanbul Devlet Senfoni Orkestrası ile şarkıcılar Fatih Erkoç ve Müslüm Gürses izledi. Sonrasında semazenler sahneye çıktı. Türk diva Sezen Aksu, İtalyan tenor Alessandro Safina ve Yunan şarkıcı Haris Alexiou ile birlikte sahne aldı. Kapanışta, Türk dans grubu Anadolu Ateşi ""Truva"" adlı gösteriyi icra etti."
mt: "The celebrations began with a special performance by Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra and singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. The semazens then took the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu, Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou performed together. The Turkish dance group Anadolu Ateşi performed their show "Truva" at the end."
ref: "The celebrations started with a special show by the world-renowned group Cirque du Soleil. It was followed by the Istanbul State Symphony Orchestra, a Janissary band, and the singers Fatih Erkoç and Müslüm Gürses. Then Whirling Dervishes took to the stage. Turkish diva Sezen Aksu performed with the Italian tenor Alessandro Safina and Greek singer Haris Alexiou. To finish, Turkish dance group Fire of Anatolia performed the show ""Troy""."

src: "90(F)-derece sıcaklıkta beklerken yolculara su verildi. İtfaiye şefi Scott Kouns, ""Santa Clara'da, 90 derecelerde sıcaklıkla çok sıcak bir gündü"" dedi. En azından söylemek gerekirse, bir roller coaster'da mahsur kalmak rahatsızlık verici olurdu ve birinci şahısı aletten çıkarmak en az bir saat sürdü. """
mt: 90-degree heat, passengers were given water. Santa Clara Fire Chief Scott Kouns said, "It was a hot day in Santa Clara, 90 degrees." At least to say, being stranded on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable and getting off the ride took at least an hour.
ref: "Passengers were given water as they waited in 90(F)-degree heat. Fire captain Scott Kouns said, ""It was a hot day in the Santa Clara with temperatures in the 90s. Any length of time trapped on a roller coaster would be uncomfortable, to say the least, and it took at least an hour to get the first person off the ride."""

src: Son bültene göre, deniz seviyesi ölçümleri bir tsunami oluştuğunu gösterdi. Pago Pago ve Niue yakınlarında kaydedilen birtakım belirli tsunami faaliyetleri vardı. Tonga'da büyük bir hasar veya yaralanma bildirilmedi. Ancak elektrikler geçici olarak kesildi, bu da Tonga yetkililerinin PTWC tarafından yayınlanan tsunami uyarısını almasını engelledi. Hawaii'de, sahil şeridinde veya sahil şeridinin yakınında bulunan on dört okul, uyarıların kalkmasına rağmen tüm Çarşamba günü kapatıldı.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, sea level measurements showed a tsunami had occurred. There were some specific tsunami activities recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. There was no major damage or injury reported in Tonga. However, the power was temporarily cut, which prevented Tonga officials from receiving the tsunami warning issued by PTWC. In Hawaii, fourteen schools on or near the shoreline were closed all Wednesday despite the cancellation of the warning.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue. No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC. Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: A1GP Yeni Zelanda ekibinin co-pilotu Jonny Reid, bugün, Yeni Zelanda'da bulunan 48 yıllık Auckland Harbour Köprüsü'nde kanunları çiğnemeyen en hızlı sürüşü yaparak tarihe geçti. Bay Reid, Yeni Zelanda'nın A1GP otomobili Black Beauty'i köprü üzerinde tam yedi kez 160 km/s'ten daha hızlı sürebildi. Yeni Zelanda polisi, Kara Güzellik çok alçaktan uçtuğundan Bay Reid'in ne kadar hızlı gittiğini görmek için hız radar silahlarını kullanmada sorun yaşadı ve polisin Bay Reid'i ölçmeyi başardığı tek zaman onun hızının 160 km/saate düştüğü zamandı.
mt: 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge in New Zealand, today, the fastest illegal driving in the history of the laws of the co-pilot of the New Zealand A1GP team, Jonny Reid passed. Mr. Reid, New Zealand's A1GP car Black Beauty, seven times faster than 160 km / h on the bridge. New Zealand police, the very low speed of the beauty of the sea, Mr. Reid to use the speed radar guns to measure the speed of the problems and the only time Mr. Reid's speed of 160 km / h was measured.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

mt: 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge in New Zealand, today, the fastest illegal driving in the history of the laws of the co-pilot of the New Zealand A1GP team, Jonny Reid passed. Mr. Reid, New Zealand's A1GP car Black Beauty, seven times faster than 160 km / h on the bridge. New Zealand police, the very low speed of the beauty of the sea, Mr. Reid to use the speed radar guns to measure the speed of the problems and the only time Mr. Reid's speed of 160 km / h was measured.
ref: Jonny Reid, co-driver for the A1GP New Zealand team, today made history by driving the fastest over the 48-year-old Auckland Harbour Bridge, New Zealand, legally. Mr Reid managed to drive the New Zealand's A1GP car, Black Beauty at speeds over 160km/h seven times over the bridge. The New Zealand police had trouble using their speed radar guns to see how fast Mr Reid was going because of how low Black Beauty is, and the only time the police managed to clock Mr Reid was when he slowed down to 160km/h.

src: Orta şiddette bir deprem Pazartesi 22:08'de Batı Montana'yı salladı. Amerika Birleşik Devletleri Jeolojik Araştırma Merkezi (USGS) ve ona bağlı Ulusal Deprem Bilgi Merkezi'ne ilk anda herhangi bir hasar bildirimi ulaşmamıştır. Depremin merkezi Dillon'ın yaklaşık 20 km kuzey-kuzeydoğusu ve Butte'nin yaklaşık 65 km güneyiydi.
mt: 22:08 UTC on Monday, a moderate earthquake shook Western Montana. The United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its affiliated National Earthquake Information Center have not received any reports of damage. The epicenter was about 20 km north-northeast of Dillon and about 65 km south of Butte.
ref: A moderate earthquake shook western Montana at 10:08 p.m. on Monday. No immediate reports of damage have been received by the United States Geological Survey (USGS) and its National Earthquake Information Center. The earthquake was centered about 20 km (15 miles) north-northeast of Dillon, and about 65 km (40 miles) south of Butte.

src: Irak'ta bulunan Ebu Garib hapishanesi bir isyan sırasında ateşe verildi. ABD güçlerinin yönetimi ele geçirmesinin ardından mahkumların taciz edildiğinin ortaya çıkmasıyla hapishane kötü bir ün kazandı.
mt: The Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq was set on fire during a riot. The prison gained a bad reputation after it was taken over by U.S. forces, who were accused of abusing prisoners.
ref: Iraq's Abu Ghraib prison has been set alight during a riot. The jail became notorious after prisoner abuse was discovered there after US forces took over.

src: Grup, Maui's War Memorial Stadyumu'ndaki 9.000 kişinin izlemesi beklenen gösterisini iptal etti ve hayranlarından özür diledi. Grubun meneajerlik şirketi HK Management Inc., 20 Eylül'de iptale dair bir gerekçe sunmadı ancak ertesi gün lojistik gerekçeler ileri sürdü.
mt: 20 Eylül'de iptale dair bir gerekçe sunmadı ancak ertesi gün lojistik gerekçeler ileri sürdü.
ref: The band canceled the show at Maui's War Memorial Stadium, which was set to be attended by 9,000 people, and apologized to fans. The band's management company, HK Management Inc., gave no initial reason when they canceled on September 20, but blamed logistical reasons by the next day.

src: "Bişkek sokaklarında güvenlik güçleri bulunmadığı için, geniş çaplı yağmanın gece boyunca devam ettiği bildirildi. Bir gözlemci, sokaklarında çetelerinin dolaşarak mağazaları yağmalamasıyla Bişkek'in bir ""anarşi"" durumuna saplandığını söyledi. Çok sayıda Bişkek sakini güneyden gelen protestocuları kanuna karşı gelmekle suçladı."
mt: "Security forces were not on the streets of Bishkek, and the looting continued throughout the night, an observer said. A witness said the city's streets were filled with gangs of rioters looting shops, and Bishkek residents blamed the protesters from the south for breaking the law."
ref: "Widespread looting reportedly continued overnight, as law enforcement officers were not present on Bishkek's streets. Bishkek was described as sinking into a state of ""anarchy"" by one observer, as gangs of people roamed the streets and plundered stores of consumer goods. Several Bishkek residents blamed protesters from the south for the lawlessness."

src: Daha önce, Ring'in CEO'su Jamie Siminoff şirketin, garajındaki dükkanından kapı zilinin duyulmadığı zamanlarda başladığını belirtmişti. WiFi ile çalışan bir kapı zili yaptığını söyledi. Siminoff, programdaki jürilerin başlangıç fonu sağlamayı reddettiği, 2013 yılında katıldığı Shark Tank bölümünün ardından satışların arttığını söyledi. 2017'nin sonlarına doğru Siminoff, alışveriş konulu televizyon kanalı QVC'ye çıktı. Ayrıca Ring, rakip güvenlik şirketi ADT Corporation ile aralarındaki davayı anlaşma yoluyla çözüme ulaştırmıştır.
mt: Previously, Ring's CEO Jamie Siminoff had said the company started in his garage when people couldn't hear the doorbell. He said he made a doorbell that worked with WiFi. Siminoff said sales increased after he appeared on the Shark Tank episode in 2013, when the show's judges refused to fund the start-up. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on the QVC shopping channel. Also, Ring settled a lawsuit with rival security company ADT Corporation.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage. He built a WiFi door bell, he said. Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup. In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC. Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: "PBS dizisi iki düzineden fazla Emmy ödülü kazandı ve yayınlandığı süreyi geçebilen tek programlar Susam Sokağı ve Mr. Rogers' Neighborhood. Programın her bölümü belirli bir kitaptaki bir temaya odaklanır ve sonra o temayı birçok öykü boyunca keşfeder. Her program ayrıca çocukların kütüphanelerine gittiklerinde bakmaları gereken kitaplar için öneriler verir. WNED Buffalo'dan (Reading Rainbow'un ana istasyonu) John Grant, ""Reading Rainbow çocuklara, niçin okumaları gerektiğini öğretti. Okuma aşkı, çocukları kitap okumaya teşvik etti."" dedi. John Grant'ın da aralarında bulunduğu bazı kişiler, hem finansman krizinin hem de eğitimsel televizyon programı felsefesindeki değişimin, dizininin sona ermesine katkıda bulunduğuna inanıyor."
mt: "PBS series won two dozen Emmys and is the only programs to air past its 30th anniversary, Sesame Street and Mr. Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode focuses on a particular book and then explores that theme through many stories. Each episode also offers recommendations for books children should read when they visit libraries. John Grant of WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's main station) said, ""Reading Rainbow taught children why they should read. Reading passion, encouraged children to read books."" Some people, including John Grant, believe that both the financial crisis and the educational television program philosophy contributed to the series' end.
ref: "The PBS show has more than two-dozen Emmy awards, and its run is shorter only than Sesame Street and Mister Rogers' Neighborhood. Each episode of the show would focus on a theme in a specific book and then explore that theme through multiple stories. Each show would also provide recommendations for books that children should look for when they went to their library. John Grant, from WNED Buffalo (Reading Rainbow's home station) said ""Reading Rainbow taught kids why to read,... the love of reading — [the show] encouraged kids to pick up a book and to read."" It is believed by some, including John Grant, that both the funding crunch and a shift in the philosophy of educational television programming contributed to ending the series."

src: Amsterdam şehrinin ve Anne Frank Müzesi’nin yetkilileri, ağaçta mantar enfeksiyonu olduğunu ve devrilmesi an meselesi olduğundan halk sağlığı açısından tehlike oluşturduğunu belirtiyor. Salı günü kesilmesi planlanıyordu ama olağanüstü hal mahkemesi kararıyla kurtarıldı.
mt: Authorities in Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum say the tree has a fungus infection and is in danger of falling, posing a health hazard. It was scheduled to be cut down on Monday, but was saved by a court order.
ref: Officials for the city of Amsterdam and the Anne Frank Museum state that the tree is infected with a fungus and poses a public health hazard as they argue that it was in imminent danger of falling over. It had been scheduled to be cut down on Tuesday, but was saved after an emergency court ruling.

src: Hayvan Kurtuluş Cephesi ve Kraliyet Hayvanlara Karşı Zulmü Önleme Kurumu (RSPCA), bütün Avustralya mezbahalarına CCTV kameralarının kurulmasının tekrar zorunlu olmasını talep ediyor. RSPCA Güney Galler yeni baş komiseri David O'Shannessy, ABC'ye mezbahaların gözetleme ve teftişlerinin Avustralya'da yaygın olması gerektiğini söyledi. Güvenlik kameraları kesinlikle hayvanlarla çalışanlara en büyük önceliğin onların iyiliği olduğuna dair kuvvetli bir mesaj gönderecektir.
mt: The Animal Liberation Front and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are calling for CCTV cameras to be installed again in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA South Wales new chief inspector David O'Shannessy told ABC that surveillance and inspection of abattoirs is widespread in Australia. Security cameras will send a strong message to those working with animals that their top priority is their welfare.
ref: "Animal Liberation and the Royal Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Animals (RSPCA) are again calling for the mandatory installation of CCTV cameras in all Australian abattoirs. RSPCA New South Wales chief inspector David O'Shannessy told the ABC that surveillance and inspections of abattoirs should be commonplace in Australia. ""The CCTV would certainly send a strong signal to those people working with animals that their welfare is of the highest priority."""

src: Bugün Red Lake topluluğunda Jeff Weise ve dokuz kurbandan üçünün cenaze töreninde 21 Mart'ta okuldaki silahlı saldırılarla ilişkili olarak başka bir öğrencinin tutuklandığının haberi yayıldı. Yetkililer bugünkü tutuklamayı doğrulamak dışında pek bir resmi açıklama yapmadı. Ancak, soruşturmayla ilgili bilgisi bulunan bir tanık, Minneapolis Star-Tribune'e, suçlunun Red Lake Tribal Başkanı Floyd Jourdain'in 16 yaşındaki oğlu Louis Jourdain olduğunu ifade etti. Hangi suçlamaların yapılacağı veya yetkilileri bu gence yöneltenin ne olduğu henüz bilinmiyor, ancak federal çocuk mahkemesinde yargılama başladı.
mt: 21 March 2005, a student was arrested in connection with the 2005 Red Lake shootings, which occurred on the same day. Authorities did not make any official statements, but a source close to the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that the suspect was Louis Jourdain, the 16-year-old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known what charges were filed or what authorities were pursuing the teen for, but a hearing was held in federal juvenile court.
ref: News spread in the Red Lake community today as funerals for Jeff Weise and three of the nine victims were held that another student was arrested in connection with the school shootings of March 21. Authorities said little officially beyond confirming today's arrest. However, a source with knowledge of the investigation told the Minneapolis Star-Tribune that it was Louis Jourdain, 16-year old son of Red Lake Tribal Chairman Floyd Jourdain. It is not known at this time what charges will be laid or what led authorities to the boy but juvenile proceedings have begun in federal court.

src: Protestoyu organize edenler Berlin, Köln, Hamburg ve Hannover gibi Alman şehirlerinde yaklaşık 100.000 kişinin geldiğini söyledi. Polis Berlin'de 6500 protestocu olduğunu tahmin ediyor. Protestolar ayrıca Paris, Bulgaristan Sofya, Litvanya Vilnius, Malta Valetta, Estonya Tallinn ve İskoçya Edinburgh ve Glasgow'da gerçekleşti. Londra'da yaklaşık 200 kişi, büyük telif hakkı sahiplerinden bazılarının merkezlerinin önünde protesto düzenledi. Geçtiğimiz ay, Polonya ACTA'yı imzaladığında büyük protestolar yapıldı ve bu sayede hükümet anlaşmayı şimdilik onaylamamaya karar verdi. Hem Letonya hem de Slovakya ACTA'ya katılma süreçlerini erteledi.
mt: 100,000 people were expected to attend protests in Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg and Hanover, according to organizers. Police estimated 6,500 protesters in Berlin. Protests also took place in Paris, Bulgaria Sofia, Lithuania Vilnius, Malta Valetta, Estonia Tallinn and Scotland Edinburgh and Glasgow. About 200 people protested in front of some of the big copyright holders' offices in London. Last month, Poland signed ACTA and large protests were held, which led the government to decide not to ratify the agreement for now. Both Latvia and Slovakia have delayed the process of joining ACTA.
ref: Organisers of the protest said about 100,000 people turned up in German cities such as Berlin, Cologne, Hamburg, and Hanover. In Berlin, police estimated 6,500 protestors. Protests also took place in Paris, Sofia in Bulgaria, Vilnius in Lithuania, Valetta in Malta, Tallinn in Estonia, and Edinburgh and Glasgow in Scotland. In London, about 200 people protested outside some major copyright holders' offices. Last month, there were major protests in Poland when that country signed ACTA, which has led to the Polish government deciding not to ratify the agreement, for now. Latvia and Slovakia have both delayed the process of joining ACTA.

src: "Toplam altı yangına ve dört kişide küçük yanıklara neden olan yaklaşık 60 iPod aşırı ısınma vakası bildirildi. Japonya Ekonomi, Ticaret ve Sanayi Bakanlığı (METI), cihazlarla ilgili 27 kazadan haberdar olduklarını açıkladı. Geçen hafta METI, Apple'ın kendilerine 34 yeni aşırı ısınma olayı hakkında bilgi verdiğini ve şirketin bu olayları ""ciddi değil"" sınıfında gördüğünü duyurdu. Bakanlık, Apple'ın raporu ertelemesini ""gerçekten üzücü"" olarak nitelendirerek yanıt verdi."
mt: 27 iPod overheating incidents have been reported, resulting in six fires and four minor burns. The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) announced that they were aware of 34 new overheating incidents reported by Apple. METI responded to Apple's report that the incidents were "not serious" by calling it "very disappointing."
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

The Japanese Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) announced that they were aware of 34 new overheating incidents reported by Apple. METI responded to Apple's report that the incidents were "not serious" by calling it "very disappointing."
ref: "Around 60 cases of malfunctioning iPods overheating have been reported, causing a total of six fires and leaving four people with minor burns. Japan's Ministry of Economy, Trade and Industry (METI) said that it had been aware of 27 accidents related to the devices. Last week, METI announced that Apple had informed it of 34 additional overheating incidents, which the company called ""non-serious."" The ministry responded by calling Apple's postponement of the report ""truly regrettable."""

src: "Apple CEO'su Steve Jobs sahneye çıktı ve iPhone'u kot pantolonunun cebinden çıkararak tanıttı. 2 saatlik konuşmasında ""Bugün Apple telefonu yeniden icat edecek, bugün tarih yazacağız"" dedi."
mt: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs stepped on stage and pulled an iPhone out of his dress pants pocket to introduce it. In his two-hour presentation, he said ""Today Apple will reinvent the phone, today we will write history.""
ref: "Apple CEO Steve Jobs unveiled the device by walking onto the stage and taking the iPhone out of his jeans pocket. During his 2 hour speech he stated that ""Today Apple is going to reinvent the phone, We are going to make history today""."

src: Mevcut dönem Senatörü ve aynı zamanda Arjantin'in First Lady'si olan Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner dün akşam Buenos Aires'e 50 kilometre (31 mil) uzaklıktaki bir şehir olan La Plata'da başkanlığa aday olduğunu duyurdu. Bayan Kirchner, Buenos Aires ili delege heyetinin bir üyesi olarak senatoya yönelik 2005 yılı kampanyasını başlatırken kullandığı yer olan Arjantin Tiyatrosu'nda başkanlığa aday olmak istediğini açıkladı.
mt: 50 kilometres (31 mi) away in the city of La Plata, current Senator and First Lady of Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her candidacy for the presidency last night. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, where she launched her 2005 Senate campaign as a member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires. Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Aynı zamanda ACMA, videonun internette yayınlanmasına rağmen medya Big Brother'ın web sitesinde barındırılmadığından Big Brother'ın çevrimiçi içerik sansürü yasalarını ihlal etmediğini tespit etti. Yayın Hizmetleri Yasası, internetteki içerikleri düzenler. Ancak bir şeyin internet içeriği olarak kabul edilebilmesi için içeriğin fiziksel olarak bir sunucuda bulunması gerekir.
mt: At the same time, ACMA found that the video was not hosted on Big Brother's website, despite being available on the internet, and therefore did not breach Big Brother's online content censorship laws. The Broadcasting Services Act regulates content on the internet. However, for something to be considered internet content, it must be physically hosted on a server.
ref: The ACMA also found that despite the video being streamed on the Internet, Big Brother had not breached online content censorship laws as the media had not been stored on Big Brother's website. The Broadcasting Services Act provides for the regulation of Internet content, however to be considered Internet content, it must physically reside on a server.

src: "Avustralyalı mali işler sorumlusu ve Liberal parti lideri olarak Başbakan John Howard'ın yerini alması en muhtemel kişi olan Peter Costello, Avustralya'daki bir nükleer enerji endüstrisini destekledi. Bay Costello, nükleer enerji üretimi ekonomik olarak uygun hale geldiğinde Avustralya'nın kullanma girişimlerinde bulunması gerektiğini söyledi. Costello, ""Ticari hale gelirse nükleer enerjimiz olmalı. Yani, ilke olarak nükleer enerjiye itirazımız yok"" şeklinde konuştu."
mt: "The Australian treasurer and likely successor to Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal Party leader, Peter Costello, has supported an Australian nuclear energy industry. Costello said Australia should pursue nuclear energy when it becomes economically viable. He said, ""If it becomes commercially viable, we should have nuclear energy. We don't have an ideological objection to nuclear energy."""
ref: "Peter Costello, Australian treasurer and the man most likely to succeed Prime Minister John Howard as Liberal party leader has thrown his support behind a nuclear power industry in Australia. Mr Costello said that when nuclear power generation becomes economically viable, Australia should pursue its use. ""If it becomes commercial, we should have it. That is, there's no in-principle objection to nuclear energy"" Mr Costello said."

src: Günde sadece on sekiz tane madalya alınma imkanı olduğu için birkaç ülke madalya sahnesine çıkmayı başaramadı. Anna Jochemsen'in dün Super-G kadınlar ayakta sınıfında dokuzuncu bitirmesi ile Hollanda'yı ve aynı etkinlikte onuncu bitiren Katja Saarinen ile Finlandiya'yı içermektedir. Erkekler ayakta Super-G.'yi Avustralyalı Mitchell Gourley on birinci sırada bitirdi, Çek yarışmacı Oldrich Jelinek erkekler oturarak Super-G.'de on altıncı bitirdi. Meksika'dan Arly Velasquez, erkekler oturuşlu Super-G'yi 15. sırada bitirdi. Yeni Zelandalı Adam Hall ise erkekler ayakta Super-G'yi 9. sırada bitirdi. Polonya erkekler görme engelli kayakçısı Maciej Krezel ve rehber Anna Ogarzynska, Super-G.'yi on üçüncü olarak bitirdi. Güney Koreli Jong Seork Park, Super-G. erkekler oturan kategorisini yirmi dördüncü olarak bitirdi.
mt: 18 medals were awarded each day, so a few countries were unable to compete. Anna Jochemsen finished ninth in the women's standing Super-G on Monday, representing the Netherlands and Finland, who finished tenth in the same event with Katja Saarinen. Mitchell Gourley of Australia finished first in the men's standing Super-G, Oldrich Jelinek of the Czech Republic finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G, and Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's standing Super-G. Adam Hall of New Zealand finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Maciej Krezel and Anna Ogarzynska of Poland finished thirteenth in the men's visually impaired Super-G. Jong Seork Park of South Korea finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.
ref: With only eighteen medals available a day, a number of countries have failed to make the medal podium. They include the Netherlands, with Anna Jochemsen finishing ninth in the women's standing class in the Super-G yesterday, and Finland with Katja Saarinen finishing tenth in the same event. Australia's Mitchell Gourley finished eleventh in the men's standing Super-G. Czech competitor Oldrich Jelinek finished sixteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. Arly Velasquez of Mexico finished fifteenth in the men's sitting Super-G. New Zealand's Adam Hall finished ninth in the men's standing Super-G. Poland's men's visually impaired skier Maciej Krezel and guide Anna Ogarzynska finished thirteenth in the Super-G. South Korea's Jong Seork Park finished twenty-fourth in the men's sitting Super-G.

src: "Birmingham Kraliyet Mahkemesi'nde görülen dava 3 Ağustos'ta sonuçlandı. Olay yerinde tutuklanan sunucu, saldırıyı yalanladı ve direği otuz kadar kişi tarafından kendisine atılan şişelerden korunmak için kullandığını iddia etti. Blake ayrıca adalet sürecini bozmaya teşebbüs etmekten hüküm giydi. Yargıç, Blake'e hapse gönderilmesinin ""neredeyse kaçınılmaz"" olduğunu söyledi."
mt: 3 August, the trial at Birmingham Crown Court ended. The server was arrested at the scene and denied the attack and claimed that he used the pole to protect himself from thirty people throwing bottles at him. Blake was also convicted of attempting to obstruct the course of justice. The judge said that Blake's "almost inevitable" sentence was to be sent to prison.
ref: "The trial took place at Birmingham Crown Court and concluded on August 3. The presenter, who was arrested at the scene, denied the attack and claimed he used the pole to protect himself from bottles being thrown at him by up to thirty people. Blake was also convicted of attempting to pervert the course of justice. The judge told Blake it was ""almost inevitable"" he was going to be sent to jail."

src: Bali'de gündemdeki diğer konular arasında dünyanın geriye kalan ormanlarının kurtarılması ve gelişmekte olan ülkelerin daha az kirlenmeye neden olan yöntemlerle büyümelerine yardımcı olacak teknolojileri paylaşmak yer alıyor. BM ayriyeten, küresel ısınmadan etkilenen ülkelerin, küresel ısınmanın etkileriyle baş etmelerine yardımcı olacak bir fonu tamamlamayı ümit ediyor. Bu para, evlerin sele karşı dayanıklı hale getirilmesine, çok daha iyi bir su yönetimi sağlanmasına ve tahıl çeşitliliğine yatırılabilir.
mt: Other topics on the agenda include saving the world's remaining forests and sharing technologies that will help developing countries grow with less pollution. The UN is also hoping to complete a fund to help countries affected by global warming cope with the effects. The money could be invested in making homes more flood-resistant, improving water management and diversifying crops.
ref: Other subjects on the agenda in Bali include saving the world's remaining forests, and sharing technologies to help developing nations grow in less-polluting ways. The U.N. also hopes to finalize a fund to help countries affected by global warming to cope with the impacts. The money could go toward flood-proof houses, better water management, and crop diversification.

src: "Nijerya, zirvenin gerçekleşeceği hafta AfCFTA'ya dahil olmayı planladığını önceden duyurmuştu. AfB ticaret ve sanayi komisyonu üyesi Albert Muchanga, Benin'in üye olacağını duyurmuştu. Komiser, ""Menşe kuralları ve gümrük vergisi imtiyazları koşulları üzerinde henüz anlaşmadık, ancak sahip olduğumuz çerçeve 1 Temmuz 2020'de ticarete başlamak için yeterli"" dedi."
mt: "Nigeria had previously announced it would join the AfCFTA during the week of the summit. Albert Muchanga, a member of the AfB trade and industry commission, had announced that Benin would join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't agreed on the rules of origin and customs duty privileges yet, but the framework we have is enough to start trade on July 1, 2020."""
ref: "Nigeria previously announced it planned to join the AfCFTA in the week leading up to the summit. AU trade and industry commissioner Albert Muchanga announced Benin was to join. The commissioner said, ""We haven't yet agreed on rules of origin and tariff con[c]essions, but the framework we have is enough to start trading on July 1, 2020""."

src: Atlanta'da geçirdiği süre boyunca büyük beğeni kazandı ve yenilikçi kentsel eğitimle tanındı. 2009 yılında Yılın Ulusal Müfettişi unvanını aldı. Ödül sırasında, Atlanta okulları test skorlarında büyük bir gelişim gösterdiler. Az bir zaman sonra Atlanta Journal-Constitution, test sonuçlarıyla ilgili problemleri belirten bir rapor çıkarttı. Rapor, test puanlarının mantıksız bir şekilde hızlı arttığını gösterdi ve okulun içerdeki problemleri fark ettiğini ama bulgulara göre hareket etmediğini iddia etti. Sonraki kanıtlar, 2013'te dava açılmış olan Hall’un diğer 34 eğitimciyle birlikte test evraklarını değiştirdiğini göstermiştir.
mt: 2009, she was named National Superintendent of the Year. During her tenure in Atlanta, she was praised for her innovative urban education. Shortly after, the Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report detailing problems with the test scores. The report showed that the test scores had risen in an unreasonable way and that the school had noticed the problems but did not act on the findings. Subsequent evidence showed that Hall and 34 other educators had changed the test documents in 2013, leading to a lawsuit.
ref: She gained critical acclaim during her time in Atlanta and was recognized for innovative urban education. In 2009 she was awarded the title of National Superintendent of the Year. At the time of the award, Atlanta schools had seen a large improvement on test scores. Shortly after, The Atlanta Journal-Constitution published a report showing problems with test results. The report showed test scores had increased implausibly fast, and alleged the school internally detected problems but didn't act on the findings. Evidence thereafter indicated test papers were tampered with Hall, along with 34 other education officials, was indicted in 2013.

src: Valilik binasının dışında bir bomba patladı. Hükumet binalarının çevresinde üç bomba daha iki saat içerisinde patladı. Bazı raporlarda resmi ölü sayısını sekiz olduğu belirtiliyor, resmi raporlar da 30 kişinin yaralandığını doğruluyor fakat kesin sayılar henüz bilinmiyor.
mt: 1. A bomb exploded outside the governorate building. Three more bombs exploded around government buildings within two hours. Some reports state the official death toll is eight, official reports also confirm 30 people were injured, but the exact numbers are still unknown.
ref: One bomb exploded outside the governor general's office. Three more bombs exploded near government buildings in a period of two hours. Some reports put the official death toll at eight, and official reports confirm that up to 30 were injured; but final numbers are not yet known.

src: 21 yaşındaki Jesus, geçtiğimiz sene 2017 Ocak ayında Brezilya kulübü Palmeiras'tan 27 milyon sterlin olarak bildirilen bir fiyata Manchester City'ye katıldı. O zamandan bu yana, Brezilya bütün müsabakalarda 53 tane maça çıktı ve 24 tane gol attı.
mt: 21-year-old Jesus, who joined Manchester City from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of 27 million pounds in January 2017, has since made 53 appearances in all competitions for Brazil and scored 24 goals.
ref: 21-year-old Jesus joined Manchester City last year in January 2017 from Brazilian club Palmeiras for a reported fee of £27 million. Since then, the Brazilian has featured in 53 matches for the club in all competitions and has scored 24 goals.

src: İslam'ın kutsal şehri Mekke'de bu sabah yerel saatle 10 sularında bir otel yerle bir oldu. Bina, hac arifesinde kutsal şehri ziyarete gelen çok sayıda hacıya ev sahipliği yaptı. Hostelin misafirleri çoğunlukla Birleşik Arap Emirlikleri vatandaşıydı. Ölü sayısı en az 15 ancak bu rakamda artış olması bekleniyor.
mt: 15 people were killed and many more injured when a hotel in the holy city of Mecca collapsed this morning local time at 10 am. The building was hosting many pilgrims who were visiting the holy city during the Hajj. Most of the hotel's guests were citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is expected to rise.
ref: A hostel collapsed in Mecca, the holy city of Islam at about 10 o'clock this morning local time. The building housed a number of pilgrims who came to visit the holy city at the eve of hajj pilgrimage. The hostel's guests were mostly citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is at least 15, a figure which is expected to rise.

src: İslam'ın kutsal şehri Mekke'de bu sabah yerel saatle 10 sularında bir otel yerle bir oldu. Bina, hac arifesinde kutsal şehri ziyarete gelen çok sayıda hacıya ev sahipliği yaptı. Hostelin misafirleri çoğunlukla Birleşik Arap Emirlikleri vatandaşıydı. Ölü sayısı en az 15 ancak bu rakamda artış olması bekleniyor.
mt: 15 people were killed and many more injured when a hotel in the holy city of Mecca collapsed this morning local time at 10 am. The building was hosting many pilgrims who were visiting the holy city during the Hajj. Most of the hotel's guests were citizens of the United Arab Emirates. The death toll is expected to rise.

src: Her ikisi de 1.000 pounddan ağır olan uydular saatte yaklaşık 17.500 mil süratle hareket ederken Dünya’nın 491 mil üzerinde çarpıştı. Bilim insanları, çarpışmanın çok büyük bir patlamaya neden olduğunu söylüyorlar. Hala kazanın ne kadar büyük olduğunu ve Dünyanın nasıl etkileneceğini tespit etmeye çalışıyorlar. ABD Savunma Bakanlığının Birleşik Devletler Stratejik Komutanlığının enkazın izini sürüyor. Çizim analizinin sonucu halka açık bir web sitesinde yayınlanacaktır.
mt: 1,000-pound satellites collided at 17,500 miles per hour, 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the collision caused a huge explosion. They are still trying to determine how big the crash was and how it affected the Earth. The U.S. Defense Department's Strategic Command is tracking the crash's remains. The results of the analysis will be published on a public website.
ref: The satellites, both of which weighed in excess of 1,000 pounds, and traveling at approximately 17,500 miles per hour, collided 491 miles above the Earth. Scientists say the explosion caused by the collision was massive. They are still trying to determine just how large the crash was and how the Earth will be affected. The United States Strategic Command of the U.S. Department of Defense office is tracking the debris. The result of plotting analysis will be posted to a public website.

src: Yaklaşık 2.3 milyar dolarlık bir servete sahip olan Batten, 2008 yılında 400 En Zengin Amerikalı listesinin 190. sırasındaydı. 1950'de Virginia Üniversitesi Sanat ve Bilim Koleji'ni bitirdi ve bu kurumun önde gelen bağışçılarından biri oldu.
mt: The heiress, worth an estimated $2.3 billion, was ranked 190th on the 2008 Forbes 400 list of richest Americans. She graduated from the University of Virginia's College of Arts and Sciences in 1950 and became one of the school's leading benefactors.
ref: Batten was ranked 190th on the 2008 400 Richest Americans list with an estimated fortune of $2.3 billion. He graduated from the College of Arts & Sciences of the University of Virginia in 1950 and was a significant donor to that institution.

src: "Kaliforniya Valisi Arnold Schwarzenegger şiddet içeren video oyunlarının küçük yaştakilere satılmasını veya kiralanmasını yasaklayan bir yasa tasarısını imzaladı. Tasarı, Kaliforniya eyaletinde satılan şiddet içeren video oyunlarının ""18"" ifadesiyle etiketlenmesini zorunlu kılıyor ve reşit olmayanlara satıldıklarında her ihlal için 1000 ABD doları para cezası ile cezalandırıyor."
mt: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed a bill banning the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in California to be labeled ""18"" and imposes a $1000 fine for each violation if sold to minors."
ref: "California Governor Arnold Schwarzenegger signed into law a bill that bans the sale or rental of violent video games to minors. The bill requires violent video games sold in the state of California to be labeled with a decal reading ""18"" and makes their sale to a minor punishable by a fine of $1000 per offense."

src: "İki yetişkin çocukla evli olan Duvall, hikayenin ilişkili olduğu Miller üzerinde büyük bir intiba bırakmadı. Yorumu sorulduğunda Miller, ""Mike duruşma sırasında çok konuşuyor... Ben hazırlanıyordum o yüzden ne dediğini tam olarak duyamadım,"" dedi."
mt: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave much of an impression on Miller. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike was talking a lot during the trial... I was getting ready so I didn't hear exactly what he said,"""
ref: "Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related. When asked for comment, Miller said, ""Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."""

src: "Başbakan Stephen Harper, PYO'da HSYH lideri Jack Layton ile Salı günkü 25 dakikalık toplantı sonrasında hükümetin 'Temiz Hava Yasasını' ikinci değerlendirmesinden önce bir daha gözden geçirilmek üzere tüm tarafların bulunduğu bir komiteye göndermeyi kabul etti. Layton, başbakan ile toplantı sırasında muhafazakarların çevre kanun teklifinde değişiklikler talep ederek Muhafazakar partinin çevre kanun teklifinin ""kapsamlı ve bütüncül bir şekilde yeniden yazımını"" istedi. Federal Hükümet, Tazmanya Devonport'taki Mersey hastanesinin fonunu devralmak için devreye girdiğinden beri, eyalet hükümeti ve bazı federal parlamento üyeleri bunun, kasım ayına kadar gerçekleştirilecek olan federal seçimlerin başlangıcı için yapılan dikkat çekici bir gösteri olmasını eleştirdi. Fakat Başbakan John Howard bu yasanın amacının sadece fazladan 45 milyon Avustralya doları harcayarak, Tazmanya hükümetinin hastane tesislerinin kalitesini düşürmesini engellemek olduğunu söyledi."
mt: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper agreed to send the government's "Clean Air Act" back to a committee of all parties for further review before a second reading, after a 25-minute meeting with the leader of the opposition Jack Layton on Tuesday. Layton asked the Conservatives to rewrite their environment bill "comprehensively and holistically" during a meeting with the prime minister. The federal government has intervened to take over funding for the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, since the state government and some federal parliament members criticized the move as a showy prelude to the federal election, which is scheduled to begin in November. But Prime Minister John Howard said the bill's purpose was to prevent the state government from cutting the quality of its hospital facilities by spending an extra 45 million Australian dollars."
ref: "Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO. Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a ""thorough and complete rewriting"" of the Conservative party's environmental bill. Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November. But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million."

src: Kontamine olmuş evcil hayvan besinlerini yedikten sonra ölen evcil hayvanlardan alınan idrar örneklerinde hem siyanürik asit hem de melamin bulundu. Üniversitedeki araştırmacılar, iki bileşik, böbrek işlevini engelleyebilecek kristaller meydana getirmek için birbiriyle reaksiyona giriyor, dediler. Araştırmacılar, melamin ve siyanürik asit ilavesiyle kedi idrarında oluşan kristalleri gözlemlediler. Kızılötesi spektroskopi (FTIR) ile karşılaştırıldığında bu kristallerin bileşimi, etkilenen evcil hayvanların idrarında bulunanlara uyuyor.
mt: Researchers at the university said the two compounds, which form crystals that can interfere with kidney function, react with each other. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine with melamine and cyanuric acid added. The composition of these crystals, compared with infrared spectroscopy (FTIR), matches those found in the urine of affected pets.
ref: Both cyanuric acid and melamine were found in urine samples from pets that died after consuming contaminated pet food. The two compounds react with one another to form crystals that may block kidney function, researchers at the university said. The researchers observed crystals formed in cat urine by the addition of melamine and cyanuric acid. The composition of these crystals matches those found in the urine of affected pets when compared by infrared spectroscopy (FTIR).

src: "Xinhua, hükümet soruşturmacılarının Çarşamba günü iki adet 'kara kutu' uçuş kaydedicisini kurtardığını bildirdi. Güreşçi arkadaşları da Luna'ya saygılarını sundular. Tommy Dreamer, ""Luna Extreme'in ilk Kraliçesiydi. İlk menajerim Luna iki ayın olduğu bir gecede öldü. Tıpkı onun gibi oldukça eşsiz. Güçlü kadın."" dedi. Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels şöyle söylemiştir ""Luna benim kadar tuhaftı...belki hatta daha fazla...onu seviyorum ve özleyeceğim...umarım daha iyi bir yerdedir."""
mt: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two "black boxes" flight recorders on Wednesday. Wrestler friends also paid their respects to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said, "Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager Luna died in a two-month night. Just like her, very unique. Strong woman." Dustin "Goldust" Runnels said, "Luna was as weird as me...maybe even more...I love her and will miss her...I hope she is in a better place."
ref: "Xinhua reported that government investigators recovered two 'black box' flight recorders on Wednesday. Fellow wrestlers also paid tribute to Luna. Tommy Dreamer said ""Luna was the first Queen of Extreme. My first manager. Luna passed away on the night of two moons. Pretty unique just like her. Strong woman."" Dustin ""Goldust"" Runnels commented that ""Luna was as freaky as me...maybe even more...love her and will miss her...hopefully she's in a better place."""

src: Araba çarptığında evde üç kişi vardı, ancak hiçbiri zarar görmedi. Fakat, şoför başından ağır şekilde yaralandı. Acil kurtarma birimi, şoförü, kırmızı renkli Audi TT'den çıkarırken, kazanın gerçekleştiği yol geçici olarak kapatıldı. İlk olarak, Great Yarmouth'daki James Paget Hastanesi'ne kaldırıldı. Daha sonra Cambridge'deki Addenbrooke Hastanesi'ne nakledildi.
mt: 3 people were in the car when it was hit, but none were injured. However, the driver was seriously injured. The emergency rescue team removed the driver from the red Audi TT, and the road was temporarily closed where the accident occurred. He was first taken to the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was then transferred to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.
ref: Although three people were inside the house when the car impacted it, none of them were hurt. However, the driver sustained serious injuries to the head. The road where the crash happened was temporarily closed while emergency services freed the driver from the red Audi TT. He was initially hospitalised in the James Paget Hospital in Great Yarmouth. He was subsequently relocated to Addenbrooke's Hospital in Cambridge.

src: Oyunlar gündüz saat 10:00'da başladı, hava harikaydı ve erken saatlerde hafifçe çiseleyen yağmurun dışında gün 7's ragbi için harikulade bir gündü. Turnuvanın en iyilerinden Güney Afrika, 5. sıradaki Zambiya karşısında 26-0’lık kolay bir galibiyet elde ederek iyi bir puanla başladı. Diğer güney ülkelerine göre kuşkusuz paslanmış gözüken Güney Afrika nasıl olduysa turnuva devam ettikçe iyileşti. Disiplinli savunmaları, top hakimiyeti becerileri ve mükemmel takım çalışmaları onları öne çıkardı ve zor geçilecek takımın bu olduğu açıkça görülüyordu.
mt: 7's rugby games started at 10:00 am local time, the weather was perfect and aside from a light drizzle early in the day, the day was a perfect one for 7's rugby. The tournament's best team, South Africa, started off with an easy 26-0 win over 5th ranked Zambia. South Africa was clearly rusty, but as the tournament progressed, they improved. Their disciplined defense, ball handling skills and excellent team work put them ahead and it was clear that they were going to be a tough team to beat.
ref: The games kicked off at 10:00am with great weather and apart from mid morning drizzle which quickly cleared up, it was a perfect day for 7's rugby. Tournament top seeds South Africa started on the right note when they had a comfortable 26 - 00 win against 5th seeded Zambia. Looking decidedly rusty in the game against their southern sisters, South Africa however steadily improved as the tournament progressed. Their disciplined defence, ball handling skills and excellent team work made them stand out and it was clear that this was the team to beat.

src: Resmi olarak komünist bir ülke olarak kalmasına rağmen Çin, son otuz yılda bir piyasa ekonomisi geliştirdi. İlk ekonomik reformlar Deng Xiaoping liderliğinde gerçekleştirildi. O zamandan beri, Çin'in ekonomik boyutu 90 kat kadar arttı. İlk defa, geçen sene Çin, Almanya'dan daha fazla araba ihraç etti ve bu sanayi için en büyük pazar olarak, Birleşik Devletler'i gölgede bıraktı. Çin'in GSYİH'si yirmi yıl içinde Birleşik Devletler'den daha büyük olabilir.
mt: Although officially a communist country, China has developed a market economy over the past thirty years. The first economic reforms were carried out under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic dimension has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and eclipsed the United States as the largest market for the industry. China's GDP may be larger than the United States in twenty years.
ref: During the last three decades, despite officially remaining a communist state, China has developed a market economy. The first economic reforms were made under the leadership of Deng Xiaoping. Since then, China's economic size has grown by 90 times. For the first time, last year China exported more cars than Germany and surpassed the United States as the biggest market for this industry. China's GDP could be larger than the United States within two decades.

src: "Hu, ""GSYİH birimi başına karbondioksit salınımlarını 2020'ye kadar 2005 seviyesine kıyasla önemli ölçüde azaltmak için çaba sarfedeceğiz,"" dedi. Sınırlamalar için herhangi bir rakam belirtmedi ve sınırlamaların, Çin'in ekonomik üretim miktarına göre belirleneceğini söyledi. Hu, gelişmekte olan ülkeleri ""önce kirletip sonra temizlemeye çalışma şeklindeki eski yöntemden kaçınmaya"" teşvik etti. Ayrıca, gelişme kademelerinin,mesuliyetlerinin ve kabiliyetlerinin ötesine geçen sorumlulukları üstlenmeleri istenmemelidir diye ekledi."
mt: "Hu said, ""We will make great efforts to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant amount by 2020 compared to 2005."" He did not specify any limits and said the limits would be determined based on China's economic production quantity. Hu encouraged developing countries to avoid ""the old method of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He also added that they should not take on responsibilities that are beyond their development stages, capabilities and responsibilities."
ref: """We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,"" Hu said. He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output. Hu encouraged developing countries ""to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."" He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: "Hu, ""GSYİH birimi başına karbondioksit salınımlarını 2020'ye kadar 2005 seviyesine kıyasla önemli ölçüde azaltmak için çaba sarfedeceğiz,"" dedi. Sınırlamalar için herhangi bir rakam belirtmedi ve sınırlamaların, Çin'in ekonomik üretim miktarına göre belirleneceğini söyledi. Hu, gelişmekte olan ülkeleri ""önce kirletip sonra temizlemeye çalışma şeklindeki eski yöntemden kaçınmaya"" teşvik etti. Ayrıca, gelişme kademelerinin,mesuliyetlerinin ve kabiliyetlerinin ötesine geçen sorumlulukları üstlenmeleri istenmemelidir diye ekledi."

He added that ""they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."""

src: "Tıbbi yardım kuruluşu Mangola, Sınır Tanımayan Doktorlar ve Dünya Sağlık Örgütü, bunun ülkede görülen en kötü salgın olduğunu söylüyor. Sınır Tanımayan Doktorlar sözcüsü Richard Veerman, ""Angola bu zamana kadarki en kötü salgına doğru gidiyor ve Angola'da durum oldukça kötü artmakta"" dedi."
mt: "Medical aid organization Mangola, Médecins Sans Frontières and the World Health Organization say this is the worst outbreak ever seen in the country. Médecins Sans Frontières spokesman Richard Veerman said, 'Angola is heading towards the worst outbreak ever seen and the situation in Angola is getting worse.'"
ref: "The medical charity Mangola, Medecines Sans Frontieres and the World Health Organisation say it is the worst outbreak recorded in the country. Spokesman for Medecines Sans Frontiere Richard Veerman said: ""Angola is heading for its worst ever outbreak and the situation remains very bad in Angola,"" he said."

src: Başsavcılık Müdürü Keir Starmer QC, bu sabah hem Huhne hem de Pryce'nin yargılanacağını bildiren bir açıklama yaptı. Huhne istifa etti ve kabinede yerine milletvekili Ed Davey getirilecek. Davey'in boşalttığı Ekonomi Bakanı koltuğunu milletvekili Norman Lamb'in alması bekleniyor. Huhne ve Pryce 16 Şubat'ta Westminster Sulh Ceza Mahkemesi'ne çıkacak.
mt: The Crown Prosecution Service Director Keir Starmer QC announced this morning that both Huhne and Pryce will be tried. Huhne has resigned and Ed Davey will replace him in the cabinet. Norman Lamb is expected to take the vacant position of Secretary of State for Business, Innovation and Skills. Huhne and Pryce will appear in Westminster Magistrates' Court on 16 February.
ref: The Director of Public Prosecutions, Kier Starmer QC, gave a statement this morning announcing the prosecution of both Huhne and Pryce. Huhne has resigned and he will be replaced in the Cabinet by Ed Davey MP. Norman Lamb MP is expected to take the Business Minister job Davey is vacating. Huhne and Pryce are scheduled to appear at the Westminster Magistrates Court on February 16.

src: "Fransız operasında Camille Saint-Saens tarafından anlatılan hikaye ""hayatı uyuşturucu ve Japonya aşkıyla yazılmış"" bir sanatçıya aittir. Sonuç olarak oyuncular, sahne üzerinde esrar içiyor ve tiyatronun kendisi de izleyicileri katılmaya teşvik ediyor."
mt: "The story told by Camille Saint-Saens in the French opera is that of a "life written with drugs and love for Japan" belonging to an artist. As a result, the actors are smoking hashish on stage and the theater itself is encouraging the audience to participate."
ref: "The story presented in the French opera, by Camille Saint-Saens, is of an artist ""whose life is dictated by a love for drugs and Japan."" As a result, the performers smoke cannabis joints on stage, and the theatre itself is encouraging the audience to join in."

src: "11 No.'lu kozmonot olarak da bilinen Leonov, Sovyetler Birliğinin orijinal kozmonot takımının parçasıydı. 18 Mart 1965'te, uzay gemisinin dışında on iki dakikadan fazla kalarak ilk insanlı araç dışı aktiviteyi (EVA), yani ""uzay yürüyüşünü"" gerçekleştirdi. Çalışmalarından dolayı Sovyetler Birliği'nin en büyük onuru olan ""Sovyetler Birliği Kahramanı"" nı aldı. On yıl sonra, Uzay Yarışı'nın bitişini temsil eden Apollo-Soyuz görevinin Sovyet kısmına önderlik etti."
mt: 11th cosmonaut, Leonov, was a part of the original cosmonaut team of the Soviet Union. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first extravehicular activity (EVA), or "space walk" outside the spacecraft for more than twelve minutes. He received the highest honor of the Soviet Union, "Hero of the Soviet Union" for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo-Soyuz mission, which represented the end of the Space Race.
ref: "Leonov, also known as ""cosmonaut No. 11"", was part of the Soviet Union's original team of cosmonauts. On March 18, 1965, he performed the first manned extravehicular activity (EVA), or ""spacewalk"", remaining alone outside the spacecraft for just over twelve minutes. He received the ""Hero of the Soviet Union"", the Soviet Union's highest honor, for his work. Ten years later, he led the Soviet part of the Apollo–Soyuz mission symbolizing that the Space Race was over."

src: "Kazanın akabinde Gibson bir hastaneye kaldırıldı fakat kısa bir zaman sonra vefat etti. 64 yaşındaki kamyon sürücüsü kazada yaralanmamıştı. Araç aynı gün takriben 12.00 GMT'de kaza yerinden kaldırıldı. Kazanın meydana geldiği yerin yakınlarındaki bir garajda çalışan bir kişi, ""Yolun karşısına geçmek için bekleyen çocuklar vardı ve hepsi çığlık atıyor ve ağlıyordu"" dedi. Hepsi birden, kazanın olduğu yerden geriye doğru koştular."
mt: 64-year-old truck driver was uninjured in the crash. The vehicle was removed from the crash site at around 12:00 GMT. A person working in a nearby garage said, "There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying. They all ran away from the crash site backwards."
ref: "After the accident occurred, Gibson was transported to a hospital but died shortly afterwards. The truck driver, who is aged 64, was not injured in the crash. The vehicle itself was taken away from the scene of the accident at approximately 1200 GMT on the same day. A person working in a garage near where the accident occurred said: ""There were children waiting to cross the road and they were all screaming and crying."" They all ran back from where the accident had happened."

src: Yapılan iş genelde teorikti, fakat program Sagittarius galaksisine yönelik gözlemleri taklit etmek için yazılmıştı. Ekibin aradığı etki, galaksinin karanlık maddesi ile Samanyolu'nun karanlık maddesi arasındaki gelgit güçlerinden kaynaklanacaktı. Tıpkı ayın dünyayı çekip gelgitlere sebep olması gibi, Samanyolu da Yay galaksisine bir kuvvet uygular. Bilim insanları, karanlık maddenin diğer karanlık maddeleri tıpkı normal madde gibi etkilediği sonucuna ulaşabildi. Bu kuram, bir galaksinin çevresinde bulunan karanlık maddenin büyük bir kısmının galaksinin etrafında ışık halkasına benzer biçimde bulunduğunu ve çok sayıda ufak boyutta parçacıktan meydana geldiğini belirtiyor.
mt: The team's work was largely theoretical, but the program was designed to mimic observations of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect they were looking for was a tidal interaction between the dark matter of the Milky Way and the dark matter of Sagittarius. Just as the moon pulls on the Earth and causes tides, the Milky Way exerts a force on Sagittarius. The scientists were able to conclude that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way that normal matter does. This theory suggests that most of the dark matter around a galaxy is arranged in a ring-like structure around the galaxy, and is made up of many small particles.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy. The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter. Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy. The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does. This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.
