src: "Bazı sıkı maliye politikası savunucuları tarafından alaya alır bir şekilde ""Bush's New Orleans Deal"" (Bush'un New Orleans Anlaşması) olarak adlandırılan Katrina Kasırgası sonrası yardım ve yeniden inşa harcamaları ile ilgili anlaşmazlıklar tartışmayı alevlendirdi. Yeniden inşa çabasının liberal eleştirisi yeniden inşa sözleşmelerinin Washington içinden olarak algılanan kişilere verilmesine odaklandı."
mt: 2005 Katrina Hurricane relief and rebuilding expenditures were dubbed "Bush's New Orleans Deal" by some tight-fisted fiscal policy advocates, and the resulting disagreements over the rebuilding efforts focused on the perceived recipients of the rebuilding contracts from Washington insiders.
ref: "The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled ""Bush's New Orleans Deal."" Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders."

src: "Saat sabah 5’te (CET) Dünya'ya varıp atmosfere girdiğinde kapsülün Kuzey Kaliforniya, Oregon, Nevada ve Utah'takiler için tam bir ışık gösterisi yapması bekleniyor. Kapsül gökyüzünde ilerlerken büyük ölçüde kayan bir yıldıza benzeyecek. Kapsülün hızı saniyede yaklaşık 12.8 km olacak, bu da San Francisco'dan Los Angeles'a bir dakika içerisinde gidebilmesi demek. Stardust Dünya'ya en hızlı dönen uzay aracı olma konusunda tüm zamanların yeni rekorunu 1969 Mayıs'ında Apollo X komut modülünün geri dönüşü ile belirlenen bir önceki rekoru egale ederek kıracak. Stardust proje yöneticisi Tom Duxbury, ""Bu, Kuzey Kaliforniya'nın batı kıyısı boyunca hareket edecek ve gökyüzünü Kaliforniya'dan Oregon'un merkezine, Nevada ve Idaho'dan Utah'a kadar aydınlatacak"" dedi."
mt: 5 a.m. CET, the capsule is expected to enter the atmosphere and become a full light show for those in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada and Utah. The capsule will resemble a falling star as it moves through the sky. The capsule will travel at about 12.8 km per second, which means it will take a minute to travel from San Francisco to Los Angeles. Stardust will set a new record for the fastest returning spacecraft, eclipsing the previous record set by the Apollo X command module's return in May 1969. Stardust project manager Tom Duxbury said, "This will move across the west coast of Northern California and light up the sky from California to the center of Oregon, Nevada and Idaho, and Utah."
ref: When the capsule gets to Earth and enters the atmosphere, at about 5am (eastern time), it is expected to put on quite a light show for folks in Northern California, Oregon, Nevada, and Utah. The capsule will look much like a shooting star going across the sky. The capsule will be traveling at about 12.8 km or 8 miles per second, fast enough to go from San Francisco to Los Angeles in one minute. Stardust will set a new all-time record for being the fastest spacecraft to return to Earth, breaking the previous record set in May of 1969 during the return of the Apollo X command module. “It will move over the west coast of northern California and will light the sky from California through central Oregon and on through Nevada and Idaho and into Utah,” Tom Duxbury, Stardust's project manager said.

src: Ohio'daki yetkililer, Pennsylvania'daki Pittsburgh Çocuk Hastanesi'nde çalışan bir doktorun ağırlaştırılmış cinayet suçundan yargılanacağını söyledi. Doktorun annesi Çarşamba günü kendisine ait aracın bagajında ölü bulunmuştu. Dr. Malar Malasubramanian, 29, Cincinnati'nin yaklaşık 15 mil kuzeyindeki bir banliyö olan Blue Ash, Ohio'da, yol kenarında üzerinde bir tişört ve iç çamaşırıyla, ağır ilaç etkisi altında görünür biçimde yatarken bulundu. Polisleri, 150 metre ileride bulunan siyah Oldsmobile Intrigue marka arabasına yönlendirdi. Orada, 53 yaşındaki Saroja Balasubramanian'ın ölü bedenini kanlı battaniyelerle örtülü olarak buldular. Polis, cesedin yaklaşık bir gündür orada bulunduğunu söyledi.
mt: Officials in Ohio said a doctor working at a hospital in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, will be charged with aggravated murder. The doctor's mother was found dead in the trunk of her car on Wednesday. Dr. Malar Malasubramanian, 29, of Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb about 15 miles north of Cincinnati, was found lying on the side of the road in a black Oldsmobile Intrigue with a T-shirt and underwear on, appearing to be under the influence of a heavy drug. Police were directed to the car, about 150 yards away. There, they found the body of 53-year-old Saroja Balasubramanian, covered in bloody blankets. Police said the body had been there for about a day.
ref: A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say. Dr. Malar Balasubramanian, 29, was found in Blue Ash, Ohio, a suburb approximately 15 miles north of Cincinnati lying on the ground beside the road in a T-shirt and underwear in an apparently heavily medicated state. She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

She directed officers to her black Oldsmobile Intrigue which was 500 feet away. There, they found the body of Saroja Balasubramanian, 53, covered with blood-stained blankets. Police said that the body appeared to have been there for about a day.

src: Kurulduğundan beri eBay'in yaptığı en büyük şirket satın alımı bu. Şirket, kar kaynaklarını çeşitlendirmeyi ve Skype'ın güçlü bir konumda bulunduğu Çin, Doğu Avrupa ve Brezilya gibi bölgelerde popülerlik kazanmayı umuyor.
mt: This is eBay's largest company acquisition to date. The company hopes to diversify its revenue streams and gain popularity in China, Eastern Europe and Brazil, where Skype is already well established.
ref: It is the biggest acquisition in eBay's history. The company hopes to diversify its profit sources and gain popularity in areas where Skype holds a strong position, such as China, Eastern Europe, and Brazil.

src: Yaralılar hastaneye nakledildikten sonra kavga sona erdiğinde, kalan diğer mahkumlardan yaklaşık 40 tanesi avluda kaldı ve hücrelerine dönmeyi reddetti. Arabulucular durumu düzeltmeye çalıştı ama hükümlülerin istekleri net değil. 22.00-23.00 MDT saatleri arasında, avludaki mahkumlar tarafından yangın çıkarıldı. Kısa süre sonra, çevik kuvvet ekipmanları giyen görevliler avluya girdi ve hükümlüleri biber gazıyla etkisiz hale getirdi. İtfaiye ekipleri sonunda yangını gece 11:35'te söndürdü.
mt: 40 of the remaining inmates refused to return to their cells when the fight ended and the injured were taken to the hospital. Mediators tried to resolve the situation but the inmates' demands were unclear. At around 22:00-23:00 MDT, inmates in the yard set fire to the yard. Shortly after, officers in riot gear entered the yard and incapacitated the inmates with pepper spray. Fire crews eventually extinguished the fire at around 11:35 pm.
ref: When the fighting ceased after the wounded were transported to the hospital, about 40 of the other remaining inmates stayed in the yard and refused to return to their cells. Negotiators tried to rectify the situation, but the prisoners' demands are not clear. Between 10:00-11:00 pm MDT, a fire was started by the inmates in the yard. Soon, officers equipped with riot gear entered the yard and cornered the inmates with tear gas. Fire rescue crews eventually doused the fire by 11:35 pm.

src: "Televizyonda canlı yayınlanan yorumlar, İranlı üst düzey kaynakların, yaptırımların herhangi bir etkisi olduğunu itiraf ettikleri ilk an oldu. Yaptırımlar, Avrupa birliği tarafından, İran ekonomisinin yurt dışı gelirlerinin %80'ini oluşturan ham petrol ihracatı üzerinde uygulan yasağı ve mali kısıtlamaları içeriyor. OPEC en son aylık raporunda, ham petrol ihracatının günde 2,8 milyon varil ile yirmi yılın en düşük seviyesine düştüğünü söyledi. Ülkenin dini lideri Ayetullah Ali Hameney, petrole olan bağımlılığı, İran'ın 1979'daki İslam Devrimi'nden öncesine dayanan ve ülkenin kendisini kurtarması gereken ""bir tuzak"" olarak nitelendirdi."
mt: "Live televised commentary, the first time an Iranian high-level source admitted that sanctions had any effect. The sanctions, imposed by the European Union, include a ban and financial restrictions on the country's exports of crude oil, which account for 80 percent of its foreign income. OPEC, in its latest monthly report, said crude oil exports had fallen to their lowest level in 20 years at 2.8 million barrels a day. The country's religious leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, called the dependence on oil a "trap" that Iran must break free of, dating back to before the 1979 Islamic Revolution."
ref: "The comments, live on television, were the first time that senior Iranian sources have admitted that the sanctions are having any effect. They include financial restrictions and a ban by the European Union on the export of crude oil, from which the Iranian economy receives 80% of its foreign income. In its most recent monthly report, OPEC said exports of crude had fallen to their lowest level for two decades at 2.8 million barrels per day. The country's supreme leader, Ayatollah Ali Khamenei, has described the dependency on oil as ""a trap"" dating from before Iran's Islamic revolution in 1979 and from which the country should free itself."

src: Fransa'da oy verme geleneksel olarak bir düşük teknoloji deneyimidir: seçmenler bir kabinde yalnız kalırlar. Seçtikleri adayı gösteren önceden basılmış bir kağıt parçasını bir zarfa koyarlar. Yetkililerin seçmenin hüviyetini onaylamasının akabinde seçmen zarfı sandığa atar ve seçmen listesini imzalar. Fransız seçim kanunu, işlemleri oldukça sıkı bir biçimde düzenlemektedir. Oy sandıkları 1988'den beri şeffaftır. Böylece seçmenler ve gözlemciler, oylama başlangıcında oy sandıkları içinde hiçbir zarfın olmadığını ve sandıklara, usulüne uygun sayılan ve onaylı seçmenlerin attığı zarflar dışında herhangi bir zarf eklenmediğini teyit edebilmektedir. Adaylar sürecin her aşamasına tanıklık etmeleri için temsilciler gönderebilir. Akşam, oylar belli prosedürler takip edilerek yoğun gözlem altında gönüllüler tarafından sayılır.
mt: Voting in France is a low-tech affair: voters are alone in a booth. They put a pre-printed piece of paper showing the candidate they have chosen into a ballot box. After the officials have verified the voter's identity, the voter drops the ballot box into the ballot box and signs the voter list. The French election law is very strict in regulating the procedures. Ballot boxes have been transparent since 1988. This allows voters and observers to verify that there are no ballot boxes in the ballot boxes at the start of the vote, and that no ballot boxes other than those of duly identified and verified voters are added to the ballot boxes. Candidates can send representatives to witness every stage of the process. In the evening, the votes are counted by volunteers under intense observation following prescribed procedures.
ref: In France, voting has traditionally been a low-tech experience: voters isolate themselves in a booth, put a pre-printed sheet of paper indicating their candidate of choice into an envelope. After officials verify the voter's identity, the voter drops the envelope into the ballot box and signs the voting roll. French electoral law rather strictly codifies the proceedings. Since 1988, ballot boxes must be transparent so that voters and observers can witness that no envelopes are present at the start of the vote and that no envelopes are added except those of the duly counted and authorized voters. Candidates can send representatives to witness every part of the process. In the evening, votes are counted by volunteers under heavy supervision, following specific procedures.

src: Doğrulanırsa keşif, Allen'ın sekiz yıl süren Musashi arayışını tamamlar. Deniz yatağı haritası çıkarılmasının ardından bir ROV kullanılarak batık bulundu. Dünyanın en zengin insanlarından biri olan Allen'ın servetinin büyük bir bölümünü deniz keşiflerine yatırdığı ve ömür boyu süren savaşa ilgisinden dolayı Musashi'yi bulma arayışına başladığı bildirildi.
mt: If confirmed, the discovery would complete Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. After a seabed map was drawn, the shipwreck was found using a ROV. It was reported that Allen, one of the world's richest men, had invested a large portion of his fortune in ocean exploration and had started the search for Musashi, which he was interested in for a lifetime, after the map of the seabed was drawn.
ref: If confirmed, the find completes Allen's eight-year search for the Musashi. Following seabed mapping the wreck was found using an ROV. One of the world's richest people, Allen has reportedly invested much of his wealth in marine exploration and began his quest to find the Musashi out of a lifelong interest in the war.

src: Televizyon haberleri santralden yükselen beyaz dumanı gösteriyor. Yerel merciler, tesisin etrafında oturanları kapalı mekanlarda durmaları, klimaları kapamaları ve çeşme suyu içmemeleri konusunda ikaz ediyor. Japonya'nın nükleer ajansına göre, tesiste radyoaktif sezyum ve iyodin tespit edildi. Yetkililer bunun, sahadaki uranyum yakıtı taşıyan konteynerlerin yırtılmış ve sızıntı yapıyor olabileceğinin göstergesi olduğunu tahmin ediyorlar.
mt: Television news is showing white smoke rising from the plant. Local authorities are advising people living nearby to stay indoors, turn off air conditioning and not drink tap water. Japan's nuclear agency says radioactive cesium and iodine have been detected at the site. Officials are speculating that this is a sign that containers carrying uranium fuel have been breached and are leaking.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant. Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water. According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant. Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: "Dr. Tony Moll, İlaca Çok Dayanıklı Tüberküloz'u (XDR-TB) Güney Afrika'nın KwaZulu-Natal bölgesinde keşfetti. Bir röportajda, yeni değişkenin ""çok yüksek ölüm oranı nedeniyle, son derece rahatsız edici ve korkutucu"" olduğunu söyledi. Dr. Moll'a göre hastalardan bazılarına böcek hastanede bulaşmış olabilir ve en azından ikisi hastane sağlık çalışanıdır. Enfekte bir kişi 1 yıl içerisinde 10 ila 15 yakın temasa hastalık bulaştırabilir. Ancak, tüberkülozlu insanlar grubunun tamamındaki XDR-TB oranı hala düşük düzeyde. Toplam 330.000 kişiden 6.000'ine Güney Afrika'da belirli bir zamanda bulaştı."
mt: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the new strain of tuberculosis in South Africa's KwaZulu-Natal region. In an interview, he said the new strain was ""very alarming and frightening"" because of its high mortality rate. Dr. Moll said some of the patients may have been infected by a bug in the hospital and at least two were hospital health workers. An infected person can spread the disease to 10 to 15 people in a year. However, the rate of XDR-TB among the tuberculosis group is still at a low level. 6,000 people out of 330,000 were infected in South Africa at a certain time."
ref: "Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal. In an interview, he said the new variant was ""very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."" Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers. In one year's time, an infected person may infect 10 to 15 close contacts. However, the percentage of XDR-TB in the entire group of people with tuberculosis still seems to be low; 6,000 of the total 330,000 people infected at any particular moment in South Africa."

src: NextGen, FAA'nın uçakların daha kısa güzergahlarda uçuş yapmalarına, her sene milyonlarca galon yakıt tasarruf edilmesine ve karbon emisyonlarını düşürülmesine olanak tanıyacağını ileri sürdüğü bir sistemdir. Hava trafik kontrolcülerinin uçakları daha hassas bir şekilde saptamasına ve pilotlara daha doğru bilgi vermesine olanak tanımak için eski yer radarı tabanlı teknolojinin aksine uydu tabanlı teknolojiyi kullanır.
mt: NextGen is a system that the FAA claims will allow aircraft to fly shorter routes, save millions of gallons of fuel per year, and reduce carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology instead of the old ground radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to more precisely track aircraft and provide more accurate information to pilots.
ref: NextGen is a system the FAA claims would allow aircraft to fly shorter routes and save millions of gallons of fuel each year and cut carbon emissions. It uses satellite-based technology as opposed to older ground-radar-based technology to allow air traffic controllers to pinpoint aircraft with greater precision and give pilots more accurate information.

src: Tarihçiler, FBI'ın dairenin başarı yüzdesini artırmak için geçmişte uyguladığı, özellikle çalıntı araba vakaları olmak üzere kolay vakalara odaklanma politikasını eleştirdi. Kongre, 2005 mali yılında müstehcenlik inisiyatifine fon sağlamaya başladı ve FBI'ın 10 yetkilisini yetişkin pornografisi alanına ayırması gerektiğini ifade etti.
mt: 2005 fiscal year, the FBI began funding a pornography initiative, and Congress urged the agency to assign 10 agents to the adult pornography field.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate. Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: JAS 39C Gripen yerel saatle 9:30 (0230 UTC) sularında bir piste çarptı ve patlayarak havalimanını ticari uçuşlara kapalı hale getirdi. Pilot, Filo Lideri Dilokrit Pattavee olarak belirlendi. Yerel basında bir havaalanı yangın söndürme aracının olaya müdahale ederken devrildiği belirtildi.
mt: 9:30 local time (0230 UTC) the JAS 39C Gripen crashed into a runway and burst into flames, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reported that a fire truck was overturned while responding to the incident.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: JAS 39C Gripen yerel saatle 9:30 (0230 UTC) sularında bir piste çarptı ve patlayarak havalimanını ticari uçuşlara kapalı hale getirdi. Pilot, Filo Lideri Dilokrit Pattavee olarak belirlendi. Yerel basında bir havaalanı yangın söndürme aracının olaya müdahale ederken devrildiği belirtildi.
mt: 9:30 local time (0230 UTC) the JAS 39C Gripen crashed into a runway and burst into flames, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reported that a fire truck was overturned while responding to the incident.
ref: The JAS 39C Gripen crashed onto a runway at around 9:30 am local time (0230 UTC) and exploded, closing the airport to commercial flights. The pilot was identified as Squadron Leader Dilokrit Pattavee. Local media reports an airport fire vehicle rolled over while responding.

src: 1960'lar boyunca Brzezinski, John F. Kennedy'nin danışmanı olarak ve sonra da Lyndon B. Johnson yönetimnde çalıştı. 1976 seçimleri sırasında Carter'a dış politika konusunda danışmanlık yaptı, ardından 1977'den 1981'e kadar Henry Kissinger'ın halefi olarak Ulusal Güvenlik Danışmanı (NSA) görevini yaptı. NSA olarak, 1978 Camp David Sözleşmesi; 1970'lerin sonlarında ABD-Çin ilişkilerinin normalleşmesi; 1979’daki İran rehine krizine yol açan İran Devrimi ve 1979’da Afganistan'ın Sovyetler tarafından işgali gibi dünya meselelerinin diplomatik olarak ele alınmasında Carter'a yardımcı oldu.
mt: 1960s, Brzezinski worked as an advisor to John F. Kennedy and then to Lyndon B. Johnson. He advised Carter on foreign policy during the 1976 elections, and then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he helped Carter diplomatically address issues such as the 1978 Camp David Accords; the normalization of U.S.–China relations in the late 1970s; the 1979 Iranian Revolution that led to the Iran hostage crisis; and the 1979 Soviet invasion of Afghanistan.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration. During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger. As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Hırvatistan'ın başkenti Zagreb'de doğan Bobek, Partizan Belgrad'da oynarken meşhur oldu. Takıma 1945'te katıldı ve 1958'e kadar takımda kaldı. Takımda kaldığı süre boyunca 468 maçta 403 gol attı. Kimsenin kulübü için çıktığı maç sayısı veya attığı gol sayısı Bobek kadar yüksek olmadı. 1995'te, Partizan tarihinin en iyi oyuncusu seçildi.
mt: Bobek was born in Zagreb, the capital of Croatia. He became famous while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined the team in 1945 and stayed with them until 1958. During that time he played in 468 matches and scored 403 goals. No other player scored as many goals or played as many matches for a club as Bobek did. In 1995, he was selected as the best player in Partizan's history.
ref: Born in the Croatian capital, Zagreb, Bobek gained fame while playing for Partizan Belgrade. He joined them in 1945 and stayed until 1958. During his time with the team, he scored 403 goals in 468 appearances. No one else has ever made more appearances or scored more goals for the club than Bobek. In 1995 he was voted the best player in Partizan's history.

src: "Hesperonychus elizabethae, Dromaeosauridae ailesinin bir türüdür ve Velociraptor'un kuzenidir. Bu tamamen tüylü, sıcakkanlı yırtıcı kuşun, Velociraptor gibi pençeleriyle iki ayak üzerinde dik yürüdüğüne inanılıyordu. İkinci pençesi daha büyüktü ve ""batı pençesi"" anlamına gelen Hesperonychus ismini almasını sağladı."
mt: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a member of the Dromaeosauridae family and is a cousin of Velociraptor. This completely feathered, warm-blooded predator was thought to have walked upright on two legs like Velociraptor, with its second toe being larger and giving it the name Hesperonychus, meaning "western claw"."
ref: "Hesperonychus elizabethae is a species of the family Dromaeosauridae and is a cousin of Velociraptor . This fully feathered, warm blooded bird of prey was believed to have walked upright on two legs with claws like the Velociraptor. Its second claw was larger, giving rise to the name Hesperonychus which means ""western claw."""

src: Geçen yıl düğünü olan bir çiftin birinci yıl dönümünü kutlamak için yapılan partiye en az 100 kişi katılmıştı. Yetkililer, resmi bir yıl dönümü etkinliğinin daha sonraki bir tarihe planlandığını söyledi. Çift, bir yıl önce Texas'ta evlenerek arkadaşları ve akrabalarıyla kutlama yapmak için Buffalo'ya geldi. Buffalo'da doğan 30 yaşındaki adam, açılan ateş sonucu ölen dört kişiden biriydi fakat karısı yaralanmamıştı.
mt: 100 people attended the party to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple who got married last year. Officials said the official anniversary event was planned for a later date. The couple came to Buffalo to celebrate with their friends and relatives after getting married in Texas last year. The 30-year-old man from Buffalo was one of four people killed in the shooting, but his wife was not injured.
ref: At least 100 people had attended the party, in order to celebrate the first anniversary of a couple whose wedding was held last year. A formal anniversary event was scheduled for a later date, officials said. The couple had married in Texas one year ago and came to Buffalo to celebrate with friends and relatives. The 30-year-old husband, who was born in Buffalo, was one of the four killed in the shooting, but his wife was not hurt.

src: Luno, arızalandığında ve şiddetli rüzgarlar ve dalgalar onu dalgakırana ittiğinde üzerinde 120-160 metreküp yakıt bulunuyordu. Helikopterler on iki mürettebatı kurtardı ve tek yaralanma bir burun kırılmasıydı. 100 metrelik gemi, her zamanki gübre kargosunu almaya gidiyordu ve yetkililer, başlangıçta geminin yükü dökebileceğinden korktu.
mt: 120-160 cubic metres of fuel were on board when it ran aground and was pushed onto a sandbar by strong winds and waves. Helicopters rescued the twelve crew members and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was on its way to collect its usual cargo of fertilizer and officials were initially concerned the ship could sink.
ref: The Luno had 120–160 cubic metres of fuel aboard when it broke down and high winds and waves pushed it into the breakwater. Helicopters rescued the twelve crewmembers and the only injury was a broken nose. The 100-metre ship was en route to pick up its usual fertiliser cargo and initially officials feared the vessel could spill a load.

src: Vautier'in yönetmenlik dışındaki başarıları arasında kendisinin politik sansür olarak gördüğü şeye karşı 1973'te yaptığı bir açlık grevi vardır. Fransız kanunu değiştirildi. Onun Aktivizmi, 15 yaşındayken II. Dünya Savaşı sırasında Fransız Direnişine katıldığı zamana geri gitti. 1998’de yayınlanan bir kitapta kendi hayatına yer verdi. 1960'larda film yönetmenliği öğretmek için bağımsızlığını yeni kazanmış olan Cezayir'e geri dönüş yaptı.
mt: 1973, Vautier went on a hunger strike against what he called censorship. The French law was changed. His activism went back to his joining the French Resistance at the age of 15 during World War II. He wrote a book about his life in 1998. He returned to independent Algeria in the 1960s to teach film directing.
ref: Vautier's achievements outside of directing include a hunger strike in 1973 against what he viewed as political censorship. French law was changed. His activism went back to age 15 when he joined the French Resistance during World War II. He documented himself in a 1998 book. In the 1960s he headed back to newly-independent Algeria to teach film directing.

src: Dört milyonu aşkın insan cenazeye katılmak için Roma'ya gitti. Orada bulunan insan sayısı o kadar fazlaydı ki herkesin St. Peter Meydanındaki cenazeye erişmesi mümkün değildi. Halkın töreni izlemesini sağlamak için Roma'nın çeşitli yerlerine birkaç büyük televizyon ekranı kuruldu. İtalya'nın diğer pek çok kentinde ve dünyanın geri kalan kısmında, özellikle Polonya'da, Roma'dakilere benzeyen ve çok sayıda kişi tarafından izlenen dev ekranlar kuruldu.
mt: 4 million people attended the funeral in Rome. So many people were there that not everyone could access the funeral at St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were set up in various places in Rome to allow the people to watch the funeral. Large screens similar to those in Rome were set up in many other cities in Italy and the rest of the world, especially in Poland, where many people watched the funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral. The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square. Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony. In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Haberlere göre Macbeth Caddesi'ndeki bir daire gaz sızıntısı nedeniyle patladı. Bir komşunun gaz sızıntısı için aramasının ardından gaz şirketinde çalışan bir yetkili olay yerine gidiyordu. Yetkililer geldiğinde, apartman havaya uçtu. Hiçbir ağır yaralanma bildirilmedi, fakat patlama sırasında olay yerinde bulunan en az beş kişi şok belirtileri göstermeleri nedeniyle tedavi edildi. Dairenin içinde kimse yoktu. O sırada yaklaşık 100 sakin, bölgeden tahliye edildi.
mt: According to reports, a house on Macbeth Street exploded after a gas leak. A neighbor's search for a gas leak led a gas company employee to the scene. When the employee arrived, the apartment went up in flames. No serious injuries were reported, but at least five people who were at the scene at the time of the explosion were treated for shock symptoms. No one was inside the apartment at the time. At the time, approximately 100 residents were evacuated from the area.
ref: According to reports, an apartment on Macbeth Street exploded due to a gas leak. An official with the gas company was reporting to the scene after a neighbor called about a gas leak. When the official arrived, the apartment exploded. No major injuries were reported, but at least five people on scene at the time of the explosion were treated for symptoms of shock. No one was inside the apartment. At the time, nearly 100 residents were evacuated from the area.

src: Hayatını kaybedenler 25 yaşındaki Nicholas Alden ve 21 yaşındaki Zachary Cuddeback. Aracı Cuddeback kullanıyordu. Edgar Veguilla kolundan ve çenesinden yaralanırken Kristoffer Schneider'in yüzünden rekonstrüktif ameliyat olması gerekti. Uka'nın silahı beşinci bir adamın kafasını doğrulmuşken başarısız oldu. Schneider devam eden ağrılara, gözde körlüğe, eksik bir kafatası bölümüne ve titanyumdan yeniden yapılmış bir yüze sahip. Schneider, ülkesindeki bir USAF üssünden telekonferans yoluyla ifade verdi.
mt: 25-year-old Nicholas Alden and 21-year-old Zachary Cuddeback were killed. Cuddeback was driving the vehicle. Edgar Veguilla was injured in the arm and jaw while Kristoffer Schneider's face required reconstructive surgery. Uka's gun missed the head of a fifth man. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing portion of his skull, and a titanium-reconstructed face. Schneider gave testimony via teleconference from an USAF base in his country.
ref: The fatalities were Nicholas Alden, 25, and Zachary Cuddeback, 21. Cuddeback had been the driver. Edgar Veguilla received arm and jaw wounds while Kristoffer Schneider was left requiring reconstructive surgery for his face. Uka's weapon failed whilst pointed at a fifth man's head. Schneider has ongoing pain, blindness in one eye, a missing section of skull and a face rebuilt from titanium. Schneider testified via videolink from a USAF base in his homeland.

src: Hem golf hem de ragbi, Olimpiyat Oyunlarına geri dönmeye hazırlanıyor. Uluslararası Olimpiyat Komitesi, sporları dahil etmek için bugün Berlin'deki yönetim kurulu toplantısında oylama yaptı. Rugby, özellikle rugby birliği ve golf, Olimpiyatlara katılması değerlendirilen diğer beş spor arasından seçildi. Oylama sonucunda 2005 Olimpiyat oyunlarına dahil edilmeyen squash karate ve patenli/kaykaylı sporların yanı sıra beyzbol ve softbol da Olimpiyat programına girmeye çalıştı. Seçimin yine de Kopenhag'da Ekim ayında yapılacak olan toplantıda tüm IOC üyeleri tarafından onaylanması gerekiyor.
mt: Golf and rugby are both preparing to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted today at its board meeting in Berlin to include the sports in the Games. Rugby, especially rugby union, was selected from among five other sports that were being considered for inclusion in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller/inline skating, as well as baseball and softball, also tried to get into the Olympic program. The selection still needs to be approved by all IOC members at a meeting in Copenhagen in October.
ref: Both golf and rugby are set to return to the Olympic Games. The International Olympic Committee voted to include the sports at its executive board meeting in Berlin today. Rugby, specifically rugby union, and golf were selected over five other sports to be considered to participate in the Olympics. Squash, karate and roller sports tried to get onto the Olympic program as well as baseball and softball, which were voted out of the Olympic Games in 2005. The vote must still be ratified by the full IOC at it's October meeting in Copenhagen.

src: 24 Eylül 1759'da Arthur Guinness, İrlanda Dublin'de bulunan St James' Gate Brewery için 9.000 yıllık bir kira sözleşmesi imzaladı. 250 sene sonra Guinness, her yıl 10 milyar Euro'nun (14,7 milyar ABD Doları) üzerinde iş yapan global bir işletme haline geldi.
mt: 24 September 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000-year lease for St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness became a global business making over 10 billion Euros (14.7 billion USD) annually.
ref: On September 24, 1759, Arthur Guinness signed a 9,000 year lease for the St James' Gate Brewery in Dublin, Ireland. 250 years later, Guinness has grown to a global business that turns over 10 billion euros (US$14.7 billion) every year.

src: 24 Eylül 1759'da Arthur Guinness, İrlanda Dublin'de bulunan St James' Gate Brewery için 9.000 yıllık bir kira sözleşmesi imzaladı. 250 sene sonra Guinness, her yıl 10 milyar Euro'nun (14,7 milyar ABD Doları) üzerinde iş yapan global bir işletme haline geldi.

src: Fransa'nın doğusunda bulunan Lyon yakınlarındaki bir bataklıkta Pazartesi günü ölü olarak bulunan yaban ördeğinin, insanlar için öldürücü bir kuş gribi türü olan H5N1 taşıyor olduğu onaylandı. Fransa, Avrupa Birliği'nde bu virüse maruz kalan yedinci ülkedir; Avusturya, Almanya, Slovenya, Bulgaristan, Yunanistan ve İtalya'dan sonra. Hırvatistan ve Danimarka'daki şüpheli H5N1 vakaları doğrulanmadı.
mt: On Monday, a wild duck found dead in a marsh near Lyon, France, was confirmed to be carrying the H5N1 strain of avian flu, a deadly virus for humans. France is the seventh European Union country to be affected by the virus, after Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected H5N1 cases in Croatia and Denmark were not confirmed.
ref: The strain of bird flu lethal to humans, H5N1, has been confirmed to have infected a dead wild duck, found on Monday, in marshland near Lyon in the east of France. France is the seventh country in the European Union to suffer this virus; following Austria, Germany, Slovenia, Bulgaria, Greece and Italy. Suspected cases of H5N1 in Croatia and Denmark remain unconfirmed.

src: 2010 depreminden sonra Haiti'ye varan BM barış güçleri, askerlerin kampının yakınlarında başlayan hastalığın yayılmasıyla suçlanıyorlar. Davaya göre, BM kampından gelen atıklar uygun şekilde sterilize edilmedi ve bakterilerin Haiti'nin en büyük nehirlerinden biri olan Artibonite Nehri'nin bir koluna karışmasına neden oldu. Askerlerin gelmesinden önce Haiti 1800'lerden beri hastalıkla ilgili sorunlarla karşılaşmamıştı. Haiti Adalet ve Demokrasi Enstitüsü, Nepal BM barışı koruma birliğinin, hastalığı farkına varmadan Haiti'ye taşıdığını ileri süren bağımsız çalışmalara gönderme yaptı. Hastalık konusunda BM uzmanı olan Danielle Lantagne, salgına muhtemelen barış gücündekilerin neden olduğunu söyledi.
mt: 2010 earthquake relief workers are being blamed for the spread of the disease after it started in the camp near the soldiers' base. The waste from the camp was not properly sterilized and the bacteria ended up in the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest rivers. Haiti had not had problems with the disease since the 1800s. The Haiti Institute of Justice and Democracy cited independent studies that said the peacekeeping force brought the disease to Haiti without knowing it. Disease expert Danielle Lantagne said the disease was probably caused by the peacekeeping force.
ref: UN peacekeepers, whom arrived in Haiti after the 2010 earthquake, are being blamed for the spread of the disease which started near the troop's encampment. According to the lawsuit, waste from the UN camp was not properly sanitized, causing bacteria to enter the tributary of the Artibonite River, one of Haiti's largest. Prior to the arrival of troops, Haiti had not encountered problems related to the disease since the 1800s. The Haitian Institute for Justice and Democracy has referenced independent studies that suggest the Nepalese UN peacekeeping battalion unknowingly brought the disease to Haiti. Danielle Lantagne, a UN expert on the disease, stated the outbreak was likely caused by the peacekeepers.

src: "İrlanda hükümeti durumu düzeltmek için meclis yasasının aciliyeti üzerinde duruyor. Bir hükümet sözcüsü, ""Artık bu kanunun mümkün olan en kısa sürede çıkarılması hem halk sağlığı hem de ceza adaleti açısından önemlidir."" dedi. Sağlık Bakanı, hem ilgili maddelerin geçici yasallığından yararlanan bireylerin refahı hem de şu anda anayasaya aykırı değişikliklerin yürürlüğe girmesinden bu yana verilen uyuşturucuya bağlı mahkumiyetler için endişelerini dile getirdi."
mt: "The Irish government is pushing for the legislation to be passed as soon as possible. A government spokesman said: "It is important for public health and criminal justice that this legislation is passed as soon as possible." The health minister expressed concern about the welfare of individuals benefiting from the temporary provisions of the legislation and the number of convictions for drug offences since the unconstitutional changes came into effect."
ref: "The Irish government is stressing the urgency of parliamentary legislation to rectify the situation. ""It is now important from both a public health and criminal justice perspective that the legislation be enacted as soon as possible"", said a government spokesperson. The Health Minister expressed concern both for the welfare of individuals taking advantage of the temporary legality of the substances involved, and for drug-related convictions handed down since the now-unconstitutional changes came into effect."

src: "Los Angeles Polis Departmanı sözcüsü Christopher Garcia, şüpheli erkek suçlunun vandalizm yerine başkasının arazisine tecavüz sebebiyle soruşturulduğunu söyledi. Tabela fiziksel olarak hasar görmemişti; değişiklik, barış ve kalp işaretleri ile dekore edilmiş siyah muşambalar aracılığıyla ""O"" harfinin değiştirilerek küçük ""e"" harfi olarak okunması amacıyla yapıldı."
mt: "A Los Angeles Police Department spokesman, Christopher Garcia, said the suspect was being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; it was changed by replacing the letter ""O"" with a small ""e"" that could be read as ""peace"" and ""heart"" through black curtains decorated with peace signs."
ref: "Christopher Garcia, a spokesperson of the Los Angeles Police Department, said the suspected male offender is being investigated for trespassing rather than vandalism. The sign was not physically damaged; the modification was done using black tarpaulins decorated with signs of peace and heart to alter the ""O"" to read lowercase ""e""."

src: Karno, kariyerinin zirvesindeyken Modern Education ve King's Glory’de öğretmenlik yapan ve 9.000 öğrencisi olduğu iddia edilen, iyi tanınan fakat tartışmalı bir İngilizce öğretmenidir. Notlarında, bazı ebeveynlerin kaba bulduğu kelimeler kullanıyordu ve derslikte de küfürlü ifadeler kullandığı belirtiliyordu. Modern Education, kendisini yetkisi olmadan otobüslere büyük reklamlar basmakla ve baş İngilizce öğretmeni olduğu konusunda yalan söylemekle suçladı. Ayrıca daha önce telif hakkını ihlal ettiği iddia edilmiş, ancak ceza almamıştır. Eski bir öğrencisi sınıfta argo dil kullandığını, notlarında flört tekniklerini öğrettiğini ve öğrencilerin 'arkadaşı' gibi davrandığını söyledi.
mt: Karno, a well-known but controversial English teacher at Modern Education and King's Glory, where he taught 9,000 students, was at the height of his career. He was accused of posting large advertisements on buses without permission and lying about being the head English teacher. He was also accused of copyright infringement in the past, but was not punished. An old student said he used slang in class, taught flirting techniques in his notes, and acted like a "friend" to students.
ref: Karno is a well-known but controversial English tutor who taught under Modern Education and King's Glory who claimed to have 9,000 students at the peak of his career. In his notes he used words which some parents considered coarse, and he reportedly used profanity in class. Modern Education accused him of printing large advertisements on buses without authorisation and lying by saying that he was the chief English tutor. He has also been accused previously of copyright infringement, but was not charged. A former student said that he 'used slang in class, taught dating skills in notes, and was just like the students' friend.'

src: Filipinli eski bir polis, Filipin'in başkenti Manila'da otobüslerini kaçırarak Hong Kong’lu turistleri rehin aldı. Rolando Mendoza M16 tüfeğiyle turistlere ateş açtı. Çok sayıda rehine kurtarılırken şimdiye kadar en az altı kişinin hayatını kaybettiği de doğrulandı. Arasında çocuk ve yaşlıların da dahil olduğu altı tane rehine de, filipinli fotoğrafçılarla birlikte salıverildi. Sonrasında fotoğrafçılar tuvalete gitmesi gereken yaşlı bir kadının yerine geçti. Mendoza vuruldu.
mt: 6 people were killed and 6 were injured in a hostage situation in Manila, Philippines. A former police officer, Rolando Mendoza, hijacked a bus and took Hong Kong tourists hostage. He opened fire with an M16 rifle. The situation ended when Mendoza was shot.
ref: A former Filipino policeman has kept Hong Kong tourists hostage by hijacking their bus in Manila, the capital of the Philippines. Rolando Mendoza fired his M16 rifle at the tourists. Several hostages have been rescued and least six have been confirmed dead so far. Six hostages, including the children and elderly, were released early, as were the Filipino photographers. The photographers later took the place of an aged lady as she needed the lavatory. Mendoza was gunned down.

src: Roman Katolik ülkeler arasından en büyüğü Brezilya ve Roma Katolik Kilisesi, ülkede aynı cinsiyetle evliliğin yasal hale gelmesine sürekli karşı çıkmıştır. Brezilya Ulusal Kongresi, 10 senedir yasallaştırma konusu üzerinde tartışıyor ve bu tarz medeni evlilikler şimdilik sadece Rio Grande do Sul bölgesinde yasal olarak kabul edilmekte. Orijinal yasa taslağı São Paulo eski belediye başkanı Marta Suplicy tarafından düzenlenmişti. Önerilen yasa, düzeltildikten sonra şimdi Roberto Jefferson'ın ellerinde. Protestocular, Kasım ayında Ulusal Kongre'ye sunacakları dilekçe için 1,2 milyon imza toplamayı umuyorlar.
mt: The largest Roman Catholic country in the world, Brazil and the Roman Catholic Church have consistently opposed same-sex marriage becoming legal in the country. The Brazilian National Congress has been debating the legalization for 10 years and such civil unions are only legal in the Rio Grande do Sul region for now. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo Marta Suplicy. The proposed bill is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson after being amended. Protesters hope to deliver a petition with 1.2 million signatures to the National Congress in November.
ref: Brazil is the largest Roman Catholic country on Earth, and the Roman Catholic Church has consistently opposed the legalization of same-sex marriage in the country. The National Congress of Brazil has debated legalization for 10 years, and such civil marriages are currently only legal in Rio Grande do Sul. The original bill was drafted by former mayor of São Paulo, Marta Suplicy. The proposed legislation, after being amended, is now in the hands of Roberto Jefferson. Protesters hope to collect a petition of 1.2 million signatures to present to the National Congress in November.

src: "Görüntünün ilk beş dakikasında bir rüzgar esmeye başlıyor, yaklaşık bir dakika sonra rüzgar saatte 70 km'ye ulaşıyor... daha sonra yağmur geliyor ama o kadar sert ve büyük ki cildinize bir iğne gibi çarpıyor, daha sonra gökten dolu yağıyor, insanlar panik halinde bağırmaya ve birbirlerinin üstüne çıkmaya başlıyorlar. Kız kardeşimi ve arkadaşını kaybettim. Yolda, insanların üzerlerinden atlayıp itip kaktığı tekerlekli sandalyeli iki engelli vardı."" dedi Armand Versace."
mt: "During the first five minutes a wind starts to blow, about a minute later the wind reaches 70 km/h... then it starts to rain but so hard and big that it hits your skin like a needle, then it starts to hail, people start screaming and pushing each other. I lost my sister and my friend. There were two disabled people in a wheelchair on the road, people were stepping over them and pushing them away."" said Armand Versace.
ref: "Five minutes into the display a wind starts rolling in, about a minute later, the wind is reaching 70km/h... then the rain comes, but so hard and so large that it slaps your skin like a needle, then hail fell from the sky, people panicking and screaming and running over each other. I lost my sister and her friend, and on my way there were two disabled people in wheelchairs, people just jumping over and pushing them,"" Armand Versace said."

src: Tahminciler, Cape Verde adalarının yaklaşık 645 mil (1040 km) batısında konumlanmış olan fırtınanın, herhangi bir kara alanını tehdit etmeden önce dağılması muhtemel, diyor. Fred şu anda saatte 105 mil (165 km/s) rüzgar hızına sahip ve kuzeybatıya doğru ilerliyor. Fred, uydu görüntülerinin doğuşundan beri şimdiye kadar Atlantik'in güney ve doğusunda kayda geçirilen en güçlü tropikal kasırga ve 35°B'nin doğusunda kaydedilen sadece üçüncü büyük kasırgadır.
mt: Forecasters say the storm, located about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde Islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas. Fred is currently moving at 105 mph (165 km/h) to the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical storm ever recorded in the Atlantic south and east of the Cape Verde Islands and the third largest ever recorded east of 35° N.
ref: The storm, situated about 645 miles (1040 km) west of the Cape Verde islands, is likely to dissipate before threatening any land areas, forecasters say. Fred currently has winds of 105 miles per hour (165 km/h) and is moving towards the northwest. Fred is the strongest tropical cyclone ever recorded so far south and east in the Atlantic since the advent of satellite imagery, and only the third major hurricane on record east of 35°W.

src: 802.11n standardı, hem 2,4 Ghz hem de 5,0 Ghz frekanslarında çalışır. Bu da, baz istasyonunda çift telsiz olması halinde 802.11a, 802.11b ve 802.11g ile geriye dönük olarak uyumlu olmasına izin verecektir. 802.11n'nin hızları, 600Mbit/s maksimum teorik iş hacmi üretimiyle öncekilerden önemli ölçüde daha hızlıdır.
mt: 802.11n standard works in both 2.4 Ghz and 5.0 Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backward compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g when the base station has dual radios. 802.11n's speeds are significantly faster than previous standards with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: 802.11n standardı, hem 2,4 Ghz hem de 5,0 Ghz frekanslarında çalışır. Bu da, baz istasyonunda çift telsiz olması halinde 802.11a, 802.11b ve 802.11g ile geriye dönük olarak uyumlu olmasına izin verecektir. 802.11n'nin hızları, 600Mbit/s maksimum teorik iş hacmi üretimiyle öncekilerden önemli ölçüde daha hızlıdır.
mt: 802.11n standard works in both 2.4 Ghz and 5.0 Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backward compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g when the base station has dual radios. 802.11n's speeds are significantly faster than previous standards with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies. This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios. The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Olimpiyat altın madalya sahibinin 100m ve 200m serbest stil ve İngiliz Milletler Topluluğu Oyunlarında üç bayrak yarışında yüzmesi gerekiyordu fakat şikayetlerinden dolayı zindeliği şüphe altında. Yarışmalarda yasaklı olduklarından acısını dindirmesi için ihtiyacı olan ilaçları alamadı.
mt: 100m and 200m freestyle and three Commonwealth Games flag races were required to swim, but was questioned about his health. He could not get the drugs he needed to relieve his pain, as they were banned in the competitions.
ref: The Olympic gold medalist was due to swim in the 100m and 200m freestyle and in three relays at the Commonwealth Games, but due to his complaints his fitness has been in doubt. He has been unable to take the drugs needed to overcome his pain as they are banned from the Games.

src: Amerika Birleşik Devletleri Jeoloji Araştırmaları Kurumu uluslararası deprem haritası, İzlanda'da önceki hafta deprem olmadığını gösterdi. İzlanda Meteoroloji Ofisi, son 48 saat içerisinde Hekla bölgesinde hiç deprem faaliyeti bildirmedi. Faz değişimine neden olan büyük deprem olayları, 10 Mart'ta yanardağın zirvesindeki kalderanın kuzeydoğu tarafında meydana geldi. Dağın eteklerinde herhangi bir volkanik aktivite ile ilgili olmayan kara bulutlar raporlandı. Bulutların varlığı, gerçekten bir patlama olup olmadığı konusunda kafa karışıklığına neden oldu.
mt: The United States Geological Survey's international earthquake map showed no earthquake activity in Iceland last week. The Icelandic Meteorological Office reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla region in the past 48 hours. The large earthquake event that caused the change in phase occurred on March 10 at the summit of the volcano in the north-east side of the caldera. No volcanic activity unrelated to the land was reported at the foot of the mountain. The presence of clouds caused confusion about whether there was an eruption.
ref: The United States Geological Survey international earthquake map showed no earthquakes in Iceland in the week prior. The Icelandic Meteorological Office also reported no earthquake activity in the Hekla area in the past 48 hours. The significant earthquake activity resulting in the phase change had took place on March 10 on the northeast side of the volcano's summit caldera. Dark clouds unrelated to any volcanic activity were reported at the base of the mountain. The clouds presented the potential for confusion as to whether an actual eruption had taken place.

src: İnsansız ay yörüngesi Chandrayaan-1, Ay'ın yüzeyinde saniyede 1,5 kilometre hızla (saatte 3000 mil) hareket eden Ay Çarpma Sondası'nı (MIP) fırlattı ve Ay'ın güney kutbunun yakınına başarıyla indi. Üç önemli bilimsel enstrümanı taşımasının yanı sıra ay sondası, her yanında Hindistan ulusal bayrağını da taşıyor.
mt: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 released the Moon Impact Probe (MIP) at a speed of 1.5 kilometers per second (3,000 mph) moving over the lunar surface, successfully landing near the south pole of the Moon. In addition to the three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the Indian national flag on each side.
ref: The unmanned lunar orbiter Chandrayaan-1 ejected its Moon Impact Probe (MIP), which hurtled across the surface of the Moon at 1.5 kilometres per second (3000 miles per hour), and successfully crash landed near the Moon's south pole. Besides carrying three important scientific instruments, the lunar probe also carried the image of the Indian national flag, painted on all sides.

src: Bu sezon hastalığın ilk vakaları Temmuz'un sonlarında bildirildi. Hastalık domuzlar tarafından taşınır, daha sonra sivrisinekler yoluyla insanlara geçer. Salgın, Hint hükümetininin ciddi etkilenen bölgelerde domuz yakalayıcılarını işe almak, binlerce cibinlik dağıtmak ve böcek ilacı sıkmak gibi önlemler almasına sebep oldu. Hükümet, sağlık kuruluşlarının gelecek yıla hazırlanmasına yardımcı olacak milyonlarca doz ensefalit aşısının da sözünü verdi. Bu yıl tarihsel olarak en çok etkilenen bölgelere yapılacak aşı dağıtım planları, fon yetersizliği ve diğer hastalıklara göre düşük önceliklendirme nedeniyle ertelendi.
mt: The first cases of the disease were reported in late July of this year. The disease is carried by pigs, and then passed to humans through mosquitoes. The outbreak prompted the Indian government to take measures such as hiring hog catchers in serious affected areas, distributing thousands of cibinlik, and spraying insecticide. The government also promised millions of doses of encephalitis vaccine to help health facilities prepare for next year. Plans to distribute the vaccine to the most affected areas this year were delayed due to funding shortages and low prioritization compared to other diseases.
ref: The first cases of the disease this season were reported in late July. The disease is carried by pigs, which then migrates to humans through mosquitos. The outbreak has prompted the Indian government to undertake such measures as deployment of pig catchers in seriously affected areas, distributing thousands of mosquito curtains and spraying pesticides. Several million vials of encephalitis vaccine have also been promised by the government, which will help prepare health agencies for next year. Plans for vaccines to be delivered to the historically most affected areas this year were delayed due to lack of funds and low prioritisation relative to other diseases.

src: Önerilen değişiklik, 2011'de her iki meclisten de geçti. Bu yasama döneminde ikinci cümle ilk olarak Temsilciler Meclisi tarafından silinerek bir değişiklik yapıldı ve ardından Pazartesi günü Senato tarafından benzer bir şekilde geçirildi. Eşcinsel sivil birlikleri yasaklamayı teklif eden ikinci hükmün başarısızlığı gelecekte sivil birliklerin kapısını açabilir. Sürecin sonunda HJR-3, 2015 ya da 2016'da bir sonraki seçilen yasama organı tarafından yürürlükte kalmasına yönelik incelenecek.
mt: 2011, the proposed change passed both houses. This legislative session, the first sentence was removed by the House of Representatives and then passed by the Senate in a similar fashion on Monday. The second sentence, which proposed banning same-sex civil unions, failed, and could open the door to civil unions in the future. In the end, HJR-3 will be reviewed to see if it will be in effect in 2015 or 2016, the next elected legislative body.
ref: The proposed amendment already passed both houses in 2011. A change was made this legislative session when the second sentence was deleted first by the House of Representatives and then was passed in a similar form by the Senate Monday. The failure of the second sentence, which proposes to ban same-sex civil unions, could possibly open the door for civil unions in the future. Following the process, HJR-3 will be reviewed again by the next elected legislature in either 2015 or 2016 to remain in process.

src: Panama Belgeleri, 2016 baharında basına sızan, Panamalı hukuk firması Mossock Fonseca'dan kaynaklı aşağı yukarı on milyon belge için kullanılan şemsiye bir terimdir. Bu belgeler on dört bankanın vergilerden ve diğer düzenlemelerden kaçınmak için zengin müşterilerin milyarlarca dolarlık birikimin gizlemesine yardım ettiğini gösterdi. İngiliz gazetesi The Guardian, bunu başarmak için kullanılan 1200 paravan şirketin yaklaşık üçte birinin Deutsche Bank'ın kontrolünde olduğunu iddia etti. Dünya çapında protestolar oldu, çeşitli yargılamalar gerçekleştirildi ve İzlanda ile Pakistan hükumetlerinin liderleri istifa etti.
mt: 2016 spring, the Panama Papers were leaked, a term used for the approximately ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca. These documents showed that the firm helped wealthy clients hide billions of dollars in offshore accounts to avoid taxes and other regulations. The Guardian reported that about a third of the 1200 shell companies used to do this were under the control of Deutsche Bank. There were protests around the world, various trials were held, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan resigned.
ref: """Panama Papers"" is an umbrella term for roughly ten million documents from Panamanian law firm Mossack Fonseca, leaked to the press in spring 2016. The documents showed fourteen banks helped wealthy clients hide billions of US dollars of wealth to avoid taxes and other regulations. British newspaper The Guardian suggested Deutsche Bank controlled roughly a third of the 1200 shell companies used to accomplish this. There were protests worldwide, several criminal prosecutions, and the leaders of the governments of Iceland and Pakistan both resigned."

src: Hem sivil hem de askeri operasyonlarda kullanılan uçakların bakımının iyi yapılmadığı ve eski bir filoya sahip olan İran'da hava kazaları sıklıkla meydana gelmektedir. Uluslararası yaptırımlar, yeni uçakların satın alınamayacağı anlamına gelmekteydi. Bu haftanın başlarında, bir polis helikopteri kazası üç kişiyi öldürdü ve üçünü daha yaraladı. Geçen ay Ermenistan'a giden bir yolcu uçağının düşmesi sonucunda 168 kişinin hayatını kaybettiği kaza,  İran'ın son yıllarda yaşadığı en büyük uçak felaketiydi. Aynı ay, başka bir yolcu uçağı Meşhed'deki bir pisti aşarak bir duvara çarptı ve on yedi kişinin ölümüne neden oldu.
mt: The country has suffered frequent air crashes in recent years, with poor maintenance of both civilian and military aircraft and a fleet of aging planes. International sanctions meant new planes could not be purchased. Last week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and injured three more. In June, a passenger plane crashed into a wall after overshooting a runway in Meshed, killing 168 people, the country's worst air disaster in recent years. The same month, another passenger plane crashed into a wall after overshooting a runway in Meshed, killing 17 people.
ref: Air accidents are common in Iran, which has an aging fleet that is poorly maintained both for civil and military operations. International sanctions have meant that new aircraft cannot be purchased. Earlier this week, a police helicopter crash killed three people and wounded three more. Last month Iran saw its worst air disaster in years when an airliner heading to Armenia crashed, killing the 168 on board. The same month saw another airliner overrun a runway at Mashhad and strike a wall, killing seventeen.

src: Irak Çalışma Grubu bildirisni bugün 12.00 GMT'de takdim etti. Bu noktada Irak'ta yapılacak eylemlerin; mezhep savaşlarını, artan şiddeti veya kaosa kayışı durduracağını kimsenin garanti edemeyeceği konusunda uyarıyor. Rapor, Amerika Birleşik Devletleri'nde Ortadoğu'ya karşı politika hakkında açık bir müzakere ve bir uzlaşma istemiyle başlıyor. Rapor, Yönetimin Irak politikasının hemen hemen her yönünü yoğun bir şekilde eleştiriyor ve acilen bir yön değişikliği çağrısında bulunuyor. 78 önerisinden ilki, bu yılın sonuna kadar Irak'ın sınırlarının düşman müdahalesine karşı korunması ve komşularıyla diplomatik ilişkilerin yeniden kurulmasını sağlamak için yeni bir diplomatik inisiyatifin alınmasıdır.
mt: 12:00 GMT today, the Iraq Working Group released its report. It warns that no one can guarantee that the actions in Iraq will stop sectarian wars, increasing violence or a slide into chaos. The report begins with an open call for a policy debate and a compromise in the United States about the Middle East. The report criticizes almost every aspect of the Administration's Iraq policy and calls for an immediate policy shift. The first of its 78 recommendations is to initiate a new diplomatic initiative by the end of this year to protect Iraq's borders against hostile incursions and to reestablish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today. It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos. The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East. The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction. First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: "Ansa'ya göre, ""polis, gerçek anlamda bir savaşı ateşleyebileceğinden korktukları birbirini izleyen, birkaç üst düzey suikastten endişe ediyor. Polis, Lo Piccolo'nun üstün olduğunu çünkü Provenzano'nun Palermo'daki sağ kolu olduğunu ve daha büyük deneyiminin ona, Provenzano'nun güç ağlarını sağlamlaştırırken mümkün olduğunca dikkat çekmeme politikasını izleyen eski nesil patronların saygısını kazandırdığını söyledi. Bu patronlar, 1992'de kendilerini Mafya'yla mücadeleye adayan Giovanni Falcone ve Paolo Borsellino'nun hayatına mal olan devlete karşı Riina'nın yürüttüğü savaşa son verdiğinde Provenzano tarafından dizginlenmişlerdi. """
mt: "According to Ansa, police are worried about a series of high-level assassinations that could spark a real war. Police said that Lo Piccolo was superior because Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience had won him the respect of the old generation of bosses who had been tamed by Provenzano's policy of not drawing attention to themselves while strengthening their power networks, which had ended the war against the state that Riina had waged in 1992, when it had cost the lives of Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: "Ansa'ya göre, ""polis, gerçek anlamda bir savaşı ateşleyebileceğinden korktukları birbirini izleyen, birkaç üst düzey suikastten endişe ediyor. Polis, Lo Piccolo'nun üstün olduğunu çünkü Provenzano'nun Palermo'daki sağ kolu olduğunu ve daha büyük deneyiminin ona, Provenzano'nun güç ağlarını sağlamlaştırırken mümkün olduğunca dikkat çekmeme politikasını izleyen eski nesil patronların saygısını kazandırdığını söyledi. Bu patronlar, 1992'de kendilerini Mafya'yla mücadeleye adayan Giovanni Falcone ve Paolo Borsellino'nun hayatına mal olan devlete karşı Riina'nın yürüttüğü savaşa son verdiğinde Provenzano tarafından dizginlenmişlerdi. """
mt: "According to Ansa, police are worried about a series of high-level assassinations that could spark a real war. Police said that Lo Piccolo was superior because Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience had won him the respect of the old generation of bosses who had been tamed by Provenzano's policy of not drawing attention to themselves while strengthening their power networks, which had ended the war against the state that Riina had waged in 1992, when it had cost the lives of Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino."
ref: "According to Ansa, ""police were concerned by a couple of top-level hits they feared might spark a full-blown war of succession. Police said Lo Piccolo had the upper hand because he had been Provenzano's right-hand man in Palermo and his greater experience won him the respect of the older generation of bosses as they pursued Provenzano's policy of keeping as low as possible while strengthening their power network. These bosses had been reined in by Provenzano when he put an end to the Riina-driven war against the state that claimed the lives of Mafia crusaders Giovanni Falcone and Paolo Borsellino in 1992."""

src: Olimpiyatlarda iki altın madalya alan Japon judo sporcusu Hitoshi Saito, 54 yaşında vefat etti. Ölüm nedeni intrahepatik safra kanalı kanseri olarak açıklandı. Salı günü Osaka'da vefat etti. Saito, eski bir Olimpiyat ve Dünya şampiyonu olmasının yanı sıra, öldüğü sırada Tüm Japonya Judo Federasyonu eğitim komitesi başkanıydı.
mt: 54-year-old Japanese judo athlete Hitoshi Saito, who won two gold medals at the Olympics, died of intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died on Monday in Osaka. Saito, who was also the chairman of the All Japan Judo Federation's education committee at the time of his death, was a former Olympic and world champion.
ref: Japanese judoka Hitoshi Saito, winner of two Olympic gold medals, has died at the age of 54. The cause of death was announced as intrahepatic bile duct cancer. He died in Osaka on Tuesday. As well as a former Olympic and World champion, Saito was the All Japan Judo Federation training committee chairman at the time of his death.

src: Iwasaki, seyahati sırasında pek çok olayda başını belaya soktu. Korsanlar tarafından soyuldu, Tibet'te kuduz bir köpek tarafından saldırıya uğradı, Nepal'de evlilikten kaçtı ve Hindistan'da tutuklandı.
mt: Iwasaki was involved in many incidents during his travels. He was robbed by pirates, attacked by a rabid dog in Tibet, ran away from marriage in Nepal, and was arrested in India.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions. He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Gianarlo Fisichella arabasının kontrolünü kaybetti ve starttan çok kısa bir süre sonra yarışı bitirdi. Ekip arkadaşı Fernando Alonso yarışın büyük kısmında öndeydi, fakat pit-stop'tan hemen sonra büyük olasılıkla sağ ön tekerleğinin kötü şekilde sıkışması nedeniyle yarışı bıraktı. Michael Schumacher, yarış süresince çok sayıda kapışmada meydana gelen süspansiyon hasarı nedeniyle Alonso'dan kısa bir süre sonra yarışı bıraktı.
mt: 2006 Italian Grand Prix: Gianarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and retired after a short distance. His teammate Fernando Alonso led the race for most of the time, but retired after a pit-stop due to a likely badly damaged right front suspension. Michael Schumacher retired after a number of collisions during the race due to a suspension damage.
ref: Giancarlo Fisichella lost control of his car and ended the race very soon after the start. His teammate Fernando Alonso was in the lead for most of the race, but ended it right after his pit-stop, probably because a badly tucked right front wheel. Michael Schumacher ended his race not long after Alonso, because of the suspension damage in the numerous battles during the race.

src: Son 3 ayda 80'den fazla tutuklu, resmi olarak suçlama yapılmadan Merkezi Rezervasyon tesisinden serbest bırakıldı. Bu yıl nisan ayında Yargıç Glynn, içeri alınmasının üzerinden 24 saatten fazla süre geçen ve bir mahkeme yargıcından duruşma almayan kişilerin serbest bırakılmasını uygulama olanağına karşı geçici bir kısıtlama emri çıkarttı. Komisyon üyesi eğer hükmedilmiş ise kefaleti belirler ve tutuklayan memur tarafından yapılan suçlamaları resmiyete döker. Suçlamalar daha sonra eyaletin bilgisayar sistemine girilir ve dava buradan izlenir. Duruşma, ayrıca şüphelinin acele yargı hakkı için bir tarih belirler.
mt: 80 or more prisoners were released from the Central Reservations facility in the last three months without formal charges being made. In April this year, Judge Glynn issued a temporary injunction against the practice of releasing people who have been in custody for more than 24 hours without a court hearing. The commission member who sets bail and the arresting officer who makes the charges formally. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system and the case is tracked from there. The hearing also sets a date for the defendant's speedy trial rights.
ref: In the last 3 months, over 80 arrestees were released from the Central Booking facility without being formally charged. In April this year, a temporary restaining order was issued by Judge Glynn against the facility to enforce the release of those held more than 24 hours after their intake who did not receive a hearing by a court commissioner. The commissioner sets bail, if granted, and formalizes the charges filed by the arresting officer. The charges are then entered into the state's computer system where the case is tracked. The hearing also marks the date for the suspect’s right to a speedy trial.

src: Lodin ayrıca yetkililerin, Afganları başka bir seçimin giderlerinden ve emniyet riskinden kurtarma amacıyla ikinci turun iptaline karar verdiğini söyledi. Diplomatlar, Afgan Anayasasında, seçimin son etabının gereksiz olduğunu tespit etmeye yetecek muğlaklık bulduklarını söylediler. Bu durum, seçimdeki son etabın iptal edilmesinin anayasaya aykırı olacağını söyleyen önceki raporlarla çelişiyor.
mt: Lodin also said that officials had decided to cancel the second round in order to spare Afghans the costs and security risks of a second round. Diplomats said they had found ambiguity in the Afghan Constitution that would allow them to declare the second round unnecessary. This contradicted earlier reports that the cancellation of the second round would be unconstitutional.
ref: Lodin also said officials decided to cancel the runoff in order to save Afghans the expense and security risk of another election. Diplomats said that they had found enough ambiguity in the Afghan constitution to determine the runoff as unnecessary. This contradicts earlier reports, which said that cancelling the runoff would have been against the constitution.

src: "Pakistan'ın 1947'de İngiltere’den bağımsızlığını kazanmasından bu yana Pakistan Cumhurbaşkanı, bölge üzerinde neredeyse tamamen özerklik sahibi olan FATA'yı yönetecek ""Siyasi Delegeler"" atıyor. Bu vekiller, Pakistan Anayasası'nın 247. Maddesine göre yönetimsel ve hukuki hizmetler sunma sorumluluğuna sahip."
mt: "Since Pakistan gained independence from Britain in 1947, the Pakistani president has been appointing "Political Agents" to govern the FATA, which has almost complete autonomy over the region. These agents are responsible for providing administrative and legal services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."
ref: "Since Pakistani independence from British rule in 1947, the Pakistani President has appointed ""Political Agents"" to govern FATA, who exercise near-complete autonomous control over the areas. These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

These agents are responsible for providing government and judicial services under Article 247 of the Pakistani Constitution."

src: Ryan Gosling ve Emma Stone'un yer aldığı film, tüm ana kategorilerde aday gösterildi. Gosling ve Stone sırasıyla En İyi Erkek ve Kadın Oyuncu ödüllerine aday gösterildiler. Diğer adaylıklar En İyi Film, Yönetmen, Kostüm Tasarımı, Film düzenleme, Orijinal Müzik, Prodüksiyon Tasarımı, Ses Düzenleme, Ses Miksleme ve Orijinal Senaryoyu içeriyor. Filmden iki şarkı, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) ve City of Stars, en iyi orijinal şarkı için aday gösterildi. Lionsgate stüdyosu 26 adaylık aldı - ve bu diğer tüm stüdyolardan daha fazla.
mt: 2016 Academy Awards nominations were announced on January 14, 2016. La La Land was nominated for 14 awards, the most of any film. Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone were nominated for Best Actor and Actress, respectively. Other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Costume Design, Film Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing, and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, were nominated for Best Original Song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations, the most of any studio.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories. Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively. The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay. Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: NHK ayrıca Niigata ilinde bulunan Kashiwazaki Kariwa nükleer santralinin olağan surette faaliyette bulunduğunu belirtti. Hokuriku Electric Power Co., sarsıntının herhangi bir zarar vermediğini ve Shika nükleer santralindeki 1 ve 2 Numaralı reaktörlerin çalışmasının durdurulduğunu belirtti. Bölgede yaklaşık 9400 evin susuz kaldığı ve yaklaşık 100 evin ise elektriğinin olmadığı belirtildi. Bazı yollar hasar gördü, etkilenen bölgelerde demiryolu hizmetleri aksadı ve Ishikawa bölgesindeki Noto Havaalanı hâlâ kapalı.
mt: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki-Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata Prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. said the earthquake did not cause any damage and that operations at the Shika nuclear power plant's 1 and 2 reactors were not stopped. It was reported that about 9,400 homes were without water and about 100 homes were without electricity. Some roads were damaged, train services were disrupted in affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa Prefecture was still closed.
ref: NHK also reported that the Kashiwazaki Kariwa nuclear power plant in Niigata prefecture was operating normally. Hokuriku Electric Power Co. reported no effects from the earthquake and that the Number 1 and 2 reactors at its Shika nuclear power plant were shut down. It is reported that some 9400 homes in the region are without water and approximately 100 without electricity. Some roads have been damaged, railway service interrupted in the affected areas, and the Noto Airport in Ishikawa prefecture remains closed.

src: Sızdırılan belgenin, Filistin'in, 1967'de gerçekleşen Arap-İsrail Savaşından önceki sınırlara dönülmesini talep ettiği sınır anlaşmazlığından bahsettiği iddia edilmektedir. Kapsanan diğer konular arasında, iki ulus için de kutsal olan gelecekteki Kudüs eyaleti sorunu ve Ürdün Vadisi sorunu yer alıyor. İsrail, anlaşmanın imzalanmasının ardından on yıl boyunca vadide askerlerin bulunmasını talep ederken Filistin bu koşulun yalnızca beş yılla sınırlandırılmasını kabul ediyor.
mt: The leaked document is said to call for a return to the pre-1967 borders in the dispute over the borders, one of the issues covered in the agreement, which included the future status of Jerusalem as holy to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel had demanded that troops be stationed in the valley for ten years after the signing of the agreement, while Palestine accepted a limit of five years.
ref: The document, according to the leak, will refer to the borders dispute, which Palestine wants based on the borders before the 1967 Mideast War. Other topics covered reportedly include the future state of Jerusalem which is sacred to both nations and the Jordan Valley issue. Israel demands an ongoing military presence in the valley for ten years once an agreement is signed while the PA agrees to leave such presence only for five years.

src: "Hong Kong'da doğan Ma, New York Üniversitesi ve Harvard Hukuk Fakültesi'nde okudu ve Amerika'da kalıcı oturma izni sağlayan ""yeşil kart"" sahibiydi. Hsieh, seçim sırasında bir kriz olursa Ma'nın ülkeden kaçabileceğini ima etti. Hsieh ayrıca fotojenik Ma'nın içerikten çok tarz olduğunu savundu. Bu suçlamalara rağmen Ma, Çin anakarası ile daha yakın bağları destekleyen bir tasarıyla kolayca kazandı."
mt: "Ma, who was born in Hong Kong, studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and had a "green card" that allows her to live permanently in the United States. Hsieh implied that Ma could flee the country if there was a crisis during the election. Hsieh also argued that Ma was more about style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma easily won with a design that supported closer ties with mainland China."
ref: "Born in Hong Kong, Ma studied at New York University and Harvard Law School and once held an American permanent resident ""green card"". Hsieh implied during the election that Ma might flee the country during a time of crisis. Hsieh also argued that the photogenic Ma was more style than substance. Despite these accusations, Ma won handily on a platform advocating closer ties with the Chinese mainland."
