src: Tahliyelerle mücadelede yardım almak için birçok ailenin yasal destek istediği öğrenildikten sonra emlak dolandırıcılığı mağdurları için 20 Mart'ta East Bay Topluluk Hukuku Merkezinde bir toplantı yapıldı. Kiracılar başlarına gelenleri anlatmaya başladığında, dolandırılan ailelerin çoğu OHA'den Carolyn Wilson'ın teminat depozitolarını çalıp kasabadan ayrıldığını fark etti. OHA polisinin Oakland'da emlak dolandırıcılığının kurbanı olmuş diğer sosyal konut mülklerini de araştırdığını öğrenen Lockwood Gardens'taki kiracılar, tahliye ile karşı karşıya kalabilecek en az 40 ailenin daha olabileceğine inanıyor.
mt: 20 March, a meeting was held at the East Bay Community Law Center for tenants who had been defrauded. When tenants began to tell their stories, many of the defrauded families realized that Carolyn Wilson of OHA had absconded with their security deposits and moved out of town. Lockwood Gardens tenants learned that OHA police were also investigating other social housing tenants who had been defrauded in Oakland, and they believe that there could be as many as 40 families at least who are facing eviction.
ref: After it became apparent that many families were seeking legal help to fight the evictions, a meeting was held on March 20 at the East Bay Community Law Center for the victims of the housing scam. When the tenants started sharing what had occurred to them, most of the families involved suddenly realized that Carolyn Wilson of the OHA had stolen their security deposits, and skipped out of town. Tenants at Lockwood Gardens believe that there may be another 40 families or more to face eviction, since they learned that OHA police are also investigating other public housing properties in Oakland that may be caught up in the housing scam.

src: Yarıştan sonra Keselowski 2.250 puanla Sürücüler Şampiyonası lideri olmaya devam ediyor. Yedi puan geride olan Johnson, 2.243 puan ile ikinci sırada. Üçüncü sırada, Hamlin yirmi puan geriden geliyor ama bununla birlikte dördüncü sırada bulunan Bowyer'le arasında 5 puan bulunuyor. Kahne ve Truex Jr. sırasıyla 2.220 ve 2.207 puana sahipler, beşinci ve altıncı sıralarda yarışa devam ediyorlar. Geriye dört yarışın kaldığı sezonda  Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth ve Harvick , Sürücüler Şampiyonluğunda ilk onda yer almayı garantiledi.
mt: After the race, Keselowski continued to lead the Drivers Championship with 2,250 points. Johnson was seven points behind in second with 2,243 points. Hamlin was third with 20 points behind, but with five points behind Bowyer, who was fourth. Kahne and Truex Jr. were fifth and sixth with 2,220 and 2,207 points respectively. With four races remaining in the season, Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth and Harvick were guaranteed a spot in the top ten of the Drivers Championship.
ref: Following the race, Keselowski remains the Drivers' Championship leader with 2,250 points. Seven points behind, Johnson is second with 2,243. In third, Hamlin is twenty points behind, but five ahead of Bowyer. Kahne and Truex, Jr. are fifth and sixth respectively with 2,220 and 2,207 points. Stewart, Gordon, Kenseth, and Harvick round out the top-ten positions for the Drivers' Championship with four races remaining in the season.

src: Bunun, insanların Dünya'ya düşen kimyasal olarak doğrulanmış Mars materyali olduğu ortaya çıkan şeyi gözlemlemelerinin tarihte beşinci defa olduğuna inanılıyor. Dünyaya düştüğü bilinen yaklaşık 24.000 meteoritten sadece 34'ünün Mars kökenli olduğu doğrulanmıştır.. Bu taşlardan on beşinin, geçen Temmuz'daki göktaşı yağmuru sırasında düştüğü düşünülüyor. Dünyada çok ender bulunan bazı kayalar altının fiyatının yaklaşık on katına, ons başına 11.000 ila 22.500 ABD dolarına satılmaktadır.
mt: 5th time in history that people have observed a chemically confirmed Martian material falling to Earth. Only 34 of the approximately 24,000 meteorites known to have fallen to Earth have been confirmed to be of Martian origin. It is believed that 15 of these stones fell during the meteor shower in July. Some of these stones are so rare that they are sold for about ten times the price of gold, at $11,000 to $22,500 per ounce.
ref: This is believed to be the fifth time in history that people have observed what turned out to be chemically confirmed martian material falling to Earth. Out of the approximately 24,000 known meteorites to have fallen to Earth, only about 34 have been verified to be martian in origin. Fifteen of these rocks are attributed to the meteorite shower last July. Some of the rocks, which are very rare on Earth, are being sold from US$11,000 to $22,500 per ounce, which is about ten times more than the cost of gold.

src: Formula 1 şampiyonasını yedi kez kazanmasının ardından 2006 senesinde emekliye ayrılan Schumacher, sakat Felipe Massa'nın yerini almaya hazırdı. Brezilyalı sporcu, 2009 Macaristan Grand Prix esnasında yaşanan bir kazadan sonra ciddi bir kafa travması geçirdi. Massa, en azından 2009 sezonunun geri kalanına katılamayacak.
mt: 2006, after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, Schumacher was ready to replace Felipe Massa, who was injured in a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa, at least, could not participate in the rest of the 2009 season.
ref: Schumacher who retired in 2006 after winning the Formula 1 championship seven times, was due to replace the injured Felipe Massa. The Brazilian suffered a serious head injury after a crash during the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix. Massa is due to be out for at least the rest of the 2009 season.

src: Şimdiye kadar AOL, Birleşik Devletler'de yaygın kullanımı nedeniyle IM piyasasını kendi istediği hızda hareket ettirip geliştirebiliyordu. Yürürlükte olan bu düzenlemeyle, bu özgürlük sona erebilir. Yahoo! ve Microsoft servislerinin toplan kullanıcı sayısı AOL'nin müşteri sayısına rakip olacak.
mt: AOL has been able to control the IM market in the United States, and thus has been able to move and develop the market at its own pace. This new regulation may end that freedom. Yahoo! and Microsoft's combined user base will be able to compete with AOL's customer base.
ref: Until now, AOL has been able to move and develop the IM market at its own pace, due to its widespread use within the United States. With this arrangement in place, this freedom might end. The number of users of the Yahoo! and Microsoft services combined will rival the number of AOL's customers.

src: Dün sabah Türkiye’nin Gaziantep şehrinde emniyet müdürlüğünde patlayan bombalı araç, iki polis memurunun ölümüne ve yirmiden fazla kişinin yaralanmasına yol açtı. Valilik, yaralıların on dokuzunun polis olduğunu ifade etti. Polis, saldırıdan sorumlu olduğu iddia edilen bir Daeş (IŞİD) militanından şüphelendiklerini söyledi.
mt: 19 police officers were injured and two police officers were killed when a car bomb exploded outside the police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey, this morning. The governorship said that 19 of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspected a Daesh (ISIS) militant was responsible for the attack.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people. The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers. Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Eski Massachusetts valisi Mitt Romney, Florida Cumhuriyetçi Parti başkanlık ön seçimlerini Salı günü yüzde 46'dan fazla oyla kazandı. Eski ABD Temsilciler Meclisi Sözcüsü Newt Gingrich yüzde 32 ile ikinci oldu. Kazananın büyük avantaj yakaladığı bir eyalet olan Florida’da elli temsilciyi de Romney kazandı ve bu sayede Romney, Cumhuriyetçi Parti adaylığı için ön sıralara geldi.
mt: Former Massachusetts Governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican presidential primary on Tuesday with more than 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. House Speaker Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. Romney won all 50 delegates from Florida, putting him in the front-runner position for the Republican nomination.
ref: Former Massachusetts governor Mitt Romney won the Florida Republican Party presidential primary election on Tuesday with over 46 percent of the vote. Former U.S. Speaker of the House Newt Gingrich came in second with 32 percent. As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

As a winner-takes-all state, Florida awarded all fifty of its delegates to Romney, pushing him ahead as the front-runner for the Republican Party nomination.

src: "Eski Meclis Sözcüsü Newt Gingrich, Teksas valisi Rick Perry ve Kongre Üyesi Michele Bachmann sırasıyla dördüncü, beşinci ve altıncı oldular. Neticelerin gelmesinin ardından Gingrich, Santorum'a övgüsünü sundu fakat adına Iowa'da Gingrich aleyhine olumsuz kampanya reklamları yayınlanan Romney'e sert laflar etti. Perry, ""Bu akşamki parti yönetim kurulu toplantısının sonuçlarını değerlendirmek ve bu yarışta kendim için ileriye doğru bir yol olup olmadığını saptamak adına Teksas'a döneceğim"" şeklinde ifadede bulundu ama daha sonra, yarışta kalacağını ve 21 Ocak Güney Carolina ön seçiminde yarışacağını söyledi. Ağustos'ta Ames Kamuoyu Yoklaması'nı kazanan Bachmann, kampanyasını sonlandırmaya karar verdi."
mt: 4th place went to former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, 5th place to Texas Governor Rick Perry, and 6th place to Congresswoman Michele Bachmann. After the results were announced, Gingrich praised Santorum, but was harsh on Romney, who had aired negative ads against Gingrich in Iowa. Perry said he would return to Texas to "evaluate the results of tonight's party caucus committee meeting and whether or not I will continue in this race" but later said he would stay in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign.
ref: "Former House Speaker Newt Gingrich, Texas governor Rick Perry, and Congresswoman Michele Bachmann finished in fourth, fifth, and sixth place, respectively. After the results came in, Gingrich lauded Santorum, but had tough words for Romney, on whose behalf negative campaign advertisements were aired in Iowa against Gingrich. Perry stated that he would ""return to Texas to assess the results of tonight's caucus, determine whether there is a path forward for myself in this race"", but later said that he would remain in the race and compete in the January 21 South Carolina primary. Bachmann, who won the Ames Straw Poll in August, decided to end her campaign."

src: "İstasyonun web sitesi gösteriyi ""yeni ve çirkin bir bilgisayar kurdu tarzıyla eski okul radyo tiyatrosu!"" olarak tanımlıyor. Şov, başlangıçta sadece, konuşma radyosuna odaklanan ve uzun süredir yayına devam eden bir internet radyo sitesi olan TogiNet Radio'da yayınlandı. 2015'in sonlarında TogiNet, bir yan istasyon olarak AstroNet Radio'yu kurdu. Şov ilk başta Doğu Teksas'ın yerlisi olan amatör ses aktörlerini içeriyordu."
mt: "The station's website describes the show as "a new and ugly computer-generated old school radio drama!" The show, originally broadcast only on TogiNet Radio, a long-running internet radio station that focuses on talk radio, was spun off as a side station called AstroNet Radio in late 2015. The show originally featured amateur voice actors from East Texas."
ref: "The station's web site describes the show as ""old school radio theater with a new and outrageous geeky spin!"" In its early days, the show was featured solely at the long-running internet radio site TogiNet Radio, a site focused on talk radio. In late 2015, TogiNet established AstroNet Radio as a subsidiary station. The show originally featured amateur voice actors, local to East Texas."

src: Bombay saldırganları 26 Kasım 2008'de tekneyle geldiler ve yanlarında el bombaları, otomatik silahlar getirdiler ve Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus'taki kalabalık tren istasyonu ve ünlü Tac Mahal Oteli de dahil olmak üzere birçok hedefe saldırdılar. David Headley'in keşif ve bilgi toplama çalışmaları, Pakistanlı militan grup Laskhar-e-Taiba'dan 10 silahlı kişinin operasyonuna olanak verdi. Saldırı, Hindistan ve Pakistan arasındaki ilişkilerde büyük gerginlik yarattı.
mt: 26 November 2008, the attackers arrived by boat and brought hand grenades and automatic weapons, and attacked several targets including the crowded train station and famous Taj Mahal Hotel, Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus. David Headley's reconnaissance and information gathering work, enabled the operation of 10 armed militants from the Pakistani militant group Lashkar-e-Taiba. The attack caused great tension in relations between India and Pakistan.
ref: The Mumbai attackers arrived via boat on Novemeber 26, 2008, bringing with them grenades, automatic weapons and hit multiple targets including the crowded Chhatrapati Shivaji Terminus railway station and the famous Taj Mahal Hotel. David Headley's scouting and information gathering had helped to enable the operation by the 10 gunmen from the Pakistani militant group Laskhar-e-Taiba. The attack put a huge strain on relations between India and Pakistan.

src: "Nadal'ın Kanadalı sporcu karşısındaki rekoru 7-2. Kısa bir süre öncesinde Brisbane Açık'ta Raonic'e mağlup olmuştu. Nadal, ilk serviste 76 puan kazanarak maçta net %88 puan topladı. Toprağın kralı lakaplı sporcu maçın ardından, ""En önemli turnuvaların son etabında tekrar bulunduğum için heyecanlıyım. Bu turnuvayı kazanmaya çalışmak için buradayım."" dedi."
mt: 7-2, Nadal's record against the Canadian player. Recently lost to Raonic in Brisbane Open. Nadal won 76 points on his first serve and had a net %88 points in the match. After the match, Nadal said, "I'm excited to be back in the final stages of the most important tournaments. I'm here to try to win this tournament."
ref: "Nadal's head to head record against the Canadian is 7–2. He recently lost against Raonic in the Brisbane Open. Nadal bagged 88% net points in the match winning 76 points in the first serve. After the match, King of Clay said, ""I am just excited about being back in the final rounds of the most important events. I am here to try to win this."""

src: Geçtiğimiz hafta Naked News, üç yeni yayınla haber muhabirliği alanında uluslararası dillerdeki yetkinliğini önemli ölçüde artıracağını duyurdu. Halihazırda İngilizce ve Japonca haberler sunan küresel kuruluş; televizyon, web ve mobil cihazlar için İspanyolca, İtalyanca ve Korece programlar yapmaya başlıyor.
mt: Last week, Naked News announced it will significantly increase its international language capabilities in the news reporting field with three new broadcasts. The global organization, which already provides English and Japanese news, is now starting programs in Spanish, Italian and Korean for television, web and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: Geçtiğimiz hafta Naked News, üç yeni yayınla haber muhabirliği alanında uluslararası dillerdeki yetkinliğini önemli ölçüde artıracağını duyurdu. Halihazırda İngilizce ve Japonca haberler sunan küresel kuruluş; televizyon, web ve mobil cihazlar için İspanyolca, İtalyanca ve Korece programlar yapmaya başlıyor.
mt: Last week, Naked News announced it will significantly increase its international language capabilities in the news reporting field with three new broadcasts. The global organization, which already provides English and Japanese news, is now starting programs in Spanish, Italian and Korean for television, web and mobile devices.
ref: Last week, Naked News announced that it would dramatically increase its international language mandate to news reporting, with three new broadcasts. Already reporting in English and Japanese, the global organization is launching Spanish, Italian, and Korean-language programs, for television, the web, and mobile devices.

src: Carpanedo, çarşamba günkü etkinliğin yanı sıra şampiyonluk turnuvasında iki farklı yarışta yer aldı. İlki Slalom yarıştı ve ilkinde yarışı tamamlayamadı. 116 yarışmacının 36'sı aynı kaderi paylaştı. Diğer yarışı Dev Slalom’u ise, 4:41:30’luk süreyle, birinci yarışmacı Avusturyalı Claudia Loesch'ten 2:11:60 dakika daha geç ve dokuzuncu olan Macaristanlı Gyöngyi Dani'den 1:09:02 dakika daha yavaş tamamlayarak kadınlar oturarak kayma grubunu onuncu sırada bitirdi. Kadınların oturma grubundaki 4 kayakçı koşularını tamamlayamadı ve Dev Slalom'daki toplam 117 kayakçının 45'i yarışta yer alamadı.
mt: Carpanedo also competed in two different events in the championship tournament on Wednesday. The first was the Slalom, in which she did not finish. 36 of the 116 competitors shared the same fate. The other event was the Downhill, which she finished in 4:41:30, nine seconds behind the first competitor, Austrian Claudia Loesch, and 1:09:02 minutes behind the ninth Hungarian Gyöngyi Dani. Carpanedo finished tenth in the women's sitting group. Four of the 117 women in the sitting group did not finish the Downhill, and 45 of the 117 women did not compete in the Downhill.
ref: Beyond Wednesday's event, Carpanedo competed in two individual races at the Championships. Her first was the Slalom, where she earned a Did Not Finish in her first run. 36 of the 116 competitors had the same result in that race. Her other race, the Giant Slalom, saw her finish in tenth in the women's sitting group with a combined run time of 4:41.30, 2:11.60 minutes slower than first place finisher Austrian Claudia Loesch and 1:09.02 minutes slower than the ninth place finisher Gyöngyi Dani of Hungary. Four skiers in the women's sitting group failed to finish their runs, and 45 of the 117 total skiers in the Giant Slalom failed to rank in the race.

src: Çarşamba günü, ABD Ulusal Basketbol Birliği (NBA), COVID-19 ile ilgili endişeler nedeniyle profesyonel basketbol sezonunu askıya aldı. NBA'in kararı, bir Utah Jazz oyuncusunun COVID-19 virüsü için yaptırdığı testin pozitif çıkmasını takiben geldi.
mt: On Wednesday, the National Basketball Association (NBA) in the United States suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns over COVID-19. The NBA's decision came after a Utah Jazz player tested positive for the COVID-19 virus.
ref: On Wednesday, the United States' National Basketball Association (NBA) suspended its professional basketball season due to concerns regarding COVID-19. The NBA's decision followed a Utah Jazz player testing positive for the COVID-19 virus.

src: Bugün Günün Oyuncusu Washington Capitals takımından Alex Ovechkin oldu. Washington'un Atlanta Thrashers karşısında elde ettiği 5-3'lük galibiyette 2 gol attı ve 2 asistle katkıda bulundu. Ovechkin'in gecedeki ilk asisti, çaylak Nicklas Backstrom'un maçı kazandıran golüne dönüştü. maçtaki ikinci golü, bu sezon attığı 60. goldü. Böylece, hem Jaromir Jagr, hem de Mario Lemieux'un bu kilometre taşına ulaştıkları 1995-96 sezonundan beri bir sezonda 60 veya daha fazla gol atan ilk oyuncu oldu.
mt: Today's Player of the Day was Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He scored two goals and had two assists in the Capitals' 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night turned Nicklas Backstrom's game-winning goal. His second goal was his 60th of the season. He became the first player since Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux in the 1995-96 season to score 60 or more goals in a season.
ref: Today's Player of the Day is Alex Ovechkin of the Washington Capitals. He had 2 goals and 2 assists in Washington's 5-3 win over the Atlanta Thrashers. Ovechkin's first assist of the night was on the game-winning goal by rookie Nicklas Backstrom; his second goal of the night was his 60th of the season, becoming the first player to score 60 or more goals in a season since 1995-96, when Jaromir Jagr and Mario Lemieux each reached that milestone.

src: "Northern Rock bankası, şirketin İngiltere Hükümeti'nden acil durum desteği aldığının ortaya çıkmasını takiben 2008 yılında kamulaştırılmıştı. Northern Rock, 2007'deki yüksek faizli mortgage krizine maruz kaldığından desteğe ihtiyaç duydu. Sör Richard Branson'un Virgin Group'u banka tarafından kamulaştırılmadan önce reddedilmiş olan bir teklifi vardı. 2010 yılında kamulaştırılırken, mevcut ana cadde bankası Northern Rock plc, ""kötü banka"" olan Northern Rock'tan (Varlık Yönetimi) ayrıldı. Virgin yalnızca Northern Rock'ın ""iyi bankasını"" satın aldı, varlık yönetimi şirketini değil."
mt: 2008, when the bank was nationalised after it became clear it had received emergency support from the UK Government, was the year Northern Rock was nationalised. Northern Rock was hit by the 2007 high-interest mortgage crisis and needed support. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid rejected by the bank before it was nationalised. In 2010, when it was nationalised, the main street bank Northern Rock plc separated from the "bad bank" Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin only bought the "good bank" of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.
ref: The Northern Rock bank had been nationalised in 2008 following the revelation that the company had received emergency support from the UK Government. Northern Rock had required support due to its exposure during the subprime mortgage crisis in 2007. Sir Richard Branson's Virgin Group had a bid for the bank rejected prior to the bank’s nationalisation. In 2010, while nationalised, the current high street bank Northern Rock plc was split from the ‘bad bank’, Northern Rock (Asset Management). Virgin have only purchased the ‘good bank’ of Northern Rock, not the asset management company.

src: Bay Rudd'un Kyoto iklim anlaşmasını imzalama kararının ardından anlaşmayı onaylamayan tek gelişmiş ülke ABD oldu. Avustralya'nın eski muhafazakar hükümeti, Hindistan ve Çin gibi ülkelerin emisyon hedeflerine bağlı kalmazken ülkenin kömür ihracatına çok bağımlı olmasından dolayı anlaşmanın ekonomiye zarar vereceğini söyleyerek Kyoto'yu onaylamayı reddetti.
mt: After Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate change agreement, the US became the only developed country to reject the agreement. Australia's former conservative government said that the agreement would harm the economy because of its dependence on coal exports, while countries such as India and China were not bound to their emission targets.
ref: Mr. Rudd's decision to sign the Kyoto climate accord isolates the United States, which will now be the only developed nation not to ratify the agreement. Australia's former conservative government refused to ratify Kyoto, saying it would damage the economy with its heavy reliance on coal exports, while countries like India and China were not bound by emissions targets.

src: Deneme gözlemlenirken ve verimliliği değerlendirilirken tamamlayıcı böcek ilaçlama denemesinde görev alan avcıların korucular tarafından yakından denetlenmesi planlandı. NPWS ve Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc’in birlikte yaptığı çalışmayla Sportif Avcılık Birliği’nin avcılık programı kapsamında kalifiye gönüllüler ekibe katıldı. Park Koruma Direktör Vekili Mick O'Flynn ve NPWS Mirasına göre, ilk avcılık operasyonu için seçilen dört avcı kapsamlı güvenlik ve talim eğitimi aldı.
mt: The shooters were to be closely monitored by rangers while conducting a supplementary insecticide trial. The trial was conducted by NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc. The shooters were part of the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia's (SSAA) program. Park Protection Director Mick O'Flynn and NPWS Manager said four shooters selected for the first shooting operation had undergone comprehensive security and training.
ref: Shooters in the supplementary pest control trial were to be closely supervised by rangers, as the trial was monitored and its effectiveness evaluated. In a partnership of NPWS and the Sporting Shooters Association of Australia (NSW) Inc, qualified volunteers were recruited, under the Sporting Shooters Association's hunting program. According to Mick O'Flynn, the Acting Director Park Conservation and Heritage with the NPWS, the four shooters selected for the first shooting operation received comprehensive safety and training instruction.

src: "Bu fosil temelinde bu, ayrışmanın moleküler kanıtların düşündürdüğünden çok daha erken meydana geldiğini ifade ediyor. Etiyopya'da yer alan Rift Vadisi Araştırma Servisi'nden araştıman ve araştırmanın eş yazarı Berhane Asfaw, ""Bu, her şeyin geri alınması gerekliliğini ifade ediyor"" dedi."
mt: "This is evidence that the origin of life is much earlier than the molecular evidence suggests. Berhane Asfaw, a researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, said, "This is evidence that everything needs to be reversed."
ref: """Based on this fossil, that means the split is much earlier than has been anticipated by the molecular evidence. That means everything has to be put back,"" said researcher at the Rift Valley Research Service in Ethiopia and a co-author of the study, Berhane Asfaw."

src: Perşembe günkü Tokyo Game Show'un açılış sunumunda Nintendo başkanı Satoru Iwata, şirketin yeni Nintendo Revolution konsolunun kumanda tasarımını açıkladı. Televizyon kumandasını andıran kumandada kullanıcının televizyonunun yakınına yerleştirilerek üç boyutlu konumunu belirleyen iki sensör kullanılıyor. Bu, oyunculara cihazı havada hareket ettirerek video oyunlarındaki hareket ve eylemleri kontrol etme imkanı sunacaktır.
mt: At the opening presentation of this week's Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata revealed the design of the company's new Nintendo Revolution controller. The controller, which resembles a television remote, uses two sensors to detect the user's three-dimensional position relative to their television. This will allow players to control video games by moving the device through the air.
ref: At Thursday's keynote presentation of the Tokyo Game Show, Nintendo president Satoru Iwata unveiled the controller design for the company's new Nintendo Revolution console. Resembling a television remote, the controller uses two sensors placed near the user's television to triangulate its position in three-dimensional space. This will allow players to control actions and movements in video games by moving the device through the air.

src: Öncesinde Çin haber ajansı Xinhua bir uçağın kaçırıldığını haber verdi. Sonraki raporlar uçağın bir bomba tehditi aldığını ve Afganistan'a geri çevrilip Kandahar'a indiğini bildirmiştir. İlk belirlemelere göre, uçak Urumçi'ye acil iniş talebinin reddedilmesinden sonra yeniden Afganistan'a yönlendi.
mt: Earlier, Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane was hijacked. Subsequent reports said the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after receiving a bomb threat and landed in Kandahar. Initial reports indicate the plane was denied an emergency landing in Urumqi and was redirected back to Afghanistan.
ref: Earlier the Chinese news agency Xinhua reported a plane to be hijacked. Later reports then stated the plane received a bomb threat and was diverted back to Afghanistan, landing in Kandahar. The early reports say the plane was diverted back to Afghanistan after being denied an emergency landing in Ürümqi.

src: "İsveç Akademisi Nobel Edebiyat Komitesi'nin daimi sekreteri Sara Danius, İsveç'teki Sveriges Radyosu'ndaki bir radyo programında, komitenin 2016 Nobel Edebiyat Ödülü'nü kazanma konusunda Bob Dylan'a doğrudan ulaşamadığını, ona ulaşma çabalarından vazgeçtiğini duyurdu. Danius dedi ki, ""Şu anda hiçbir şey yapmıyoruz. En yakın iş ortağını aradım ve e-postalar yolladım, çok samimi cevaplar aldım. Şu an için bu ziyadesiyle kafi."""
mt: 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature winner Bob Dylan has not been directly contacted by the Swedish Academy's permanent secretary Sara Danius, who announced on a radio program in Sweden that the committee has given up trying to reach him. Danius said, "We're not doing anything right now. I've reached out to his closest associate and sent emails, and I've gotten very friendly responses. For now, this is plenty."
ref: "On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him. Danius said, ""Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."""

src: "ABD Başkanı George W. Bush, açıklamayı olumlu karşıladı. Bush'un sözcüsü Gordon Johndroe Kuzey Kore'nin bu vaadini ""Kore yarımadasında kanıtlanabilir nükleer silahsızlandırmayı sağlama yolunda büyük bir adım"" olarak niteledi."
mt: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush's spokesman Gordon Johndroe called the pledge ""a big step toward verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula""."
ref: "U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement. Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge ""a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."""

src: "Słania 1956'da İsveç'e taşındı ve üç yıl sonra İsveç Postanesi için çalışmaya başladı ve baş oymacı oldu. İsveç ve diğer 28 ülke için 1.000'den fazla pul imal etti. Eserleri öylesine saygın kalite ve detaya sahiptir ki, filatelistler arasında çok az sayıdaki ""ünlü"" kişiden biridir. Bazı kişilerin tek uzmanlık alanı onun eserlerini toplamaktır. 1000. pulu, 2000 yılında David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl tarafından Guinness Rekorlar Kitabı'na girmiş olan muazzam ""İsveç Krallarının Büyük İşleri"" idi. Ek olarak, Kanada'nın yeni 5 ve 100 dolarlık banknotlarının ön yüzünde bulunan Başbakanlık portreleri de dahil olmak üzere, birçok ülke için banknot gravürleri üzerine çalıştı."
mt: 1956'da İsveç'e taşındı ve üç yıl sonra İsveç Postanesi için çalışmaya başladı ve baş oymacı oldu. İsveç ve diğer 28 ülke için 1.000'den fazla pul imal etti. Eserleri öylesine saygın kalite ve detaya sahiptir ki, filatelistler arasında çok az sayıdaki ""ünlü"" kişiden biridir. Bazı kişilerin tek uzmanlık alanı onun eserlerini toplamaktır. 1000. pulu, 2000 yılında David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl tarafından Guinness Rekorlar Kitabı'na girmiş olan muazzam ""İsveç Krallarının Büyük İşleri"" idi. Ek olarak, Kanada'nın yeni 5 ve 100 dolarlık banknotlarının ön yüzünde bulunan Başbakanlık portreleri de dahil olmak üzere, birçok ülke için banknot gravürleri üzerine çalıştı.
ref: "In 1956 Słania moved to Sweden, where three years later he began work for the Swedish Post Office and became their chief engraver. He produced over 1,000 stamps for Sweden and 28 other countries. His work is of such recognized quality and detail that he is one of the very few ""household names"" among philatelists. Some specialize in collecting his work alone. His 1,000th stamp was the magnificent ""Great Deeds by Swedish Kings"" by David Klöcker Ehrenstrahl in 2000, which is listed in the Guinness Book of World Records. He was also engaged in engraving banknotes for many countries, recent examples of his work including the Prime Ministerial portraits on the front of the new Canadian $5 and $100 bills."

src: Alaska, Fairbanks'in Güneyinde binlerce varil ham petrolün dışarı akmasının ardından Trans-Alaska Boru Hattı Sistemi'nin 800 millik bölümü kapatıldı. Rutin bir yangın kontrol sistemi testinin ardından meydana gelen elektrik kesintisi tahliye vanalarının açılmasına ve Fort Greely pompa istasyonu 9 yakınlarında ham petrol taşmasına neden oldu. Vanaların açılması, sisteme basınç tahliyesi fırsatı verdi ve yağ, bir ped üzerinde, 55.000 varil (2,3 milyon galon) alabilen bir tanka aktı. Çarşamba öğleden sonra, muhtemelen deponun içindeki termal genişleme nedeniyle depo havalandırması hala sızdırıyordu. 104.500 varil depolama hacmine sahip tankların altındaki bir ikincil muhafaza alanı daha tam hacimle doldurulmamıştı.
mt: 800-mile section of Trans-Alaska Pipeline System shut down after thousands of barrels of crude oil leaked out near Fort Greely pump station 9. Routine fire control system test caused power outage that opened relief valves and allowed oil to flow into a 55,000-barrel (2.3-million-gallon) tank. On Wednesday afternoon, the tank was still leaking due to thermal expansion in the tank. A secondary containment area under the tank was not yet filled to full capacity.
ref: 800 miles of the Trans-Alaska Pipeline System were closed down following a spill of thousands of barrels of crude oil south of Fairbanks, Alaska. A power failure following a routine fire-command system test caused relief valves to open and crude oil overflowed near the Fort Greely pump station 9. The valves opening allowed a pressure release for the system and oil flowed on a pad to a tank that can hold 55,000 barrels (2.3 million gallons). As of Wednesday afternoon, the tank vents were still leaking probably from thermal expansion inside the tank. Another secondary containment area below the tanks capable of holding 104,500 barrels was not yet filled to capacity.

src: ABD Mühendisler Birliği, 6 inçlik yağışın daha önce zarar gören setleri aşabileceğine ihtimal vermiştir. Katrina Kasırgası sırasında 20 fit yüksekliğe kadar su basması yaşayan Dokuzuncu Koğuş, şu anda yakındaki su setinin aşılması nedeniyle bel hizasına kadar su içindedir. Su 100 fit genişlikteki bir kesitten setin üzerine dökülüyor.
mt: 6 inches of rain could overwhelm the damaged levees, the American Society of Civil Engineers has said. The Ninth Ward, which was flooded to a height of 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is now up to its chest in water from a nearby flood set that has been overwhelmed. The water is being poured into a 100-foot-wide breach in the levee.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees. The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped. Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Hamilton, Howard Üniversite Hastanesi'nin hastayı stabil bir şekilde kabul ettiğini doğruladı. Hasta, bazı Ebola virüs vakalarının ortaya çıktığı Nijerya'da bulunmuştu. Hastane, diğer insanların muhtemel enfeksiyonunu önlemek için hastayı diğerlerinden tecrit etmeyi içeren bir enfeksiyon kontrol protokolü izledi.
mt: Hamilton, Howard University Hospital confirmed that the patient was accepted in stable condition. The patient had been in Nigeria, where some Ebola virus cases had been reported. The hospital followed an infection control protocol that isolated the patient from others to prevent possible infection.
ref: Hamilton confirmed Howard University Hospital admitted the patient in stable condition. The patient had been to Nigeria, where some cases of the Ebola virus have occurred. The hospital has followed protocol for infection control, including separating the patient from others to prevent possible infection of others.

src: Proteinleri oluşturan ve yaşama el verebilecek organik maddelerle birlikte dünyaya su getiren kaynak kuyruklu yıldızlar olabilir. Bilim insanları, kuyruklu yıldızların uzun zaman önce Dünya ile çarpışması nedeniyle gezegenlerin, özellikle de Dünya'nın nasıl oluştuğunu anlamayı umuyorlar.
mt: Comets may have brought organic matter and the building blocks of proteins that could have given life to Earth. Scientists hope to understand how planets, especially Earth, formed by studying the impact of comets with the planets long ago.
ref: Comets may possibly have been a source of water delivery to the earth along with organic matter that can form proteins and support life. Scientists hope to understand how planets form, especially how the Earth formed, since comets collided with the Earth long ago.

src: Yetkili makamlar tehdidin güvenirliğinden emin olamazken, Maryland Ulaşım Bürosu, FBI'ın uyarısı ile kapatma işlemi yaptı. Tünel girişlerini kapatmak için damperli kamyonlar kullanıldı ve şoförlerin yolunu değiştirmek için 80 polis hazır edildi. Şehrin alternatif rotası olan çevre yolunda yoğun trafik gecikmeleri bildirilmedi.
mt: While officials could not confirm the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportation Authority closed the tunnel in response to the FBI warning. Dump trucks were used to block the tunnel entrances and 80 police officers were on standby to change the drivers' route. No traffic delays were reported on the city's alternative route, the beltway.
ref: While authorities are unsure of the credibility of the threat, the Maryland Transportaion Authority made the closure with the urging of the FBI. Dump trucks were used to block tube entrances and assistance of 80 police were on hand to direct motorists to detours. There were no heavy traffic delays reported on the beltway, the city's alternate route.

src: "Fotoğrafçı, Ronald Reagan UCLA Tıp Merkezi'ne aktarıldı ve orada hayatını kaybetti. 20li yaşlarda olduğu bildirildi. Bieber yaptığı açıklamada, ""Bu trajik kazada bulunmamış veya kazaya direkt olarak karışmamış olsam da kurbanın ailesine sabırlar diliyorum."" dedi. Eğlence haberleri web sitesi TMZ'ye göre fotoğrafçı aracını Sepulveda Bulvarı'nın öteki tarafında durdurmuş ve polis çevirmesinin fotoğraflarını çekmeye çalışmış, daha sonra yolun karşısına geçip devam ederek Kaliforniya Otoyol Devriye polis memurunun trafiği durdurup onu iki kez geriye dönmesini emretmesine neden olmuştur. Polise göre, fotoğrafçıya çarpan aracın şoförünün cezai kovuşturma ile yüzyüze gelme ihtimali düşük."
mt: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center and died there. He was in his 20s, according to Bieber. In a statement, Bieber said, "While I was not at the scene of this tragic accident, my heart is with the family. He was a kind soul with an incredible instinct for capturing people in their most authentic moments. I am deeply saddened by the loss of such a remarkable human being. He will be missed." According to entertainment news website TMZ, the photographer had stopped his car on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and was trying to take pictures of the police officer's traffic stop when he was hit by the car. The photographer then crossed the street and continued driving, causing the officer to stop traffic and order him to back up twice. The officer said the photographer's driver had a low likelihood of being charged criminally."
ref: "The photographer was transported to Ronald Reagan UCLA Medical Center, where he subsequently died. He was reportedly aged in his 20s. In a statement, Bieber said ""[w]hile I was not present nor directly involved with this tragic accident, my thoughts and prayers are with the family of the victim."" Entertainment news website TMZ understands the photographer stopped his vehicle on the other side of Sepulveda Boulevard and attempted to take pictures of the police stop before crossing the road and continuing, prompting the California Highway Patrol police officer conducting the traffic stop to order him back across, twice. According to police, the driver of the vehicle that hit the photographer is unlikely to face criminal charges."

src: "Başkan Vekili Rodrigo Arias, Arias'ın hafif bir virüs vakası için test sonucunun pozitif çıktığını söyledi. Cumhurbaşkanının durumu stabil, ancak birkaç gün evde yalnız kalacak. Ateş ve boğaz ağrısının dışında, uzaktan çalışarak işimi yapmak için kendimi iyi ve zinde hissediyorum. Arias yaptığı açıklamada, ""Tüm görevlerime Pazartesi günü dönmeyi umuyorum."" dedi."
mt: "Vice President Rodrigo Arias said the test result for a mild virus case was positive. The president's condition is stable, but he will be staying home alone for a few days. I feel good and energetic, working remotely to do my job. I hope to return to all my duties on Monday," Arias said in a statement."
ref: "Arias tested positive for a mild case of the virus, Presidential Minister Rodrigo Arias said. The president's condition is stable, though he will be isolated at home for several days. ""Apart from the fever and a sore throat, I feel well and in good shape to carry out my work by telecommuting. I expect to return to all my duties on Monday,"" Arias said in a statement."

src: Adını Maldivler lisanında bir palmiye yaprağı torbasından alan Tropikal Kasırga Gonu, zirve hızında saatte 240 kilometre (saatte 149 mil) hıza çıkan sürekli rüzgarlara ulaştı. Bugün erken saatlerde rüzgar 83 km/s civarındaydı ve rüzgarın zayıflamaya devam etmesi bekleniyordu.
mt: Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named after a Maldivian palm frond basket, reached sustained winds of 149 mph (240 km/h) as a Category 4 storm. Early this morning, the winds were around 83 km/h and were expected to weaken.
ref: At its peak, Tropical Cyclone Gonu, named for a bag of palm leaves in the language of the Maldives, reached sustained winds of 240 kilometers an hour (149 miles per hour) . By early today, winds were around 83 km/h, and it was expect to keep weakening.

src: Kızıl gelgit, doğal olarak oluşan tek hücreli bir deniz organizması olan Karenia brevis'in normalden daha yüksek yoğunlaşmasından kaynaklanır. Doğal etkenler kesişerek ideal koşulları meydana getirebilir ve bu alg sayısının önemli ölçüde artmasına olanak tanır. Algler hem insanlardaki hem de balıklardaki sinirleri çalışmaz hale getiren nörotoksin üretirler. Balıklar genellikle sulardaki yüksek toksin yoğunlukları nedeniyle ölür. İnsanlar, rüzgar ve dalgaların havaya kaldırdığı tesir altında kalmış suyun solunmasından etkilenebilir.
mt: Red tide is caused by an abnormally high concentration of Karenia brevis, a single-celled marine organism that occurs naturally. Natural factors can intersect to create ideal conditions, allowing the algae to bloom in significant numbers. The algae produce neurotoxins that can cause paralysis in humans and fish. Fish often die from the high toxin concentrations in the water. Humans can be affected by inhaling the effects of water that has been blown into the air by wind and waves.
ref: Red tide is caused by a higher than normal concentration of Karenia brevis, a naturally-occurring single-celled marine organism. Natural factors can intersect to produce ideal conditions, allowing this algae to increase in number dramatically. The algae produces a neurotoxin that can disable nerves in both humans and fish. Fish often die because of the high concentrations of the toxin in the waters. Humans can be affected by breathing affected water taken into the air by wind and waves.

src: "Daha önce Saffir-Simpson Kasırga Ölçeğinde 4. Kategoride sınıflandırılan Felicia'nın gücü, Salı günü dağılmadan önce tropikal bir depresyona kadar indi. Kalıntıları adaların çoğunda sağanaklara sebep oldu fakat henüz herhangi bir zarar veya su taşkını bildirilmedi. Oahu'da bir göstergede 6,34 inç'e ulaşan yağış ""faydalı"" olarak tanımlandı. Yağışın bir kısmına gök gürültüsü ve sık şimşekler eşlik etti."
mt: "Felicia, which had been classified as a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before its remnants brought rain to most of the islands. No damage or flooding has been reported. A gauge on Oahu recorded 6.34 inches of rain, which was described as "beneficial." Some of the rain was accompanied by lightning and frequent thunder."
ref: "Felicia, once a Category 4 storm on the Saffir-Simpson Hurricane Scale, weakened to a tropical depression before dissipating Tuesday. Its remnants produced showers across most of the islands, though as of yet, no damage or flooding has been reported. The precipitation, reaching 6.34 inches at a gauge on Oahu, was described as ""beneficial"". Some of the rainfall was accompanied by thunderstorms and frequent lightning."

src: Piquet Jr. 2008 Singapur Grand Prix'sinde Fernando Alonso'nun erken bir pit stopundan hemen sonra güvenlik aracını piste çıkararak kaza yaptı. Alonso'nun önündeki arabalar güvenlik aracının kontrolünde yakıt ikmaline geçtiğinde Alonso, zafere ulaşmak için diğerlerinin önüne geçti. Piquet Jr. 2009 Macaristan Grand Prix'sinden sonra görevden alındı.
mt: 2008 Singapore Grand Prix, Piquet Jr. crashed into the safety car after Fernando Alonso's early pit stop. Alonso passed the safety car in front of him when other cars were refueling under the control of the safety car. Piquet Jr. was fired after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Piquet Jr. 2008 Singapur Grand Prix'sinde Fernando Alonso'nun erken bir pit stopundan hemen sonra güvenlik aracını piste çıkararak kaza yaptı. Alonso'nun önündeki arabalar güvenlik aracının kontrolünde yakıt ikmaline geçtiğinde Alonso, zafere ulaşmak için diğerlerinin önüne geçti. Piquet Jr. 2009 Macaristan Grand Prix'sinden sonra görevden alındı.
mt: 2008 Singapore Grand Prix, Piquet Jr. crashed into the safety car after Fernando Alonso's early pit stop. Alonso passed the safety car in front of him when other cars were refueling under the control of the safety car. Piquet Jr. was fired after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.
ref: Piquet Jr. crashed in the 2008 Singapore Grand Prix just after an early pit stop for Fernando Alonso, bringing out the safety car. As the cars ahead of Alonso went in for fuel under the safety car, he moved up the pack to take victory. Piquet Jr. was sacked after the 2009 Hungarian Grand Prix.

src: Science dergisinde Perşembe günü yayınlanan bir araştırma, Ekvador Galapagos Adaları'nda yeni bir kuş türünün ortaya çıktığını bildirdi. Birleşik Devletler'deki Princeton Üniversitesi ve İsveç'teki Uppsala Üniversitesi'nden araştırmacılar türlerin yalnızca iki nesilde evrimleştiğini bildirdi. Halbuki bu sürecin, endemik bir Darwin ispinozu, Geospiza fortes, ve göçmen kaktüs ispinozu, Geospiza conirostris, arasındaki üreme nedeniyle çok daha uzun sürdüğüne inanılıyordu.
mt: A study published in Science on Thursday reported the emergence of a new bird species in the Galapagos Islands of Ecuador. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported that the species had evolved in only two generations. However, it was believed that the process would take much longer, due to the breeding between the endemic Darwin's finch, Geospiza fortes, and the migrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.
ref: A study published on Thursday in the journal Science reported on formation of a new bird species on the Ecuadorean Galápagos Islands. Researchers from Princeton University in the United States and Uppsala University in Sweden reported the new species evolved in just two generations, though this process had been believed to take much longer, due to breeding between an endemic Darwin finch, Geospiza fortes, and the immigrant cactus finch, Geospiza conirostris.

src: Sanat etkinliği aynı zamanda Rumen başkentinin yaratıcı ve renkli bir metropol olarak imajını yeniden ortaya çıkarmayı hedefleyen Bükreş Belediyesi'nin kampanyasının bir parçası. Şehir, bu yıl Haziran'dan Ağustos'a kadar süren dünyanın en büyük halka açık sanat etkinliği olan CowParade'e ev sahibi ilk Güneydoğu Avrupa kenti olacak.
mt: The event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall to re-establish the city's image as a creative and colorful metropolis. The city will be the first South-Eastern European city to host the world's largest public art event, CowParade, which runs from June to August.
ref: The artistic event is also part of a campaign by the Bucharest City Hall that seeks to relaunch the image of the Romanian capital as a creative and colourful metropolis. The city will be the first in southeastern Europe to host CowParade, the world's largest public art event, between June and August this year.

src: Uçak İrkutsk'a doğru gidiyordu ve iç birlikler tarafından yönetiliyordu. Konuyu araştırmak için soruşturma başlatıldı. II-76, 1970'lerden beri hem Rusya'nın hem de Sovyet ordusunun büyük bir parçası olmuştur, ve geçen ay Rusya'da ciddi bir kaza geçirmiştir. 7 Ekim'de bir motor kalkışta ayrıldı, yaralanma olmadı. Rusya, o kazadan sonra Il-76'leri kısa bir süre için yere indirdi.
mt: The plane was en route to Irkutsk and was operated by the Interior Ministry. An investigation has been launched to look into the matter. The Il-76 has been a major part of both Russia's and the Soviet Union's air force since the 1970s, and last month Russia suffered a serious crash. On October 7, one of the engines fell off during takeoff, with no injuries. Russia grounded Il-76s after that crash.
ref: The aircraft had been headed to Irkutsk and was being operated by interior troops. An inquiry was established to investigate. The Il-76 has been a major component of both the Russian and Soviet military since the 1970s, and had already seen a serious accident in Russia last month. On October 7 an engine separated on takeoff, without injuries. Russia briefly grounded Il-76s after that accident.

src: Simpsonlar'dan önce Simon, birçok programda farklı pozisyonlarda görev aldı. 1980'lerde Taxi, Cheers ve The Tracey Ullman Show gibi programlarda çalıştı. 1989'da Brooks ve Groening ile birlikte The Simpsons'ın yaratılmasına yardım etti ve dizinin ilk yazar kadrosunu işe almaktan sorumlu oldu. 1993'te gösteriden ayrılmasına rağmen, baş yapımcı unvanını korudu ve her sezon telif ücreti olarak on milyonlarca dolar almaya devam etti.
mt: 1980s, he worked on Taxi, Cheers and The Tracey Ullman Show. In 1989, he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing staff. He left the show in 1993, but continued to hold the title of executive producer and continued to earn millions of dollars in royalties each season.
ref: Before The Simpsons Simon had worked on several shows in various positions. During the 1980s he worked on shows such as Taxi, Cheers, and The Tracy Ullman Show. In 1989 he helped create The Simpsons with Brooks and Groening, and was responsible for hiring the show's first writing team. Despite leaving the show in 1993 he kept the title of executive producer, and continued to receive tens of millions of dollars every season in royalties.

src: Fluke, bazılarının kadınların kadın sağlığı hakkında konuşmasını engelleme çabalarının başarısız olduğunu yazdı. Doğum kontrol hapının tıbbi bir gereklilik olarak görülmesi için hem kadın hem de erkekler tarafından kendisine iletilen çok sayıda olumlu yorum ve destek nedeniyle bu çıkarıma ulaştı.
mt: Fluke wrote that her efforts to silence women talking about women's health were unsuccessful. She reached this conclusion after receiving many positive comments and support from both women and men about her writing that birth control pills are medically necessary.
ref: Fluke wrote that the efforts by some to drown out women from speaking out about women’s health were unsuccessful. She came to this conclusion due to the multitude of positive comments and encouragement sent to her by both female and male individuals urging that contraception medication be considered a medical necessity.

src: "Suya benzer şekilde saydam davranış sergileyecek. Kısacası eğer kıyı şeridinin orada duruyorsanız, altında yer alan çakılları ve çamuru görebilirsiniz. Bildiğimiz kadarıyla, Titan'dan daha çok hareketlilik gösteren tek bir gezegen var, o da Dünya."" diye ekledi Stofan."
mt: "It will behave like a liquid. In other words, if you're standing on the shore, you can see the rocks and the sand underneath. As far as we know, there's only one other planet that's more active than Titan, and that's Earth." Stofan added.
ref: """It's going to behave like water. It's transparent just the way water is. So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

So if you were standing by the shoreline, you would be able to see down to whatever pebbles or gunk that was on the bottom. As far as we know, there is only one planetary body that displays more dynamism than Titan, and its name is Earth,"" added Stofan."

src: Bu sadece zaten hali hazırda olan bir teori olan en azından bazı dinozorların tüylerinin olduğunu doğrulamakla kalmıyor, aynı zamanda fosillerin genel olarak yapamayacağı, renk ve üç boyutlu düzenleme gibi ayrıntıları da sağlıyor. Bilim insanları, bu hayvanın tüylerinin gövdenin alt kısmında soluk veya karotenoid renkli, üst kısmında ise kestane-kahverengi olduğunu söylüyor. Keşif aynı zamanda kuşlardaki tüylerin evrimi konusunda fikirler veriyor. Dinozor tüylerinde, kuş tüyü sapı adı verilen iyi gelişmiş bir sap olmadığı fakat çengeller ve çengelcikler gibi diğer tüy özellikleri bulunduğundan araştırmacılar, kuş tüyü sapının muhtemelen bu özelliklerden daha sonra ortaya çıkan bir evrimsel gelişme olduğu sonucuna vardı. Tüylerin yapısı, uçuş amaçlı kullanılmadıklarını, daha ziyade sıcaklık düzenleme ve görüntü amaçlı kullanıldıklarını öne sürüyor. Araştırmacılar, bunun genç bir dinozorun kuyruğu olmasına rağmen numunenin yavru tüyü değil yetişkin tüyü gösterdiğini söylüyor. Bunun genç bir dinozorun kuyruğu olmasına rağmen araştırmacılar, örneğin bir civciv tüyünü değil yetişkin tüylerini işaret ettiğini iddia etti.
mt: 1. This not only confirms the theory that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, but also provides details such as color and three-dimensional arrangement that fossils could not. Scientists say the animal's feathers were light or carotenoid colored on the underside of the body and chestnut-brown on the upper side. The discovery also provides insights into the evolution of bird feathers. In the dinosaur feathers, there was no well-developed bird feather shaft, but there were other feather features such as hooks and hooklets, so researchers concluded that the bird feather shaft was probably a later evolutionary development. The structure of the feathers suggests that they were not used for flight, but rather for temperature regulation and appearance. Researchers say that this is a young dinosaur's tail, but the specimen shows adult feathers, not juvenile feathers. 2. This is a young dinosaur's tail, but the specimen shows adult feathers, not juvenile feathers.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement. . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside. The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds. Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features. The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Deneysel aşılardan birinin Ebola'nın öldürücülüğünü azalttığı görülse de, şu ana dek hiçbir ilacın var olan enfeksiyonu tedavi etmeye uygun olduğu açıkça kanıtlanamamıştır. Bir antikor karışımı olan Zmapp başlangıçta umut vadediyordu ancak resmi çalışmalar ölümleri önlemede istenilenden daha az faydalı olduğunu gösterdi. PALM deneyinde ZMapp kontrol grubunda kullanıldı. Yani bilim adamları bu numuneyi referans aldı ve diğer üç tedaviyi bu numunenin verileriyle karşılaştırdı.
mt: 1. Experimental vaccines have shown some success in reducing Ebola's lethality, but no drug has yet been proven to be effective in treating the existing infection. A mixture of antibodies called Zmapp initially seemed promising, but official studies showed it was less effective than hoped in preventing deaths. ZMapp was used in the control group of the PALM trial. So scientists used this sample as a reference and compared the other three treatments to it.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection. One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death. In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Stanford Üniversitesi Tıp Fakültesi’nde görev alan bilim insanları, pazartesi günü hücreleri cinslerine göre sıraya koyabilen yeni bir teşhis aracının bulunduğunu duyurdu. Bu araç, standart mürekkep püskürtmeli yazıcılar kullanılarak her biri tahminen yaklaşık bir sente imal edilebilen küçük bir yazdırılabilir çipti. Öncü araştırmacılar, bunun göğüs kanseri gibi hastalıklarda hayatta kalma oranlarının daha zengin ülkelerin yarısı olduğu düşük gelirli ülkelerdeki hastalarda kanser, verem, HIV ve sıtmanın erken tanısını sağlayabileceğini söylüyor.
mt: Scientists at the Stanford University School of Medicine announced a new diagnostic device that can sort cells by their gender on Monday. This device is made of a printable chip, each of which is estimated to cost about a penny, using standard inkjet printers. The pioneering researchers say that this could provide early diagnosis of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria in low-income countries where survival rates for cancer are half of those in wealthy countries.
ref: On Monday, scientists from the Stanford University School of Medicine announced the invention of a new diagnostic tool that can sort cells by type: a tiny printable chip that can be manufactured using standard inkjet printers for possibly about one U.S. cent each. Lead researchers say this may bring early detection of cancer, tuberculosis, HIV and malaria to patients in low-income countries, where the survival rates for illnesses such as breast cancer can be half those of richer countries.

src: Bilim insanları, ay yüzeyinde oluşmuş olan, muhtemelen ayın çok yavaş biçimde küçülmesinden kaynaklanan ve lobat izleri adını verdikleri yer şekilleri keşfettiler. Bu izlere ayın her tarafında rastlandı ve çok az bozulmuşa benziyorlar, bu da onları meydana getiren jeolojik hadiselerin epey yeni olduğunu gösteriyor. Bu teori, ayda hiçbir jeolojik aktivite gerçekleşmediği iddiasıyla çelişiyor.
mt: Scientists have discovered lobate scarp, a type of landform that is thought to have been formed by the moon's slow contraction, on the moon's surface. These landforms were found all over the moon and appear to be relatively unaltered, indicating that the geological events that formed them were recent. This theory contradicts the claim that there is no geological activity on the moon.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

Bu teori, ayda hiçbir jeolojik aktivite gerçekleşmediği iddiasıyla çelişiyor.
mt: Scientists have discovered lobate scarp, a type of landform that is thought to have been formed by the moon's slow contraction, on the moon's surface. These landforms were found all over the moon and appear to be relatively unaltered, indicating that the geological events that formed them were recent. This theory contradicts the claim that there is no geological activity on the moon.
ref: Scientists have discovered landforms littered across the moon's surface called lobate scarps that have apparently resulted from the moon's shrinking very slowly. These scarps were found all over the moon and appear to be minimally weathered, indicating that the geologic events that created them were fairly recent. This theory contradicts the claim that the moon is completely devoid of geologic activity.

src: "Oğlunu öldürmekle suçlanan Adekoya o zamandan beri Edinburgh Şerif Mahkemesinde bulunuyor. Gözaltında iddianame ve duruşmayı bekliyor ancak, resmi  yaygın olarak yayımlandığı için görgü tanıklarının sunacağı kanıtların güvenilirliği zedelenebilir. Bu, Birleşik Krallık'ın başka yerlerinde yaygın bir uygulamadır. Ancak İskoç adaleti farklı işler ve mahkemeler fotoğrafların yayınlanmasını potansiyel olarak sakıncalı bulmuşlardır. Dundee Üniversitesinden Profesör Pamela Ferguson, ""gazeteciler, şüphelilerin fotoğraflarını vb. yayınlıyorlarsa tehlikeli bir çizgide yürüyor gibi görünüyorlar"" diyor. Kovuşturmalardan tam sorumlu Kraliyet Ofisi gazetecilere en azından iddianame hazırlanana kadar başka bir yorum yapılmayacağını açıkladı."
mt: "Adekoya has been in custody at Edinburgh Sheriff Court since then, awaiting indictment and trial, but the official  widespread dissemination of the evidence may be compromised by the testimony of eyewitnesses. This is a common practice in other parts of the United Kingdom. However, the Scottish justice system works differently and courts have been concerned about the potential risks of publishing photographs of suspects, etc. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee says, "journalists seem to be walking a dangerous line if they are publishing photographs of suspects, etc." The Royal Office responsible for prosecution announced that journalists would not be allowed to comment at least until the indictment was prepared."
ref: "Adekoya has since been in Edinburgh Sheriff Court charged with murdering her son. She is in custody pending indictment and trial, but any eyewitness evidence may be tainted because her image has been widely published. This is common practice elsewhere in the UK but Scottish justice works differently and courts have viewed publication of photos as potentially prejudicial. Professor Pamela Ferguson of the University of Dundee notes ""journalists do seem to be walking a dangerous line if publishing photos etc of suspects."" Crown Office, which is in overall charge of prosecutions, has indicated to journalists that no further comment will be made at least until indictment."

src: Buzların parçalanmış olmasının yanı sıra zor hava koşulları da kurtarma girişimlerini aksatıyor. Pittman, koşulların önümüzdeki hafta bir ara düzeleceğini telkin etti. Buz kütlesini kalınlık ve miktarı, Pittman'a göre, son 15 senede fok balığı avcılarının başına gelenlerin en kötüsüydü.
mt: In addition to the broken ice, the rough weather is also hampering the rescue efforts. Pittman encouraged that the conditions will improve for a week. The thickness and amount of the ice, according to Pittman, was the worst the seal hunters have seen in the last 15 years.
ref: In addition to the crushing ice, extreme weather conditions have been hampering rescue efforts. Pittman suggested that conditions wouldn't improve until sometime next week. The amount and thickness of the pack ice, according to Pittman, is the worst it has been for sealers in the past 15 years.

src: Roberts, olası vakaların ayrıntıları üzerinde yorum yapmanın etik dışı olacağını söyleyerek, kürtajın etiği düşünüldüğünde önemli bir soru olan yaşam ne zaman başlar konusu hakkında konuşmayı açıkça reddetmiştir. Fakat, “ülkede belirlenen kanunun” Roe v. Wade davası olduğu açıklamasını yineleyerek tutarlı Yüksek Mahkeme kararlarının ehemmiyetinin altını çizdi. Bununlar birlikte, Roe kararının dayandığı özel hayatın gizliliği ilkesine inandığını doğruladı.
mt: Roberts declined to comment on the details of the case, saying it would be unethical to discuss the question of when life begins, which is an important issue in the context of the ethics of abortion. However, he reiterated that the “law of the land” was the Roe v. Wade decision, emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the privacy principle on which the Roe decision was based.
ref: "Roberts flatly refused to say about when he believes life begins, an important question when considering the ethics of abortion, saying that it would be unethical to comment on the specifics of likely cases. He did, however, reiterate his earlier statement that Roe v. Wade was the ""settled law of the land"", emphasizing the importance of consistent Supreme Court rulings. He also confirmed that he believed in the implied right to privacy which the Roe decision depended upon."

src: Tam olarak sabah saat 8:46'da şehre boydan boya, tam ilk jetin hedefini vurduğu ana denk düşen bir sessizlik çöktü. İki ışın hüzmesi, gece boyu gökyüzüne dönük olacak şekilde ayarlandı. Ortalarında bir ulaşım merkezi ve anıtsal park bulunan  beş yeni gökdelen kompleksinin inşaatı devam ediyor.
mt: 8:46 am, exactly the time the first jet hit its target, a silence fell over the city. Two beams of light were aimed at the sky all night. Construction continues on five new skyscraper complexes, one of which is a transportation hub and memorial park.
ref: At exactly 8:46 a.m. a hush fell across the city, marking the exact moment the first jet struck its target. Two beams of light have been rigged up to point skywards overnight. Construction is ongoing for five new skyscrapers at the site, with a transportation center and memorial park in the middle.

src: "Yedi Kız Kardeşler olarak adlandırılan tüm mağara girişleri en az 100 ila 250 metre (328 ila 820 foot) çapındadır. Kızılötesi görüntüler, gece ile gündüz arasındaki sıcaklık değişimlerinin bunların mağara olabileceğini gösterdiğini göstermektedir. Onlar, gündüzleri etrafındaki yüzeyden daha serindir ve geceleri daha sıcaktır."" Amerika Birleşik Devletleri Jeolojik Araştırmalar (USGS) Astrojeoloji Ekibi ve Flagstaff, Arizona'da yer alan Kuzey Arizona Üniversitesi'ne bağlı Glen Cushing, onların ısıl davranışları, Dünya üzerinde genelde oldukça değişmez bir sıcaklığı koruyan büyük mağaralar kadar değişmez değiller, fakat bunlar yerdeki derin delikler ile tutarlı"" dedi"
mt: 7 Sisters, as they are called, are all entrances to caves that are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that they are cooler during the day and warmer at night than the surrounding surface, which suggests that they are caves. "They are not as stable in temperature as the large caves on Earth, but they are consistent with the deep holes on the ground," said Glen Cushing of the USGS Astrogeology Team and the University of North Arizona in Flagstaff, Arizona.
ref: "All of the cave entrances, which were named ""The Seven Sisters"", are at least 100 to 250 meters (328 to 820 feet) in diameter. Infrared images show that the temperature variations from night and day show that they are likely caves. ""They are cooler than the surrounding surface in the day and warmer at night. Their thermal behavior is not as steady as large caves on Earth that often maintain a fairly constant temperature, but it is consistent with these being deep holes in the ground,"" said Glen Cushing of the United States Geological Survey (USGS) Astrogeology Team and of Northern Arizona University located in Flagstaff, Arizona."

src: Söz konusu kişi iddiaya göre üç tekerlekli ve patlayıcı yüklü bir aracı kalabalığın üzerine sürdü. Bombayı patlattığından şüphelenilen kişi, patlamada yaralandıktan sonra gözaltına alındı. Yetkililer saldırganın Uygur kökenli olduğunu biliyor ancak adı henüz bilinmiyor.
mt: The suspect is believed to have driven a three-wheeled vehicle loaded with explosives into a crowd. The suspect was taken into custody after the explosion, which injured him. Authorities know the suspect is of Uyghur origin, but his name is not yet known.
ref: The man allegedly drove a three-wheeled vehicle armed with explosives into a crowd. The man suspected of detonating the bomb was detained, after sustaining injuries from the blast. His name is still unknown to authorities, although they do know he is a member of the Uighur ethnic group.

src: Rustenburg, Güney Afrika'daki Royal Bafokeng Stadyumundaki ragbi birliği Tri Nations maçında Güney Afrika All Blacks'i (Yeni Zelanda) mağlub etti. Son skor tek puan farklı bir galibiyetti. 21-20 ile All Blacks'in 15 maçlık galibiyet serisi sonlanmış oldu. Springboks için, 5 maçlık bir mağlubiyet serisi sona erdi. İki hafta önce kupayı kazanmış olan All Blacks’in son maçıydı. Serinin son maçı önümüzdeki hafta Johannesburg'daki Ellis Park'ta gerçekleşecek ve Springbok'lar Avustralya'yla oynayacak.
mt: 21-20, the Springboks beat the All Blacks in the rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The All Blacks' 15-match winning streak ended. The Springboks' 5-match losing streak ended. The All Blacks' last match was two weeks ago, when they won the cup. The last match of the series will be next week in Johannesburg at Ellis Park, where the Springboks will play Australia.
ref: South Africa have defeated the All Blacks (New Zealand) in a rugby union Tri Nations match at the Royal Bafokeng Stadium in Rustenburg, South Africa. The final score was a one-point victory, 21 to 20, ending the All Blacks' 15 game winning streak. For the Springboks, it ended a five-match losing streak. It was the final match for the All Blacks, who had already won the trophy two weeks ago. The final match of the series will take place at Ellis Park in Johannesburg next week, when the Springboks play Australia.

src: İstasyon, daha önce bir jiroskopun uzay istasyonu görevinde kaybolmasına rağmen uzay yürüyüşünün sonuna kadar durumunu sürdürdü. Chiao ve Sharipov, durum ayarlama motorundan güvenli bir uzaklıkta olduklarını bildirdiler. Rus yer kontrolü jetlerini aktive etti ve istasyon normal durumuna döndü.
mt: The station, which had previously lost a gyroscope during a space station mission, continued to maintain its orientation until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported that they were at a safe distance from the attitude control motor. Russian ground control activated the jets and the station returned to normal.
ref: The station maintained its attitude, despite the loss of a gyroscope earlier in the space station mission, until the end of the spacewalk. Chiao and Sharipov reported being a safe distance from the attitude adjustment thrusters. Russian ground control activated the jets and normal attitude of the station was regained.

src: Dava Virginia'da açıldı, çünkü suçlamalarda bulunan önde gelen internet servis sağlayıcısı AOL'ün merkezi burada bulunuyor. Bu, istenmeyen dağıtımdan kullanıcıların posta kutularına gelen toplu e-posta, diğer adıyla spamı, engellemek için 2003 yılında çıkarılan mevzuat kullanılarak verilen ilk karardır.
mt: The suit was filed in Virginia, where the leading Internet service provider AOL, which is named in the suit, has its headquarters. This is the first ruling under the 2003 law, which was designed to prevent unsolicited bulk e-mail, or spam, from reaching users' inboxes.
ref: The case was prosecuted in Virginia because it is the home to the leading internet service provider AOL, the company who instigated the charges. This is the first time a conviction has been gained using the legislation enacted in 2003 to curb bulk e-mail, aka spam, from unsolicited distribution into users mailboxes.

src: 28 yaşındaki Vidal, üç sezon önce Sevilla'dan Barça'ya transfer olmuştu. Katalan başkentine taşındığından beri Vidal kulüp adına 49 maça çıktı.
mt: 28-year-old Vidal was transferred from Sevilla to Barça three seasons ago. Since moving to the Catalan capital, Vidal has played 49 matches for the club.
ref: 28-year-old Vidal had joined Barça three seasons ago, from Sevilla. Since moving to the Catalan-capital, Vidal had played 49 games for the club.

src: Jarque, günün erken saatlerinde İtalya'daki Coverciano'da sezon öncesi antrenman esnasında antrenman yapıyordu. Pazar günü Bolonia'ya karşı oynanacak maç öncesinde takımın otelinde kalıyordu. Pazar günü Bolonia'ya karşı planlanan maç öncesinde takımla birlikte otelde kalıyordu.

src: Hiçbir tsunami uyarısı yapılmadı ve Cakarta jeofizik ajansına göre sarsıntı 6.5 büyüklüğü koşulunu karşılamadığından tsunami uyarısı yapılmayacak. Tsunami tehlikesi olmamasına rağmen, bölgede yaşayanlar paniğe kapıldı ve işyerlerini ve evlerini terk etmeye başladı.
mt: No tsunami warning was issued and the Jakarta geophysical agency said the quake did not meet the 6.5 magnitude threshold for a tsunami warning. Despite the lack of tsunami threat, residents in the area panicked and began fleeing their workplaces and homes.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: Hiçbir tsunami uyarısı yapılmadı ve Cakarta jeofizik ajansına göre sarsıntı 6.5 büyüklüğü koşulunu karşılamadığından tsunami uyarısı yapılmayacak. Tsunami tehlikesi olmamasına rağmen, bölgede yaşayanlar paniğe kapıldı ve işyerlerini ve evlerini terk etmeye başladı.
mt: No tsunami warning was issued and the Jakarta geophysical agency said the quake did not meet the 6.5 magnitude threshold for a tsunami warning. Despite the lack of tsunami threat, residents in the area panicked and began fleeing their workplaces and homes.
ref: No tsunami warning has been issued, and according to the Jakarta geophysics agency, no tsunami warning will be issued because the quake did not meet the magnitude 6.5 requirement. Despite there being no tsunami threat, residents started to panic and began to leave their businesses and homes.

src: Güneşin, diğer yıldızlar gibi temel prensiplerle hareket ettiğini keşfettiler: Sistemdeki bütün yıldızların etkinliklerinde, parlaklıklarından ve yörüngelerinden güç aldığını başka hiçbir şeyden güç almadıklarını keşfettiler. Parlaklık ve dönme, bir yıldızın plazma akışıyla ilişkili Rossby sayısını belirlemek için birlikte kullanılır. Rossby sayısı ne kadar küçükse, yıldız manyetik tersinimlere nazaran o kadar az aktiftir.
mt: They discovered that the Sun, like other stars, moves according to basic principles: that all the stars in the system derive their activity, brightness, and orbits from their plasma flows, and derive no power from anything else. Brightness and rotation are used together to determine the Rossby number of a star, which is related to how active a star is compared to its magnetic reversals.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Güneşin, diğer yıldızlar gibi temel prensiplerle hareket ettiğini keşfettiler: Sistemdeki bütün yıldızların etkinliklerinde, parlaklıklarından ve yörüngelerinden güç aldığını başka hiçbir şeyden güç almadıklarını keşfettiler. Parlaklık ve dönme, bir yıldızın plazma akışıyla ilişkili Rossby sayısını belirlemek için birlikte kullanılır. Rossby sayısı ne kadar küçükse, yıldız manyetik tersinimlere nazaran o kadar az aktiftir.
mt: They discovered that the Sun, like other stars, moves according to basic principles: that all the stars in the system derive their activity, brightness, and orbits from their plasma flows, and derive no power from anything else. Brightness and rotation are used together to determine the Rossby number of a star, which is related to how active a star is compared to its magnetic reversals.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else. The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow. The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: 2010 federal seçimlerinden önce 1.400 kişiyle yapılan ankete göre Avustralya'nın cumhuriyet olmasına karşı çıkanların sayısı 2008'den bu yana yüzde 8 oranında arttı. Geçici Başbakan Julia Gillard, 2010 federal seçim kampanyası sırasında Kraliçe 2. Elizabeth'in döneminin bitiminde Avustralya'nın bir cumhuriyet haine gelmesi gerektiğine inandığını söyledi. Ankete katılanların yüzde 34'ü bu görüşü paylaşarak, Kraliçe II. Elizabeth'in Avustralya'nın son kraliçesi olmasını istiyor. Oylamanın uç noktalarında, yüzde 31'i Avustralya'nın asla bir cumhuriyet olmaması gerektiğine inanıyorken ankete katılanların yüzde 29'u Avustralya'nın en kısa sürede bir cumhuriyet olması gerektiğine inanıyor.
mt: 1,400 people were surveyed before the 2010 federal election. The number of Australians against the republic has increased by 8 percent since 2008. Interim Prime Minister Julia Gillard said during the 2010 federal election campaign that the Queen Elizabeth II's reign should end with the republic of Australia. 34 percent of those surveyed agreed with this view, and the Queen Elizabeth II should be the last queen of Australia. At the extreme ends, 31 percent of those surveyed believed that Australia should never be a republic, while 29 percent believed that Australia should become a republic as soon as possible.
ref: Out of 1,400 people polled prior to the 2010 federal election, those who oppose Australia becoming a republic grew by 8 per cent since 2008. Caretaker Prime Minister Julia Gillard claimed during the campaign of the 2010 federal election that she believed Australia should become a republic at the end of Queen Elizabeth II's reign. 34 per cent of those in the poll share this view, wanting Queen Elizabeth II to be Australia's last monarch. At the extremes of the poll, 29 per cent of those surveyed believe Australia should become a republic as soon as possible, while 31 per cent believe Australia should never become a republic.
