src: Komen Vakfının bir sözcüsü olan Leslie Aun, kuruluşun yasal soruşturma altında olan kuruluşlara bağış veya fonlamaya izin vermeyen yeni bir kuralı kabul ettiğini söyledi. Planlı Ebeveynlik hizmetinin paraları kullanma ve bildirme şekliyle ilgili tamamlanması beklenen ve Temsilci Cliff Stearns’ın yürüttüğü soruşturma nedeniyle Planlı Ebeveynlik hizmetinin yetkileri Komen'in politikasına uygun şekilde kaldırdı. Stearns, Meclis Enerji ve Ticaret Komitesi çatısı altında bulunan Gözetim ve Soruşturmalar Alt Komitesi'nin başkanı olarak Planlı Ebeveynlik aracılığıyla kürtajları finanse etmek için vergilerin kullanılıp kullanılmadığını araştırıyor.
mt: Leslie Aun, a spokeswoman for the Susan G. Komen Foundation, said the organization has accepted a new rule that prohibits donations or funding to organizations under legal investigation. The Planned Parenthood service's use and reporting of funds was changed to comply with Komen's policy after the Planned Parenthood service's powers were removed by the investigation led by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is chairman of the House Energy and Commerce Committee's Subcommittee on Oversight and Investigations, which is investigating whether taxes are being used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood.
ref: Leslie Aun, a spokesperson for the Komen Foundation, said the organization adopted a new rule that does not allow grants or funding to be awarded to organizations that are under legal investigation. Komen's policy disqualified Planned Parenthood due to a pending investigation on how Planned Parenthood spends and reports its money that is being conducted by Representative Cliff Stearns. Stearns is investigating whether taxes are used to fund abortions through Planned Parenthood in his role as chairman of the Oversight and Investigations Subcommittee, which is under the umbrella of the House Energy and Commerce Committee.

src: "Madya Pradeş Polisi, çalınan dizüstü bilgisayarı ve cep telefonunu ele geçirdi. Müfettiş Yardımcısı General D K Arya, ""İsviçreli kadına tecavüz eden 5 kişiyi tutukladık, cep telefonunu ve dizüstü bilgisayarını da kurtardık"" dedi. Sanıkların isimlerinin Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar ve Vishnu Kanjar olduğu belirtildi. Başkomiser Chandra Shekhar Solanki, sanığın mahkemeye yüzünü gizleyerek çıktığını söyledi."
mt: 5 men were arrested for raping a Swiss woman. Police recovered her laptop and cell phone. The names of the suspects are Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. The chief inspector said the suspect hid his face when he was taken to court.
ref: "The Madhya Pradesh Police recovered the stolen laptop and mobile phone. Deputy Inspector General D K Arya said, ""We have arrested five persons who raped the Swiss woman and recovered her mobile and laptop"". The accused are named as Baba Kanjar, Bhutha Kanjar, Rampro Kanjar, Gaza Kanjar and Vishnu Kanjar. Police superintendent Chandra Shekhar Solanki said the accused appeared in court with covered faces."

src: Daha önce maliyet tasarrufu ve işlevsellik faktörleri için dünya çapında piyasaya sürülen ASUS Eee PC, 2007 Taipei BT Ayında sıcak bir gündem maddesi haline geldi. Ancak dizüstü bilgisayar tüketici pazarı Çin Halk Cumhuriyeti Yuan İdaresi, ASUS’a Tayvan Sürdürülebilirlik Ödülü verdikten sonra radikal bir değişim ve çeşitlilik sürecine girecektir.
mt: 2007 Taipei BT Fair, ASUS Eee PC, which was previously released worldwide for cost savings and functionality factors, became a hot topic. However, the desktop computer consumer market in the People's Republic of China Yuan Administration will enter a radical change and diversification process after giving the Taiwan Sustainability Award to ASUS.
ref: ASUS Eee PC, earlier launched world-wide for cost-saving and functionality factors, became a hot topic in 2007 Taipei IT Month. But the consumer market on laptop computer will be radically varied and changed after ASUS was awarded in the 2007 Taiwan Sustainable Award by Executive Yuan of the Republic of China.

src: Onlarca yerel sakinin, geleneksel yılbaşı kartları ulaşmadığı için Obanazawa Postanesi'ne şikayet etmeye başlamasıyla 1 Ocak'ta sorun yaşanmaya başladı. Çocuğun, 429 yılbaşı kartı dahil alıcılara ulaşmayan toplam 600 postayı sakladığını öğrenmelerinin ardından dün postane, vatandaşlara ve basına özür açıklaması yaptı.
mt: 1 January, after a number of local residents complained that their traditional Christmas cards had not reached their recipients, the Obanazawa Post Office began to experience problems. After learning that the child had 600 postcards, including 429 Christmas cards, that had not reached their recipients, the post office issued an apology to the public and the media yesterday.
ref: The issue started on January 1st when dozens of local residents started complaining to the Obanazawa Post Office that they hadn't received their traditional and regular New Year cards. Yesterday, the post office released their apology to citizens and the media after discovering that the boy had hidden more than 600 postal documents, including 429 New Year postcards, which weren't delivered to their intended recipients.

src: Her iki sporcunun da setteki tüm servisleri kazanmasıyla gelen beraberliğin ardından oynanan ilk seti Murray kaybetti. Del Potro, ikinci sette erken avantajı vardı ancak bu da 6-6'ya gelindikten sonra bir beraberlik molasını gerektirdi. Potro bu noktada omzundan tedavi gördü ancak oyuna geri dönmeyi başardı.
mt: Murray won the first set after both players won all of their service games. Murray lost the second set after being up 6-6, but the match was tied at 6-6 when a tiebreak was needed. Potro received treatment for his shoulder but returned to the match.
ref: Murray lost the first set in a tie break after both men held each and every serve in the set. Del Potro had the early advantage in the second set, but this too required a tie break after reaching 6-6. Potro received treatment to his shoulder at this point but managed to return to the game.

src: "Bu görevliler eşliğinde, Teksas vatandaşlarına halkın güvenliğini korumak için adımlar atıldığına dair güvence verdi. Perry özellikle, ""Bu hususta ortaya çıkan mücadelenin üstesinden gelmek için dünyada daha iyi donanımlı sadece birkaç yer var,"" dedi. Vali ayrıca, ""Bugün, okul çağındaki bazı çocukların hastayla temas kurduğunun tespit edildiğini haber aldık"" dedi. Bu durum ciddi. Sistemimizin olması gerektiği gibi çalıştığından emin olabilirsiniz. dedi."
mt: "These officials have assured Texans that steps are being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are only a few places in the world better equipped to deal with the challenge that has emerged."" The governor also said, ""We learned today that some school-aged children have been exposed to the patient."" This is serious. You can be assured that our system is working as it should."
ref: "Accompanied by those officials, he assured Texas citizens that steps were being taken to protect the public's safety. Perry specifically said, ""There are few places in the world better equipped to meet the challenge that is posed in this case."" The governor also stated, ""Today, we learned that some school aged children have been identified as having had contact with the patient."" He went on to say, ""This case is serious. Rest assured that our system is working as well as it should."""

src: The Daily Show ve The Colbert Report'tan çok önce, Heck ve Johnson 1988'de UW'de öğrenciyken haberlerin ve haber spikerliğinin parodisini yapan bir yayın tasarladı. Başlangıcından beri The Onion tam bir haber parodisi imparatorluğu kurdu. The Onion; basılı versiyon, ekim ayında 5.000.000 farklı ziyaretçi çeken bir internet sitesi, kişisel reklamlar, 24 saatlik bir haber ağı, podcast'ler ve kısa bir süre önce kullanıma sunulan Our Dumb World isimli bir dünya atlası sunuyor. Al Gore ve General Tommy Franks laf arasında favori manşetlerinden bahsediyorlar (Gore'unki, The Onion'un onun ve Tipper'ın 2000 Seçiciler Kurulu yenilgisinden sonra hayatlarının en iyi seksini yaptıkları haberiydi). Jon Stewart ve Stephen Colbert'in haber parodisi programları, The Onion’un çoğu yazarından büyük oranda etkilendi.
mt: 1988, while students at UW, Heck and Johnson designed a parody of news and news anchors. Since its inception, The Onion has built a full news parody empire. The Onion; a print version, a website that has been visited by 5 million different visitors in October, personal ads, a 24-hour news network, podcasts, and a recently released Our Dumb World atlas. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks are talking about their favorite Onion headlines (Gore's was about the best sex of their lives after their 2000 election loss). Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows were influenced by most of The Onion's writers.
ref: Long before The Daily Show and The Colbert Report, Heck and Johnson envisioned a publication that would parody the news—and news reporting—when they were students at UW in 1988. Since its inception, The Onion has become a veritable news parody empire, with a print edition, a website that drew 5,000,000 unique visitors in the month of October, personal ads, a 24 hour news network, podcasts, and a recently launched world atlas called Our Dumb World. Al Gore and General Tommy Franks casually rattle off their favorite headlines (Gore's was when The Onion reported he and Tipper were having the best sex of their lives after his 2000 Electoral College defeat). Many of their writers have gone on to wield great influence on Jon Stewart and Stephen Colbert's news parody shows.

src: Protesto, Başbakan'ın resmi konutunun bulunduğu Downing Caddesi'nin polis tarafından korunan girişinin karşısındaki Whitehall'da yerel saatle 11:00 civarında (UTC+1) başladı. 11.00'dan hemen sonra protestocular, Whitehall'daki kuzeye giden vagonda trafiği engellediler. Saat 11:20'de polis protestoculardan kaldırıma doğru geri çekilmelerini istedi ve protesto haklarını trafik artışıyla dengelemeleri gerektiğini belirtti. Saat 11:29 dolaylarında, protesto Whitehall'a doğru ilerledi, Strand caddesini takip etti ve Trafalgar Meydanı'nı geçti, Aldwych ve Kingsway'den geçip Muhafazakar Parti'nin Grand Connaught Rooms otelinde Bahar Forumunu düzenlediği Holborn'a doğru ilerledi.
mt: 11:00 UTC+1 (local time) a protest started in front of the Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence, on Whitehall, which is guarded by police. At 11:20, the protesters blocked the northbound traffic on Whitehall. At 11:29, the protest moved towards Whitehall, followed Strand, passed Trafalgar Square, went through Aldwych and Kingsway, and moved towards Holborn, where the Conservative Party's Grand Connaught Rooms hotel was hosting the Spring Forum.
ref: The protest started around 11:00 local time (UTC+1) on Whitehall opposite the police-guarded entrance to Downing Street, the Prime Minister's official residence. Just after 11:00, protesters blocked traffic on the northbound carriage in Whitehall. At 11:20, the police asked the protesters to move back on to the pavement, stating that they needed to balance the right to protest with the traffic building up. Around 11:29, the protest moved up Whitehall, past Trafalgar Square, along the Strand, passing by Aldwych and up Kingsway towards Holborn where the Conservative Party were holding their Spring Forum in the Grand Connaught Rooms hotel.

src: Daha önce diyabetik olup şimdi diyabetik olmayan 4 aylık farelerimiz var, diye ekledi. Halifax, Nova Scotia'daki Dalhousie Üniversitesi'nde tıp profesörü ve Kanada Diyabet Derneği'nin klinik ve bilim alanı başkanı olan Dr. Ehud Ur, çalışmanın henüz başlangıç aşamasında olduğu konusunda uyarıda bulundu. Bazı diğer uzmanlar gibi o da, bu bulguların zaten Tip 1 diyabeti olan kişilerle bir ilişkisi olmadığına dikkat çekerek diyabetin tedavi edilebileceği ile ilgili şüpheci kalmıştır.
mt: 4-month-old diabetic mice that are no longer diabetic, he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, clinical and scientific director of the Canadian Diabetes Association, who is a professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia, cautioned that the study is still in its early stages. Like some other experts, he has been skeptical about the possibility of curing diabetes, pointing out that there is no evidence of a relationship between the findings and people who already have Type 1 diabetes.
ref: """We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic,"" he added. Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days. Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes."

src: The Twin Otter, dün PNG Havayolları'nın CG4684 numaralı uçuşu olarak Kokoda'ya inmeye çalıştı, ancak daha önce bir kez inişi durdurulmuştu. Piste ikinci yaklaşması sonrası iniş yapması gereken zamandan yaklaşık on dakika önce kayboldu. Uçağın düştüğü alan bugün tespit edildi ve erişilmesi o kadar zor bir yerdeydi ki alana yürüyerek ulaşıp kazazedeleri aramaları için iki polis memuru ormana indirildi. İnişin iptal edilmesine yol açan hava muhalefeti arama çalışmalarını da engelledi.
mt: The Twin Otter, which was attempting to land at Kokoda as PNG Air's CG4684 flight yesterday, had its first landing attempt aborted. It disappeared before its second landing attempt, which was supposed to be made about ten minutes before the scheduled time. The crash site was located today, and was so difficult to access that two police officers were lowered into the forest to search for the crash victims. The weather that caused the landing to be aborted also hampered the search.
ref: The Twin Otter had been trying to land at Kokoda yesterday as Airlines PNG Flight CG4684, but had aborted once already. About ten minutes before it was due to land from its second approach it disapeared. The crash site was located today and is so inaccessable that two policemen were dropped into the jungle in order to hike to the scene and seek survivors. The search had been hampered by the same bad weather that had caused the aborted landing.

src: "Şükür ki bana hiçbir şey olmadı, ama insanlar dışarı çıkmak için camları kırmaya çalışırken dehşetli bir sahne gördüm. İnsanlar pencere camlarına sandalyelerle vuruyordu ama pencereler kırılmazdı. En nihayetinde camlardan bir tanesi kırıldı ve pencereden dışarı çıkmaya başladılar,""diye belirtti kazazedelerden Franciszek Kowal."
mt: "Thankfully nothing happened to me, but I saw a horrifying scene as people tried to break the windows to get out. They were hitting the windows with chairs but the windows were unbreakable. Eventually one of the windows broke and people started to get out through it," said Franciszek Kowal, one of the survivors.
ref: """Luckily nothing happened to me, but I saw a macabre scene, as people tried to break windows in order to get out. People were hitting the panes with chairs, but the windows were unbreakable. One of the panes finally broke, and they started to get out by the window,"" said survivor Franciszek Kowal."

src: 2010 Atlantik kasırga sezonunda isim verilen dördüncü fırtına olan Danielle Tropik Fırtınası Doğu Atlantik Okyanusu'nda meydana geldi. Florida, Miami'den yaklaşık 3.000 mil uzaklıkta bulunan fırtına, maksimum 40 mil/saat (64 km/saat) hızda seyreden rüzgarlara sahiptir. Ulusal Kasırga Merkezindeki bilim insanları, Danielle'in çarşamba gününe kadar kasırga haline geleceğini öngörüyor. Fırtına karadan uzakta olduğundan, Amerika Birleşik Devletleri ve Karayipler üzerindeki olası etkisini hesaplamak zor.
mt: 2010 Atlantic hurricane season named fourth storm Danielle Tropical Storm formed in the Eastern Atlantic Ocean. Florida, Miami about 3,000 miles away from the storm, has winds of up to 40 mph (64 km/h). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center, Danielle is expected to become a hurricane by Wednesday. The storm is far enough out to sea that it is difficult to estimate its possible impact on the United States and the Caribbean.
ref: Tropical Storm Danielle, fourth named storm of the 2010 Atlantic hurricane season, has formed in the eastern Atlantic Ocean. The storm, located approximately 3,000 miles from Miami, Florida, has maximum sustained winds of 40 mph (64 kph). Scientists at the National Hurricane Center predict that Danielle will strengthen to a hurricane by Wednesday. As the storm is far from landfall, it remains difficult to assess potential impact to the United States or Caribbean.

src: Dr. Lee, aynı zamanda Türkiye'deki çocukların şimdi de hasta olmadan A(H5N1) kuş gribi virüsüyle enfekte olmalarıyla ilgili haberler konusunda endişelerini ifade etti. Bazı araştırmalar, küresel bir epidemiye yol açmadan hastalığın daha az ölümcül hale gelmesi gerektiğini öne sürüyor. Grip semptomlarının hafif seyretmesi durumunda hastaların, günlük rutinlerine devam ederek daha fazla insana hastalığı bulaştırmaya devam edebileceği endişesi bulunuyor.
mt: Dr. Lee also expressed concern about reports of Turkish children being infected with the H5N1 avian flu virus without getting sick. Some studies suggest that the virus could become less deadly without causing a global epidemic. Concerns exist that patients who are asymptomatic could continue to spread the disease to others by continuing their daily routines.
ref: Dr. Lee also expressed his concern about reports that children in Turkey have now become infected with the A(H5N1) avian influenza virus without becoming ill. Some studies suggest that the disease must become less lethal before it can cause a global epidemic, he noted. There is concern that patients may continue to infect more people by going through their daily routines if the flu symptoms remain mild.

src: 9 Ağustos gecesi Morakot'un merkezi, Çin vilayeti Fujian’dan yaklaşık yetmiş kilometre uzaktaydı. Tayfunun, 11 km/saat hızla Çin'e doğru hareket ettiği düşünülüyor.
mt: 9 August, the typhoon's center was about 70 km from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is thought to be moving towards China at 11 km/h.
ref: As of the night of August 9, the eye of Morakot was about seventy kilometres away from the Chinese province of Fujian. The typhoon is estimated to be moving toward China at eleven kph.

src: ABD Başkanı George W. Bush 16 Kasım sabahı Singapur'a ulaştı ve bir haftalık Asya turuna başladı. Singapur Başbakan Yardımcısı Wong Kan Seng tarafından karşılandı ve Singapur Başbakanı Lee Hsien Loong ile ticaret ve terörizm konularını görüştü. Bush, ara dönem seçiminde yenilgiyle geçen haftanın ardından bir dinleyici kitlesine Asya'daki ticaretin genişletilmesinden bahsetti.
mt: 16 November morning, U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore and began a week-long Asian tour. He was greeted by Singapore Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and met with Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong to discuss trade and terrorism. Bush spoke to a crowd about expanding trade in Asia, after losing last week's midterm elections.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia. He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong. After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Bugün yapılan duyuru ayrıca bu yılın Mart ayında hükûmet tarafından verilen ekstra vagonların finansmanını sağlama taahhüdünü de uzattı. Eklenecek olan 300 vagon, aşırı yoğunluğu azaltmak için alınacak toplam vagon sayısını 1300'e getirir.
mt: 300 additional carriages, which were announced by the government in March, were also extended to finance the commitment. The additional 300 carriages will bring the total number of carriages to 1300, which will reduce overcrowding.
ref: Today's announcement also extended the government's commitment made in March of this year to fund extra carriages. An additional 300 brings the total to 1,300 carriages to be acquired to relieve overcrowding.

src: Yakın tarihte bir saldırı beklendiğine dair bir bilgi yok. dedi. Ancak tehdit düzeyinin ciddiye indirilmesi tehdidin tamamen ortadan kalktığı anlamına gelmiyor.
mt: "There is no information that a recent attack is expected," he said. "However, the threat level is not being taken seriously, which does not mean that the threat has completely disappeared."
ref: "She said, ""There is no intelligence to suggest that an attack is expected imminently. However, the reduction of the threat level to severe does not mean the overall threat has gone away."""

src: Martelly dün, dokuz üyeden oluşan yeni Geçici Seçim Konseyi (CEP) huzurunda and içti. Bu Martelly'nin dört yıl içindeki beşinci Geçici Seçim Konseyi olacak. Geçen ay bir cumhurbaşkanlığı komisyonu, önlem paketinin parçası olarak ülkeyi yeni bir seçime sokmak için CEP'in istifasını önerdi. Martelly, ekim ayında başlayan ve katılımın yüksek olduğu rejim karşıtı gösterilere bu komisyonla yanıt verdi. Gereken seçimlerin yapılamaması, bazen şiddet içeren protestolara zemin hazırladı. Bazıları 2011'den beri yapılmayı bekliyor.
mt: On Monday, Martelly swore in a new nine-member Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) in front of an audience. This will be Martelly's fifth Provisional Electoral Council in four years. Last month, a presidential commission proposed the dissolution of the CEP as part of a package of measures to bring the country to a new election. Martelly responded to this commission with the beginning of protests in October, which were high in participation and against the regime. The failure of the required elections prepared the ground for protests, sometimes violent. Some have been waiting since 2011.
ref: Martelly swore in a new Provisional Electoral Council (CEP) of nine members yesterday. It is Martelly's fifth CEP in four years. Last month a presidential commission recommended the prior CEP's resignation as part of a package of measures to move the country towards new elections. The commission was Martelly's response to widespread anti-regime protests that started in October. The sometimes-violent protests were triggered by failure to hold elections, some due since 2011.

src: ABD Jimnastik Federasyonu, Birleşik Devletler Olimpiyat Komitesi'nin mektubunu destekler ve Olimpiyat ailesinin tüm sporcularımız için güvenli bir çevre oluşturulmasını desteklemeye mutlaka ihtiyaç olduğunu kabul eder. USOC'nin; lisans iptali yerine kurumumuzda mantıklı değişiklikler yapmaya devam ederek atletlerimizin, kulüplerimizin ve yaptıkları sporların çıkarlarına daha iyi hizmet edilebileceği yönündeki beyanına katılıyoruz. ABD Jimnastik Federasyonu, Larry Nassar mağdurları tarafından böylesine cesur biçimde tasvir edilen orandaki bir istismarın nasıl bu kadar uzun süre tespit edilemediğine ışık tutabilecek bağımsız bir soruşturmanın yapılmasını destekler ve gereken ve uygun olan tüm değişiklikleri benimser. ABD Jimnastik Federasyonu ve USOC aynı hedefe sahiptir — jimnastik sporunu ve diğerlerini atletlerin hayallerini güvenli, pozitif ve yetki sahibi oldukları bir ortamda gerçekleştirmeleri için olabildiğince güvenli kılmaktır.
mt: The United States Gymnastics Federation supports the letter from the United States Olympic Committee and recognizes that it is imperative that we create a safe environment for all of our athletes, clubs, and the sports they participate in. We support the USOC's statement that it will continue to make reasonable changes within our organization to better serve our athletes, clubs, and the sports they participate in, rather than imposing a lifetime ban. We support the independent investigation that will shed light on how such abuse could have gone undetected for so long, and we will embrace any and all changes that are necessary and appropriate. The United States Gymnastics Federation and the USOC share the same goal: to make gymnastics and other sports as safe as possible for our athletes to achieve their dreams.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes. We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification. USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes. USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: "ABD Donanması da vakayı incelediklerini belirtti. Ayrıca bir açıklamada, ""Mürettebat şu anda gemiyi güvenli bir şekilde çıkarmanın en iyi yöntemini belirlemek için çalışıyor"" dediler. Bu Avenger sınıfı bir mayın önleme gemisiydi. Geminin rotası Palawan'daki Puerto Princesa'ya doğruydu. ABD Donanması'nın Yedinci Filosunda görevlendirildi ve merkezi Japonya'nın Nagasaki, Sasebo şehrinde yer almaktadır."
mt: "The U.S. Navy also said it was investigating the incident. In a statement, they said, ""The crew is working to determine the best way to safely remove the ship."" This was an Avenger-class mine countermeasures ship. Its route was headed towards Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It was assigned to the Seventh Fleet of the U.S. Navy and is based in Nagasaki, Sasebo, Japan."
ref: "The US Navy also said they were investigating the incident. They also said in a statement, ""The crew is currently working to determine the best method of safely extracting the ship"". An Avenger class mine countermeasures ship, the ship was on its way to Puerto Princesa in Palawan. It is assigned to the U.S. Navy’s Seventh Fleet and based in Sasebo, Nagasaki in Japan."

src: ABD Başkanı Donald Trump, pazar günü akşam saatlerinde basın sekreteri aracılığıyla yaptığı açıklamada, ABD askerlerinin Suriye'den çekileceğini duyurdu. Duyuru, Trump'ın Türkiye Cumhurbaşkanı Recep Tayyip Erdoğan ile yaptığı telefon görüşmesinden sonra yapıldı. Türkiye, ele geçirilen İŞİD savaşçılarının korunmasını da üstenecektir, diye demeç verdi, ancak Avrupa ülkeleri onların geri gönderilmesini reddetti.
mt: On Sunday evening, President Donald Trump announced through his press secretary that U.S. troops would be withdrawn from Syria. The announcement was made after Trump's phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey will also take care of the captured ISIS fighters, Trump said, but European countries refused to send them back.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: ABD Başkanı Donald Trump, pazar günü akşam saatlerinde basın sekreteri aracılığıyla yaptığı açıklamada, ABD askerlerinin Suriye'den çekileceğini duyurdu. Duyuru, Trump'ın Türkiye Cumhurbaşkanı Recep Tayyip Erdoğan ile yaptığı telefon görüşmesinden sonra yapıldı. Türkiye, ele geçirilen İŞİD savaşçılarının korunmasını da üstenecektir, diye demeç verdi, ancak Avrupa ülkeleri onların geri gönderilmesini reddetti.
mt: On Sunday evening, President Donald Trump announced through his press secretary that U.S. troops would be withdrawn from Syria. The announcement was made after Trump's phone call with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey will also take care of the captured ISIS fighters, Trump said, but European countries refused to send them back.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria. The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan. Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Koalisyon ve Afgan askerleri sahayı güvence altına almak için alana intikal ettirildi ve yardım için diğer koalisyon uçakları gönderildi. Uçak dağlık arazinin yüksek kısımlarında düştü ve nedeninin düşman ateşi olduğu düşünülüyor. Kötü hava koşulları ve zorlu arazi koşulları, kaza alanının aranmasını etkiliyor.
mt: Coalition and Afghan troops were sent to secure the area and other coalition aircraft were sent for help. The plane crashed in the highlands of the mountainous terrain and it is thought that it was hit by enemy fire. Bad weather and difficult terrain conditions are affecting the search for the crash site.
ref: Coalition and Afghan troops moved into the area to secure the site and other coalition aircraft have been sent to assist. The crash occurred high up in mountainous terrain, and is believed to have been the result of hostile fire. Efforts to search for the crash site are being met by bad weather and harsh terrain.

src: 1963'te barajın inşa edilmesi sayesinde nehir boyunca çökelti bırakan mevsimsel seller engellendi. Bu çökelti, vahşi yaşam habitatları yaratan kumsalların ve sahil kordonlarının oluşması için gerekliydi. Bunun neticesinde iki balık cinsinin soyu tükendi ve aralarında kambur kefalin de yer aldığı iki balık cinsi tehlike altına girdi. Su seviyesi selden sonra yalnızca birkaç feet yükselecek olsa da yetkililer bunun ters akımla aşınmış sığlıkların eski haline gelmesi için yeteceğini umuyorlar.
mt: 1963 saw the construction of the dam, which prevented seasonal floods from depositing silt along the river. This silt was necessary for the formation of beaches and shorelines that provide habitat for wildlife. As a result, two fish species went extinct and two other fish species were placed in danger, including the sturgeon. Officials hope that the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, allowing the eroded shallows to return to their original state.
ref: After the dam was built in 1963, the seasonal floods that would spread sediment throughout the river were halted. This sediment was necessary for creating sandbars and beaches, which served as wildlife habitats. As a result, two fish species have become extinct, and two others have become endangered, including the humpback chub. Although the water level will only rise a few feet after the flood, officials are hoping it will be enough to restore eroded sandbars downstream.

src: "Nairobi/Kenya'da bulunan Amerika Birleşik Devletleri büyükelçiliği, ""Somalili radikallerin"" Kenya ve Etiyopya'da bombalı intihar saldırıları yapmayı planladıkları konusunda bir uyarı yayınladı. ABD; özellikle Etiyopya ve Kenya'da ""önemli yerleri"" patlatmak için intihar bombacılarının kullanılacağından bahseden adı saklı bir kaynaktan bilgi aldığını açıkladı."
mt: "The United States embassy in Nairobi, Kenya, released a warning that ""radical Somalis"" were planning bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. said it received information from an unnamed source that ""important places"" in Ethiopia and Kenya would be attacked by suicide bombers."
ref: "The United States embassy located in Nairobi, Kenya has issued a warning that ""extremists from Somalia"" are planning to launch suicide bomb attacks in Kenya and Ethiopia. The U.S. says it has received information from an undisclosed source that specifically mentions the use of suicide bombers to will blow up ""prominent landmarks"" in Ethiopia and Kenya."

src: "Meşhur Yunan avukatlar Sakis Kechagioglou ve George Nikolakopoulos, rüşvet ve yolsuzluktan suçlu bulunarak Atina'nın Korydallus hapishanesine kondular. Bunun sonucunda, önceki yıllarda hâkimlerin ve avukatların yasadışı eylemlerinin ortaya çıkarılmasıyla Yunan hukuk camiası içinde büyük bir skandal yaşandı. Parlamento üyesi ve avukat Petros Mantouvalos, bilginin Makis Triantafylopoulos tarafından Alpha TV'deki popüler televizyon programı ""Zoungla""da yayınlanmasının ardından, ofisinin üyeleri yasadışı rüşvet ve yolsuzluğa karıştığı için birkaç hafta önce görevinden alındı. Dahası, yüksek hakim Evangelos Kalousis, yolsuzluk ve yozlaşmış davranıştan suçlu bulunduğu için hapse atıldı."
mt: "Famous Greek lawyers Saki Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos were convicted of bribery and corruption and sent to Korydallos prison in Athens. As a result, a scandal was experienced in the Greek legal community, as the actions of judges and lawyers were revealed. Member of Parliament and lawyer Petros Mantouvalos was removed from his position a few weeks ago after the information was published in the popular television show "Zoungla" by Makis Triantafylopoulos, that the members of his office were involved in illegal bribery and corruption. Furthermore, high judge Evangelos Kalousis was sentenced to prison for corruption and corrupt behavior."
ref: "The famous Greek lawyers, Sakis Kechagioglou and George Nikolakopoulos have been imprisoned in the Athens' jail of Korydallus, as they were found guilty of graft and corruption. As a result of this, a big scandal within the Greek legal community has been raised through the exposure of illegal actions that judges, lawyers, solicitors and attorneys have done during the previous years. A few weeks ago, after the information published by the journalist Makis Triantafylopoulos in his popular Television show ""Zoungla"" in Alpha TV, the member of Parliament and lawyer, Petros Mantouvalos was abdicated as members of his office had been involved in illegal graft and corruption. Moreover, top judge Evangelos Kalousis is imprisoned as he found guilty of corruption and degenerate behaviour."

src: 11 dörtlük ve 2 altılık vurarak sadece 41 topta 70 run ile Robin Uthappa atışta en yüksek skoru elde etmiştir. Orta sıra vurucuları, Sachin Tendulkar ve Rahul Dravid yüksek performans sergiledi ve birlikte yüz run yaptı. Fakat kaptanın kalesini kaybetmesinin ardından Hindistan sadece 36 puan alarak vuruş sırasını bitirebilmek için 7 kale kaybetti.
mt: 11 fours and 2 sixes, Robin Uthappa scored the highest score of 70 runs off 41 balls. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid performed well and scored 100 runs together. However, after losing the captain's wicket, India only scored 36 runs and lost 7 wickets to complete the innings.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes. Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership. But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Kamu Yöneticisi Adam Cuerden, geçtiğimiz ay Wikinews ile konuştuğunda silinmelerden dolayı duyduğu hüsranı ifade etti. O [Wales] bize en başından beri yalan söyledi. Önce bu, yasal nedenlerden kaynaklanıyormuş gibi davrandı, sonra da görsellerin silinmesine kadar bizi dinliyormuş gibi yaptı. Topluluğun rahatsız olması, milyonlarca açık lisanslı medyaya ev sahipliği yapan site için cinsel içeriğe dair bir politika taslağı hazırlama girişimleriyle sonuçlandı.
mt: Civil servant Adam Cuerden, who spoke to Wikinews last month, expressed his frustration over the deletions. He said Wales [Wales] lied to us from the beginning. First he acted as if it was for legal reasons, then he pretended to listen to us until the images were deleted. The community's discomfort resulted in a draft policy for sexual content on a site that hosts millions of open-licensed media.
ref: "Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month. ""He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."" The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media."

src: "Kadın klasmanının dahil edilmesini herkes desteklemiyordu. 2004 Olimpiyatlarında gümüş madalya kazanan Amir Khan, ""Bence kadınlar kavga etmemeli."" dedi. Yorumlarına rağmen Londra'da düzenlenecek 2012 Olimpiyatları'nda İngiliz yarışmacıları destekleyeceğini söyledi."
mt: 2004 Olympics silver medalist Amir Khan said, "I think women shouldn't fight." Despite his comments, he said he would support British competitors at the 2012 Olympics in London.
ref: "Not all were supportive of the inclusion of the women’s ranks. 2004 Olympic silver medallist Amir Khan said, ""Deep down I think women shouldn’t fight. That’s my opinion."" Despite his comments he said he will be supporting the British competitors at the 2012 Olympics being held in London."

src: Peter Lenz, 13 yaşındaki bir motosiklet yarışçısı, Indianapolis Motor Yarış Pisti'nde bir kazaya dahil olmasının ardından yaşamını yitirdi. Isınma turu sırasında, Lenz bisikletinden düştü ve yarışmacı arkadaşı Xavier Zayat tarafından ezildi. Yolda bekleyen tıbbi personel hemen kendisiyle ilgilendi ve daha sonra yerel bir hastaneye götürüldü ve hastanede hayatını kaybetti. Kazada Zayat yaralanmadı.
mt: 13-year-old motocross racer Peter Lenz died after being involved in an accident at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. During a warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike and was run over by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. Medical personnel on the side of the road immediately attended to him and later transported him to a local hospital where he died. Zayat was not injured in the accident.
ref: Peter Lenz, a 13-year-old motorcycle racer, has died after being involved in a crash at the Indianapolis Motor Speedway. While on his warm-up lap, Lenz fell off his bike, and was then struck by fellow racer Xavier Zayat. He was immediately attended to by the on-track medical staff and transported to a local hospital where he later died. Zayat was unhurt in the accident.

src: Uçakla seyahat , her yaştan ve kültürden gelen insan için korkutucu bir tecrübe olabilir, özellikle de daha önce uçmayan veya uçmak ile ilgili bir travma yaşayanlar için. Bu utanılacak bir şey değildir: pek çok insanın sahip olduğu kişisel korkulardan ve hoşlanmadıkları diğer şeylerden bir farkı yoktur. Bazıları için, uçağın nasıl çalıştığıyla ve bir uçuş sırasında neler olduğuyla ilgili bir şeyleri anlamak, bilinmeyene veya kontrolde olmamaya dayalı bir korkunun üstesinden gelmeye yardımcı olabilmektedir.
mt: Travel by air can be a terrifying experience for people of all ages and cultures, especially for those who have never flown or have a history of trauma related to flying. This is nothing to be ashamed of: many people have fears and dislikes of things that are no different. For some, understanding how an airplane works and what happens during a flight can help overcome a fear of the unknown or lack of control.
ref: Travelling by plane can be a scary experience for people of all ages and backgrounds, particularly if they've not flown before or have experienced a traumatic event. It is not something to be ashamed of: it is no different from the personal fears and dislikes of other things that very many people have. For some, understanding something about how aircraft work and what happens during a flight may help to overcome a fear which is based on the unknown or on not being in control.

src: Günümüzde uçakla yolculuk yapılırken fiyatları araştırıp karşılaştırmadan doğrudan havayolu şirketi aracılığıyla rezervasyon yapmak nadiren görülür. Bazen aynı uçuş çeşitli kaynaklarda çok ayrı fiyatlara sahip olabilir ve rezervasyon öncesi arama sonuçlarını karşılaştırmak ve ayrıca hava yolunun kendi web sitesine bakmak avantajlı olacaktır.
mt: Today, it is rare to see people researching and comparing prices before booking a flight directly through an airline. Sometimes the same flight can be priced very differently on various sources and it is advantageous to compare the search results and also look at the airline's own website before booking.
ref: Nowadays air travel is only rarely booked directly through the airline without first searching and comparing prices. Sometimes the same flight can have vastly differing prices at various agregators and it pays to compare search results and to also look at the website of the airline itself before booking.

src: Kurye şirketlerine eşyaları kısa zamanda ulaştırmaları için büyük ödemeler yapılır. Genellikle ticari dökümanların, malların, ya da acil bir onarım için yedek parçaların ulaştırılmasında zaman çok önemlidir. Bazı rotalarda büyük şirketlerin kendi uçakları vardır ancak diğer rotalar ve küçük şirketler sorun yaşıyordu. Eşyaları havayolu kargosu ile göndermişlerse bazı güzergâhlarda yük boşaltmak ve gümrükten geçmek günler sürmüş olabilir. Onu daha hızlı geçirmenin tek yolu kayıtlı bagaj olarak göndermekti. Havayolu düzenlemeleri, yolcu olmadan bagaj göndermelerine izin vermeyecektir. Burada devreye siz giriyorsunuz.
mt: Courier companies pay large sums to get their goods delivered quickly. Often, the delivery of commercial documents, goods, or urgent parts for repair, time is very important. Some routes have large companies with their own aircraft, but other routes and small companies were having problems. If they had sent their goods by air freight, it could take days to unload the cargo and pass through customs. The only way to get through faster was to send it as checked baggage. Airlines will not allow you to send baggage without passengers. Here you come in.
ref: Courier companies are well paid for delivering things quickly. Frequently, time is very important with business documents, merchandise or spare parts for an urgent repair. On some routes, the larger companies have their own planes, but for other routes and smaller firms there was a problem. If they sent things by air freight, on some routes it may have taken days to get through unloading and customs. The only way to get it through faster was to send it as checked luggage. Airline regulations will not allow them to send luggage without a passenger, which is where you come in.

src: Bir ortaklıkta Sıklıkla Uçtuğunuz havayolu şirketinizi dikkatlice seçmelisiniz. En çok uçtuğunuz hava yoluna katılmanın sezgisel olduğunu düşünebilirsiniz, ancak aynı ortaklığın farklı bir havayolunda sunulan ayrıcalıkların genellikle farklı ve sık uçan puanlarının daha cömert olabileceğinin farkında olmalısınız.
mt: You should carefully select the airline you fly most often with. You may think it is intuitive to join the frequent flyer program of the airline you fly most often with, but you should be aware that the perks offered by the same alliance's different airlines are usually different and the frequent flyer miles offered by the airline you fly most often with are usually more generous.
ref: You should choose your Frequent Flyer airline in an alliance carefully. Although you may think it is intuitive to join the airline you fly most, you should be aware that privileges offered are often different and frequent flyer points may be more generous under a different airline in the same alliance.

src: Bir ortaklıkta Sıklıkla Uçtuğunuz havayolu şirketinizi dikkatlice seçmelisiniz. En çok uçtuğunuz hava yoluna katılmanın sezgisel olduğunu düşünebilirsiniz, ancak aynı ortaklığın farklı bir havayolunda sunulan ayrıcalıkların genellikle farklı ve sık uçan puanlarının daha cömert olabileceğinin farkında olmalısınız.

src: Alkollü içkileri ölçülü biçimde için. Alkol herkese farklı etki eder ve sınırınızı bilmek çok önemlidir. Aşırı alkol tüketiminden kaynaklanan olası uzun vadeli sağlık sorunları, karaciğer hasarını ve hatta körlüğü ve ölümü içerebilir. Kaçak olarak üretilmiş alkol tüketildiğinde potansiyel tehlike artar. Kaçak içkiler, metanol dahil olmak üzere çeşitli tehlikeli yabancı maddeleri içerebilir ve küçük dozlarda bile körlüğe veya ölüme neden olabilir.
mt: 1. Drink alcohol in moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently and knowing your limits is important. Long-term health problems that can result from excessive alcohol consumption include liver damage and even blindness and death can be included. Potential danger increases when alcohol is consumed illegally. Bootlegged alcohol can contain various dangerous foreign substances including methanol and can cause blindness or death even in small doses.
ref: Drink alcoholic drinks with moderation. Alcohol affects everyone differently, and knowing your limit is very important. Possible long term health events from excessive drinking can include liver damage and even blindness and death. The potential danger is increased when consuming illegally produced alcohol. Illegal spirits can contain various dangerous impurities including methanol, which can cause blindness or death even in small doses.

src: Kanal Bölgesi (Felemenkçe: Grachtengordel) Amsterdam'ın Binnenstad bölgesini çevreleyen, 17. yüzyıldan kalma ünlü bir mahallesidir. Tüm bölge, emsalsiz kültürel ve tarihi değerinden ötürü UNESCO Dünya Mirası Alanı olarak belirlenmiştir ve emlak değerleri ülkenin en yüksek değerleri arasındadır.
mt: 17th century canalside district of Amsterdam's inner city. The entire area has been designated a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value and real estate values are among the highest in the country.
ref: The Canal District (Dutch: Grachtengordel) is the famous 17th-century district surrounding the Binnenstad of Amsterdam. The whole district is designated as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its unique cultural and historical value, and its property values are among the highest of the country.

src: Phnom Krom, Siem Reap'in 12 km güneybatısındadır. Bu tepebaşı tapınağı, 9. yüzyılın sonunda, Kral Yasovarman'ın hükümdarlığında inşa edilmiştir. Tapınağın kasvetli atmosferi ve Tonle Sap gölü manzarası, tepeye tırmanmayı zahmete değer bir hale getiriyor. Yerleşim yerine yapılacak bir ziyaret, kolaylıkla, gölde bir bot turu ile birleştirilebilir. Tapınağa girmek için Angkor Pass gereklidir, bu yüzden Tonle Sap'a giderken pasaportunuzu getirmeyi unutmayın.
mt: 12 km southwest of Siem Reap, Phnom Krom is a hilltop temple built in the late 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The temple's somber atmosphere and Tonle Sap lake view make the climb worthwhile. A visit to the settlement can be easily combined with a boat tour on the lake. Entry to the temple requires an Angkor Pass, so don't forget your passport when you go to Tonle Sap.
ref: Phnom Krom, 12 km southwest of Siem Reap. This hilltop temple was built at the end of the 9th century, during the reign of King Yasovarman. The gloomy atmosphere of the temple and the view over the Tonle Sap lake make the climb to the hill worthwhile. A visit to the site can be conveniently combined with a boat trip to the lake. The Angkor Pass is needed to enter the temple so do not forget to bring your passport along when heading to Tonle Sap.

src: Antarktika, yeryüzündeki en soğuk yerdir ve Güney Kutbu'nun etrafını sarmaktadır. Turist ziyaretleri maliyetlidir; fiziksel zindelik gerektirir; yalnızca Kasım-Şubat yazında gerçekleştirilebilir ve büyük oranda Yarımada, Adalar ve Ross Denizi ile sınırlıdır. Yazın burada, çoğunlukla bu bölgelerdeki 48 üste, birkaç bin personel yaşıyor; az sayıda kişi kışın da kalıyor. İç Antarktika, 2-3 km buzla kaplı, insanların yaşamadığı bir düzlüktür. Bazen uzmanların düzenlediği hava turları, dağcılık sporu için veya geniş bir tabana sahip olan kutuba ulaşmak için iç kesimlere gider.
mt: 1. Antartika, en soğuk yerdir ve Güney Kutbu'nun etrafını sarmaktadır. Turist ziyaretleri maliyetlidir; fiziksel zindelik gerektirir; yalnızca Kasım-Şubat yazında gerçekleştirilebilir ve büyük oranda Yarımada, Adalar ve Ross Denizi ile sınırlıdır. Yazın burada, çoğunlukla bu bölgelerdeki 48 üste, birkaç bin personel yaşıyor; az sayıda kişi kışın da kalıyor. İç Antarktika, 2-3 km buzla kaplı, insanların yaşamadığı bir düzlüktür. Bazen uzmanların düzenlediği hava turları, dağcılık sporu için veya geniş bir tabana sahip olan kutuba ulaşmak için iç kesimlere gider.
ref: Antarctica is the coldest place on Earth, and surrounds the South Pole. Tourist visits are costly, demand physical fitness, can only take place in summer Nov-Feb, and are largely limited to the Peninsula, Islands and Ross Sea. A couple of thousand staff live here in summer in some four dozen bases mostly in those areas; a small number stay over winter. Inland Antarctica is a desolate plateau covered by 2-3 km of ice. Occasional specialist air tours go inland, for mountaineering or to reach the Pole, which has a large base.

src: Premodern gözlemevlerinin bugün genellikle modası geçmiştir ve müzeler veya eğitim alanları olarak kalmaya devam eder. O zamanların en parlak döneminde ışık kirliliği bugünkü gibi sorun değilken, genellikle modern zamanlarda kurulanlara göre erişmesi daha kolay olan şehirlerde veya kampüslerde bulunurlar. Çoğu modern araştırma teleskobu, uygun atmosfer koşullarına sahip ücra bölgelerdeki devasa tesislerdir.
mt: Premodern observatories are usually outdated and remain as museums or educational facilities. They were built in cities or campuses where they were easier to access than the modern ones, which are usually huge facilities in remote areas with suitable atmospheric conditions.
ref: Pre-modern observatories are usually obsolete today, and remain as museums, or sites of education. As light pollution in their heyday was not the kind of problem it is today, they are usually located in cities or at campuses, easier to reach than those built in modern times. Most modern research telescopes are enormous facilities in remote areas with favorable atmospheric conditions.

src: Auckland'ın iki limanın ortasında olması nedeniyle birçok plaj var. En popüler olanları üç bölgededir. North Shore plajları (North Harbour bölgesindeki) Pasifik Okyanusu'ndadır ve kuzeyde bulunan Long Bay'den güneydeki Devonport'a uzanır. Neredeyse tamamı güvenle yüzülebilen kumlu plajlardır ve çoğunda pohutukawa ağacı tarafından sağlanan gölgelikler vardır. Tamaki Drive plajları; Waitemata Limanı, Mission Bay'in lüks banliyöleri ve Central Auckland'daki St Heliers arasında kalan bölgede bulunmaktadır. Bunlar, kıyıda sıralanan çok çeşitli dükkanların bulunduğu, bazen kalabalık olan aile plajlarıdır. Yüzmek güvenlidir.
mt: Because Auckland is between two harbours, there are many beaches. The most popular ones are in three areas. The North Shore beaches (in the North Harbour region) are on the Pacific Ocean and run from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. Most are safe for swimming and have pohutukawa trees for shade. The Tamaki Drive beaches are between the Waitemata Harbour, the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and Central Auckland's St Heliers. These are family beaches with a variety of shops along the shore, sometimes crowded. Swimming is safe.
ref: There are many beaches, due to Auckland's straddling of two harbours. The most popular ones are in three areas. North Shore beaches (in North Harbour district) are on the Pacific Ocean and stretch from Long Bay in the north to Devonport in the south. They are almost all sandy beaches with safe swimming, and most have shade provided by pohutukawa trees. Tamaki Drive beaches are on the Waitemata Harbour, in the upmarket suburbs of Mission Bay and St Heliers in Central Auckland. These are sometimes-crowded family beaches with a good range of shops lining the shore. Swimming is safe.

src: Esasen bir toplu mezar alanını ve aynı zamanda dünya nüfusunun önemli bir kısmı için neredeyse ölçülemeyecek bir anlamı olan bir bölgeyi ziyaret ettiğinizi lütfen unutmayın. Hala hayatta olan, buradan sağ çıkmayı başarabilmiş pek çok erkek ve kadın var. Çok sayıda kişinin sevdikleri, hem Yahudiler hem de Yahudi olmayanlar, burada katledildi veya ölümüne çalıştırıldı. Lütfen kampa hak ettiği tüm haysiyet, ciddiyet ve saygıyla davranın. Holokost veya Naziler hakkında şaka yapmayın. Yapıları kazıyarak ya da duvar yazısı yazarak onlara saygısızlık etmeyin.
mt: 1. Please remember that you are visiting a mass grave site and a region that has almost no meaning to the majority of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived this place. Many people, both Jews and non-Jews, were killed or worked to death here. Please treat the camp with the dignity, seriousness, and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or the Nazis. Do not deface the structures or write graffiti on the walls.
ref: Please remember that you are essentially visiting a mass grave site, as well as a site that has an almost incalculable meaning to a significant portion of the world's population. There are still many men and women alive who survived their time here, and many more who had loved ones who were murdered or worked to death there, Jews and non-Jews alike. Please treat the site with all of the dignity, solemnity and respect it deserves. Do not make jokes about the Holocaust or Nazis. Do not deface the site by marking or scratching graffiti into structures.

src: Yardımcı diller, aksi takdirde iletişim kurmakta zorluk çekecek insanlar arasındaki iletişimi kolaylaştırmak amacıyla hazırlanan yapay veya oluşturulmuş dillerdir. Onlar, diğer dilleri konuşanlar arasındaki iletişim sayesinde ya da başka bir nedenden baskın hale gelmiş doğal veya organik dil olan ortak dillerden ayrıdır.
mt: Auxiliary languages are constructed or artificial languages designed to facilitate communication between people who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are distinct from natural or organic languages that are dominant because of a preponderance of speakers of a common language.
ref: Auxiliary languages are artificial or constructed languages created with the intent of facilitating communication between peoples who would otherwise have difficulty communicating. They are separate from lingua francas, which are natural or organic languages that become dominant for one reason or another as means of communication between speakers of other languages.

src: Kışın Kuzey Baltık'tan geçiyorsanız kabinin yerini bildiğinizden emin olun. Çünkü buzun içinden geçmek, hassas olanlar için korkunç bir gürültüye neden olur. Saint Petersburg gemi seyahatleri, şehirde zaman geçirmeyi de içerir. Turistik gemi yolcuları vize gereksinimlerinden muaftır (şartları kontrol edin).
mt: If you're crossing the North Sea in winter, make sure you know where the cabin is. Because going through the ice causes a terrifying noise for the sensitive ones. Saint Petersburg ship cruises also include time in the city. Tourist ship passengers are exempt from visa requirements (check the conditions).
ref: If crossing the Northern Baltic in winter, check the cabin location, as going through ice causes quite horrible noise for those most affected. Saint Petersburg cruises include time in town. Cruise passengers are exempted from visa requirements (check the terms).

src: Barselona'nın resmi dilleri Katalanca ve İspanyolcadır. Halkın yaklaşık yarısı Katalanca konuşmayı tercih etmekte, büyük çoğunluğu bu dili anlamakta ve neredeyse herkes İspanyolca bilmektedir. Ancak işaretlerin çoğu, yasalara göre ilk resmi dil olarak belirlendiği için yalnızca Katalancadır. Yine de İspanyolca, toplu ulaşım araçlarında ve diğer tesislerde de yaygın bir biçimde kullanılmaktadır. Metro'da düzenli anonslar yalnızca Katalanca yapılır. Ancak planlanmamış aksaklıklar otomatik bir sistem tarafından İspanyolca, İngilizce, Fransızca, Arapça ve Japonca dahil olmak üzere çok çeşitli dillerde duyurulur.
mt: The official languages of Barcelona are Catalan and Spanish. About half of the population prefers to speak Catalan, most understand it, and almost everyone speaks Spanish. However, the signs are all in Catalan, as the law requires that the first official language be Catalan. Nevertheless, Spanish is widely used in public transportation and other facilities. The metro makes announcements only in Catalan. However, unplanned disruptions are announced in automatic systems in many languages, including Spanish, English, French, Arabic, and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: Barselona'nın resmi dilleri Katalanca ve İspanyolcadır. Halkın yaklaşık yarısı Katalanca konuşmayı tercih etmekte, büyük çoğunluğu bu dili anlamakta ve neredeyse herkes İspanyolca bilmektedir. mt: The official languages of Barcelona are Catalan and Spanish. About half of the population prefers to speak Catalan, most understand it, and almost everyone speaks Spanish. However, the signs are all in Catalan, as the law requires that the first official language be Catalan. Nevertheless, Spanish is widely used in public transportation and other facilities. The metro makes announcements only in Catalan. However, unplanned disruptions are announced in automatic systems in many languages, including Spanish, English, French, Arabic, and Japanese.
ref: Barcelona's official languages are Catalan and Spanish. About a half prefer to speak Catalan, a vast majority understands it, and virtually everyone knows Spanish. However, most signs are indicated only in Catalan because it is established by law as the first official language. Yet, Spanish is also widely used in public transport and other facilities. Regular announcements in the Metro are made only in Catalan, but unplanned disruptions are announced by an automated system in a wide variety of languages including Spanish, English, French, Arabic and Japanese.

src: Bugün gelişmiş ülkelerde lüks yatak ve kahvaltı tedariki bir nevi sanat biçimine dönüşmüştür. Üst klasmanda oda kahvaltı hizmetleri adından da belli olduğu üzere oda ve kahvaltı kalitesi alanında rekabet eder. Bu yüzden, bu gibi tesislerin en iyilerinde, en lüks yatak takımları, belki el yapımı bir yorgan veya antika bir yatak bulunması muhtemeldir. Kahvaltıda bölgenin mevsimsel lezzetleri veya otelin özel yemeği yer alabilir. Atmosfer; antika möbleleri, düzgün kesilmiş çimleri ve bir yüzme havuzu olan eski bir tarihi yapıdan oluşuyor olabilir.
mt: Today, in developed countries, the provision of luxury beds and breakfasts has become a form of art. In the upper class, room breakfast services compete in the quality of room and breakfast. Therefore, in such establishments, the best ones, the most luxurious bed sets, may be a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delicacies of the region or the hotel's special dish. The atmosphere may be formed by antique furniture, well-cut lawns and an old historical building with a swimming pool.
ref: In developed countries today, providing deluxe bed and breakfasts has been raised to a sort of art-form. At the top end, B&Bs obviously compete mainly on two main things: bedding and breakfast. Accordingly, at the finest such establishments one is apt to find the most luxurious bedding, maybe a handmade quilt or an antique bed. Breakfast may include seasonal delights of the region or the host's speciality dish. The setting might be an historic old building with antique furnishings, manicured grounds and a swimming pool.

src: Çin'in Pekin kenti, 2022'de Olimpik Kış Oyunlarına ev sahipliği yapacak ve bu da onu hem yaz hem de kış Olimpiyatlarına ev sahipliği yapan ilk şehir yapacak. Pekin, açılış ve kapanış seremonilerine ve kapalı alan buz etkinliklerine ev sahipliği yapacak. Diğer kayak etkinlikleri Pekin'den 220 km (140 mil) uzakta, Zhangjiakou'daki Taizicheng kayak alanında olacak.
mt: 2022 Winter Olympics will be held in Beijing, China, making it the first city to host both summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be held at the Taizicheng ski area, 220 km (140 miles) away in Zhangjiakou.
ref: The city of Beijing in China will be the host city of the Olympic Winter Games in 2022, which will make it the first city to have hosted both the summer and winter Olympics. Beijing will host the opening and closing ceremonies and the indoor ice events. Other skiing events will be at the Taizicheng ski area in Zhangjiakou, about 220 km (140 miles) from Beijing.

src: Kuş gribi veya daha resmi adıyla avian influenza, hem kuşlara hem de memelilere bulaşabilir. İnsanlarda binden az vaka bildirilmiştir, ancak bunların bir kısmı ölümcül olmuştur. Çoğu, kümes hayvanlarıyla çalışan insanlarla ilgilidir ancak kuş gözlemcileri de kısmen risk altındadır.
mt: Avian influenza, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than 100 cases have been reported in humans, but some have been fatal. Most involve people who work with poultry, but birdwatchers are also at partial risk.
ref: Bird flu, or more formally avian influenza, can infect both birds and mammals. Fewer than a thousand cases have ever been reported in humans, but some of them have been fatal. Most have involved people who work with poultry, but there is also some risk to birdwatchers.

src: Vikingler Karadeniz'e ve Hazar Denizi'ne gitmek için Rus su yollarını kullandılar. Bu rotaların bir kısmı hala kullanılabilir. Alması zor olabilecek özel izinlere olası ihtiyacı kontrol edin. Beyaz Deniz - Baltık Kanalı; Onega, Ladoga Gölleri ve Saint Petersburg gibi başlıca akarsu ve göller vasıtasıyla Arktik Okyanusu'nu Baltık Denizi'yle birleştirir. Onega Gölü, Volga'ya da bağlanıyor. Bu sayede Rusya’dan geçerek Hazar Denizi üzerinden gelmek de mümkün.
mt: Vikings used Russian waterways to reach the Black Sea and the Caspian Sea. Some of these routes are still in use. Check for possible requirements of difficult to obtain permissions. The White Sea - Baltic Canal; Onega, Ladoga Lakes and Saint Petersburg like major rivers and lakes connect the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea. Onega Lake is also connected to the Volga. This makes it possible to reach the Caspian Sea via Russia.
ref: Vikings used the Russian waterways to get to the Black Sea and Caspian Sea. Parts of these routes can still be used. Check possible need for special permits, which may be difficult to get. The White Sea–Baltic Canal connects the Arctic Ocean to the Baltic Sea, via Lake Onega, Lake Ladoga and Saint Petersburg, mostly by rivers and lakes. Lake Onega is also connected to Volga, so coming from the Caspian Sea through Russia is still possible.

src: Genellikle bir uçaktan, gemiden veya başka bir araçtan inerken uğranan ilk durak göçmen kontrol noktasıdır. Bazı uluslararası trenlerde kontroller hareket halindeki trende yapılır ve bu trenlerden birine binerken yanınızda geçerli bir kimlik taşımanız gerekir. Yataklı trenlerde, pasaportlar kondüktör tarafından toplanabilir, böylece uykunuz bölünmez.
mt: 1. The first stop for most immigrants is the immigration control point when disembarking from a plane, ship or other vehicle. Some international trains have checks done on the moving train and you need to have a valid ID when boarding one of these trains. On sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that your sleep is not interrupted.
ref: An immigration checkpoint is usually the first stop when disembarking from a plane, a ship, or another vehicle. In some cross-border trains inspections are done on the running train and you should have valid ID with you when boarding one of those trains. On night sleeper trains, passports may be collected by the conductor so that you do not have your sleep interrupted.

src: "Singapur genellikle son derece güvenli ve dolaşılması çok kolay bir yer olduğu için vardıktan hemen sonra istediğiniz her şeyi alabilirsiniz. Ancak ekvatorun sadece birkaç derece kuzeyinde, ""yüksek tropiklerde"" bulunan Singapur'da hem ısı ile (her zaman) hem de güçlü bir güneş ile (hava bulutsuzken, nadiren) baş etmeniz gerekmektedir."
mt: "Singapore is usually very safe and easy to get around, so you can get whatever you want as soon as you arrive. However, Singapore is just a few degrees north of the equator, in the "high tropics", so you need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, rarely)."
ref: "Singapore is generally an extremely safe place to be and very easy to navigate, and you can buy almost anything after arriving. But being placed in the ""high tropics"" just a few degrees north of equator you will need to deal with both heat (always) and strong sun (when the sky is clear, more rarely)."

src: Alman hamur işleri oldukça iyidir ve Bavyera'da da güney komşuları Avusturya'da olduğu gibi çok zengin ve çeşitlidir. Yıl boyunca hamur işlerinin içine konularak pişirilen elmalar ve yazın kendini gösteren kirazlar ve erikler ile meyveli hamur işleri yaygındır. Pek çok Alman hamur işi ayrıca badem, fındık ve diğer ağaç yemişlerini içerir. Çok talep gören kekler genel olarak bir fincan şekersiz sade kahve ile özellikle iyi bir ikili oluşturur. Küçük ama zengin hamur işleri istiyorsanız hangi bölgede olduğunuza bağlı olarak Berliner, Pfannkuchen veya Krapfen olarak adlandırılan şeyi deneyin.
mt: German pastries are very good and in Bavaria, as in its southern neighbor Austria, they are also very rich and varied. Apples baked into pastries are common throughout the year, as are cherries and apricots in the summer. Many German pastries also contain almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. A cup of unsweetened black coffee with a pastry makes for a particularly good pair. If you want a small but rich pastry, try the Berliner, Pfannkuchen, or Krapfen, depending on the region.
ref: German pastries are quite good, and in Bavaria, are quite rich and varied, similar to those of their southern neighbor, Austria. Fruit pastries are common, with apples cooked into pastries year round, and cherries and plums making their appearances during the summer. Many German baked goods also feature almonds, hazelnuts, and other tree nuts. Popular cakes often pair particularly well with a cup of strong coffee. If you want some small though rich pastries, try what depending on region are called Berliner, Pfannkuchen or Krapfen.

src: Eğer zaruretten, yaşam tarzından veya meydan okumadan dolayı ucuza dünyayı gezmek istiyorsan bunu yapmanın bazı yolları var. İki ana kategoriye ayrılırlar: Ya seyahat ederken çalışırsınız ya da harcamalarınızı sınırlamaya uğraşırsınız. Bu yazıda ikincisine odaklanıyoruz. Giderleri neredeyse sıfıra indirmek için rahatlık, zaman ve öngörülebilirlikten fedakarlıkta bulunmaya istekli olanlar için asgari bütçe seyahati bölümüne bakın. Tavsiye, gezginlerin çalmadıklarını, arazilere izinsiz girmediklerini, yasadışı pazarlara dahil olmadıklarını, dilenmediklerini, veya başka türlü diğer insanları kendi kazançları için kullanmadıklarını varsayar.
mt: If you want to travel the world on the cheap, there are some ways to do it. They fall into two main categories: either you work while you travel or you limit your spending. This article focuses on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability in exchange for minimal budgets, see the section on budget travel. The advice assumes that travelers don't steal, don't trespass on private property, don't buy from illegal markets, don't beg, and don't otherwise use other people for their own gain.
ref: If you want to see the world on the cheap, for necessity, lifestyle or challenge, there are some ways to do that. Basically, they fall into two categories: Either work while you travel or try and limit your expenses. This article is focused on the latter. For those willing to sacrifice comfort, time and predictability to push expenses down close to zero, see minimum budget travel. The advice assumes that travellers do not steal, trespass, participate in the illegal market, beg, or otherwise exploit other people for their own gain.

src: Point Marlon ve Fairmont arasındaki arazi, sık sık tenha, geri kalmış bölgelerden geçen Buffalo-Pittsburgh Otoyolu'nun en zorlu sürüş koşullarını sunuyor. Kırsal bölgelerde araba kullanmaya aşina değilseniz gözünüzü dört açın. Dik eğimler, dar şeritler ve keskin virajlar sizi bekliyor. Yayınlanan hız sınırları, önceki ve sonraki bölümlerden fark edilir derecede düşüktür — genellikle 35-40 mph (56-64 km/s) — ve bunlara karı bir itaat aksinden daha önemlidir. Gariptir, burada cep telefonu sinyalleri rotanın diğer kısımlarından, mesela Pennyslvania Wilds'dan, daha güçlüdür.
mt: The land between Point Marlon and Fairmont offers some of the most challenging driving conditions along the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Turnpike, which runs through sparsely populated, backwoods areas. If you're not used to driving in the country, keep your eyes peeled. Steep grades, narrow shoulders, and sharp curves await. Speed limits are significantly lower than in previous and subsequent sections — usually 35-40 mph (56-64 km/s) — and should be obeyed. It's odd that cell phone signals are stronger along this stretch than in the Pennsylvania Wilds, for example.
ref: The stretch between Point Marion and Fairmont presents the most challenging driving conditions on the Buffalo-Pittsburgh Highway, passing frequently through isolated backwoods terrain. If you're not used to driving on country roads, keep your wits about you: steep grades, narrow lanes, and sharp curves predominate. Posted speed limits are noticeably lower than in previous and subsequent sections — commonly 35-40 mph (56-64 km/h) — and strict obedience to them is even more important than otherwise. Curiously, though, mobile phone service is much stronger here than along many other stretches of the route, e.g. the Pennsylvania Wilds.

src: Kanyon geçişi, kuru ya da su ile dolu olabilen bir kanyonun derinliklerine gidilen bir aktivitedir. Kanyon geçişi; yüzme, tırmanma ve zıplama hareketlerini bir araya getirir ama başlamak için nispeten düşük seviyede eğitim veya fiziksel kondisyon gerektirir (örneğin kaya tırmanışı, tüple dalış ya da alp kayağı sporlarına kıyasla).
mt: Canyoneering is the activity of traversing a canyon by walking, scrambling, climbing, and/or swimming. It requires a relatively low level of training or physical conditioning (e.g., compared to rock climbing, cave diving, or alpine skiing).
ref: Canyoning (or: canyoneering) is about going in a bottom of a canyon, which is either dry or full of water. Canyoning combines elements from swimming, climbing and jumping--but requires relatively little training or physical shape to get started (compared to rock climbing, scuba diving or alpine skiing, for example).

src: "Kendi aracınıza girip uzun bir yol gezisine çıkmanın basitlikten kaynaklanan kendine özgü bir çekiciliği vardır. Daha büyük cihazlardan farklı olarak muhtemelen otomobilinizi sürmeye alışkınsınız ve sınırlarını biliyorsunuz. Herhangi bir kişisel mülk ya da herhangi boyutta bir kasabada çadır kurmak kolaylıkla istenmeyen ilgiyi çekebilir. Özetleyecek olursak, arabanızı kullanmak bir yol seyahatine çıkmak için harika bir yöntemdir, ancak nadiren kendi başına bir ""kamp"" şeklidir. Büyük bir minivanınız, koltukları yatan SUV, sedan ya da steyşın arabanız varsa araçlı kamp mümkündür."
mt: "There is a certain allure to driving your own vehicle on a long road trip. Unlike larger vehicles, you are likely more familiar with your car and its limitations. Setting up camp in any personal property or in any size town can attract unwanted attention. In summary, driving your car is a great way to go on a road trip, but rarely is it a ""camp"" by itself. If you have a large minivan, SUV, sedan or station wagon, car camping is possible."
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: "Kendi aracınıza girip uzun bir yol gezisine çıkmanın basitlikten kaynaklanan kendine özgü bir çekiciliği vardır. Daha büyük cihazlardan farklı olarak muhtemelen otomobilinizi sürmeye alışkınsınız ve sınırlarını biliyorsunuz. Herhangi bir kişisel mülk ya da herhangi boyutta bir kasabada çadır kurmak kolaylıkla istenmeyen ilgiyi çekebilir. Özetleyecek olursak, arabanızı kullanmak bir yol seyahatine çıkmak için harika bir yöntemdir, ancak nadiren kendi başına bir ""kamp"" şeklidir. Büyük bir minivanınız, koltukları yatan SUV, sedan ya da steyşın arabanız varsa araçlı kamp mümkündür."
mt: "There is a certain allure to driving your own vehicle on a long road trip. Unlike larger vehicles, you are likely more familiar with your car and its limitations. Setting up camp in any personal property or in any size town can attract unwanted attention. In summary, driving your car is a great way to go on a road trip, but rarely is it a ""camp"" by itself. If you have a large minivan, SUV, sedan or station wagon, car camping is possible."
ref: "Getting into your own car and heading off on a long road trip has an intrinsic appeal in its simplicity. Unlike larger vehicles, you are probably already familiar with driving your car and know its limitations. Setting up a tent on private property or in a town of any size can easily attract unwanted attention. In short, using your car is a great way to take a road trip but seldom in itself a way to ""camp"". Car camping is possible if you have a large minivan, SUV, Sedan or Station Wagon with seats that lay down."

src: Çağdaş Kazablanka kentinin temelleri, Berberi balıkçılar tarafından MÖ 10. yüzyılda atılmış ve de stratejik bir liman olarak, Anfa adı ile Fenikeliler, Romalılar ve Merenidlerce kullanılmıştır. Portekizliler onu yıktılar ve Casa Branca adıyla yeniden inşa ettiler, ancak 1755'teki bir depremden sonra onu terk ettiler. Fas sultanı, şehri Daru l-Badya olarak yeniden inşa etti ve daha sonra şehirde ticaret merkezleri kuran İspanyol tüccarlar tarafından buraya Kazablanka adı verildi. Fas'ta alışveriş yapmak istiyorsanız Kazablanka en az ilgi çekici olan yerlerden biridir. Eski Medine etrafında, tajin, çömlekler, deri eşyalar, nargileler ve çeşitli ıvır zıvırlar gibi geleneksel Fas ürünlerini satan yerler bulmak kolaydır, ama buralar hep turistler içindir.
mt: 10th century BC, the Berber fishermen founded the foundations of modern Casablanca, and as a strategic port, Anfa was used by the Phoenicians, Romans and Merenids. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it as Casa Branca, but after the 1755 earthquake, they abandoned it. The Sultan of Morocco rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and the Spanish merchants who came to trade in the city gave it the name Casablanca. If you want to shop in Morocco, Casablanca is one of the least interesting places. It is easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan products such as tajin, pottery, leather goods, hookahs and various trinkets around the old Medina, but these are all for tourists.
ref: The modern city of Casablanca was founded by Berber fishermen in the 10th century BCE, and was used by the Phoenicians, Romans, and the Merenids as a strategic port called Anfa. The Portuguese destroyed it and rebuilt it under the name Casa Branca, only to abandon it after an earthquake in 1755. The Moroccan sultan rebuilt the city as Daru l-Badya and it was given the name Casablanca by Spanish traders who established trading bases there. Casablanca is one of the least interesting places to shop in all of Morocco. Around the old Medina it's easy to find places selling traditional Moroccan goods, such as tagines, pottery, leather goods, hookahs, and a whole spectrum of geegaws, but it's all for the tourists.

src: Kuzeyde ve kolayca ulaşılabilecek mesafede romantik ve büyüleyici Sintra kasabası vardır ve Lord Byron tarafından ihtişamına olan övgüsünün kaydedilmesinin ardından yabancılar tarafından ünlenmiştir. 403 numaralı Scotturb Otobüsü, oldukça sık bir şekilde Cabo da Roca'da durarak Sintra'ya gider. Ayrıca kuzeyde, dünyaca ünlü Meryem'in görüntüsünün gerçekleştiği bir yer olan büyük Fatima Meryem Ana Tapınağı'nı (Tapınak) ziyaret edin.
mt: 403 bus to Sintra, which is a romantic and enchanting town in the north and easily accessible, has gained fame after Lord Byron's recorded praise of its splendor. The bus stops frequently at Cabo da Roca, and you can also visit the large Fatima Virgin Mary Shrine (Shrine) in the north, where the image of the Virgin Mary is said to have appeared.
ref: To the north and within easy reach is the romantic and fascinating town of Sintra and which was made famous to foreigners after a glowing account of its splendours recorded by Lord Byron. Scotturb Bus 403 travels regularly to Sintra, stopping at Cabo da Roca. Also to the north visit the great Sanctuary of Our Lady of Fatima (Shrine), a place of worldwide famous Marian apparitions.

src: 1994 yılında Azerbaycan'ın etnik Ermeni Dağlık Karabağ bölgesi Azerilere karşı savaş açtı. Ermenilerin desteği ile yeni bir cumhuriyet kuruldu. Ancak, aralarında Ermistan'ın da bulunduğu hiçbir yerleşik ulus onu resmi olarak tanımadı. Bölgedeki diplomatik tartışmalar, Ermenistan ve Azerbaycan arasındaki ilişkileri bozuyor.
mt: 1994, Azerbaijan launched a war against the ethnic Armenian enclave of Nagorno-Karabakh. A new republic was established with the support of Armenia. However, no established nation officially recognized it. Diplomatic disputes in the region are disrupting relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
ref: In 1994, the ethnically Armenian Nagorno-Karabakh region of Azerbaijan waged war against the Azeris. With Armenian backing, a new republic was created. However, no established nation - not even Armenia - officially recognizes it. Diplomatic arguments over the region continue to mar relations between Armenia and Azerbaijan.
